Jisasi amanage huno zamagrira zamasmi'ne, Nagri ne'zana aza'o hunantege'na e'nomofo avesite eri'zama'a eri vgare snugu hunantege'na e'noe.
4'a ika maniteta tamagra hozama hamre kna me'ne huta nosafi? Nagra neramasmuanki keho, kesga hutma hozafina tmua keho, ne'zamo afureno ta'nefa ruherafino hoza hamre kna kofta nehie.
Ana ne'zama hamre'namo'za hago mizazamia knare hu'za eri'naze. Hagi ana rga'ama hamre'nazana manivava mani'zante vahera zamare'za vu'naze, ana nehina aza'o hozama hankresnimo'ene, hozama hamresi'mokea, znagu'a musena magoka hugaha'e.
Na'ankure ama ana nanekea tamage ke me'ne. Mago'mo hoza hankretegeno, rumo hoza nehamre hu'za nehaze.
Tamagra zamaza hutma avimzana ose'naza hozafi Nagra huneramantoe, rumo'za amuho hu'za eri'za hankre'naza hozafi, tamagra ne'za hamre'sagu huneramantoe.
Samaria rankumateti hakare vahe'mo'za Agrite zamentinti hu'naze. Na'ankure ana a'moma huama hu'negu maka'zama nagra ko'ma hu'noa zana, Agra huama hunante'ne.
E'inage hige'za, Samaria vahe'mo'za Jisasinte e'za, tagrane manigahane hu'za hanaveti'za antahigageno, Agra tare zgegna zamagrane mani'ne.
Jisasi'ma zamasmia ke nentahi'za, hakare'a ontahi'naza vahe'mo'zane zamentinti hu'naze.
Zamagra ana ara amanage hu'za asmi'naze, kagrama hana kegukera tamentinti nosune, hagi tagra tagesafinti antahita tamentinti nehune. Agra tamage maka kokankoka vahemota tzahu nere.
Tare zge knama maniteno, Jisasi'a ana kumara atreno Galili vu'ne.
Na'ankure Jisasi'a Agra'a huama huno, Kasnampa (profet) vahe agi'a mopa agafa'arera erisaga osugahaze huno hu'ne.
Hagi anante Galilima ehanatige'za, Galili vahe'mo'za Agrira muse hu'za avare'naze, na'ankure Jerusale kumate kinafinti zamare'nea muse ne'za ne'knarema (pasova) Agrama maka'za hige'za ke'nagure. Zamagranena kinafinti zamare'nea muse ne'za ne knarera (pasova) Jerusale vu'neza ke'nareti muse hunte'naze.
Ana hzageno Kana Galili kaziga, tinteti waini'ma trohu'nea kumate eteno e'ne. Anante mago kamani eri'za ne'mofo mofavre'mo Kapenium kumate kri erino mse'ne.
Jisasi'a Judia atreno Galili kaziga ehanatia kema nentahino'a, kri eri'nea mofavre'mofo nefa'a Agrite viazamo asuragi kefinti, enka mofavre ni'a eme azeri so'e huo huno nemofo'a fri'kante mse'negeno antahige'ne.
Anage higeno Jisasi'a asmino, avame'zane kaguvaza hanuazana ketetage'za, tamagra tamentintia hugahazo!
Ana kamani eri'za ne'mo Jisasinku huno, Ramoke mofavreni'a frisanigi ko eramio.
Jisasi ana ne' asmino, nonkarega vuo, negamofo'a ofrino amne mani'ne. Ana ne'mo tamage Jisasi'a nehie huno amentinti nehuno atreno ete noma'arega vu'ne.
Atreno kantega uneramige'za, kazokzo eri'za vahe'amo'za eme asmi'za, negamofona kri'a atrentegeno mani'ne hu'za eme asmi'naze.
Anagema hu'za asmizageno kri'ama atrente'nea knagu zamantahigege'za zamagra asmi'za, okina wan kiloki higeno avufa teve hazamo'a atrente'ne.
Anagema nehzageno nefa'a agesa antahi'ne, Jisasi'a ana knareku huno, Negamofo'a ofri amne mani'ne huno hu'ne, nehuno agrane noma'afi nemniza naga'ane, maka'moza zamentinti hu'naze.
Ama'i ru'ene Jisasi'ma avame'za tro higeno'a, Agra Judia kazigama atreno Galili ehanatia knafina tare avame'za tro hu'ne.
Ana maka'zama higeno agteretegeno, Jiu vahe'mo'za mono nehza kna fore higeno, Jisasi'a Jerusale kumate mreri'ne.
Jerusale kuma'mofo kaha hagente'za, Sipisipi Kafane hu'naza tvaonte mago tiru me'nege'za, Hibru kefina Betsaida hu'za nehaze. Anantera 5fu'a hanko no kinte'naze.
Ana hanko nontera hakare'a kri vahera mse'za mani'naze, zamusuhu vahe'ene zamagia krere hu'nea vahe'ene zamaga zamaza sti'nea vahe'ene mani'naze.
<range>
Mago nera 38ti'a kafufi kri eri'nea ne', ana tirutera mseno mani'ne.
Anante mseno mani'negeno Jisasi'a negeno, za'za kna ana krifina mse'ne huno antahi'ne. Jisasi'a anage huno asmi'ne, Kagesama antahinana krika'a knare hugantesie hunka nentahino?
Ana kri ne'mo kenona'a asmino, Ra vahe'moka timoma kazama nehanigeno navreno ome nantesia vahera omni'nege'na, ana'ana hu'na nevuge'za rumo'za tirupina nagtere'za unermize.
Jisasi'a nentahino ana neku huno, Otinka, naverisaka'a renamginka e'nerinka vuo.
Hantaka huno kri'amo atrentegeno, tafe'a erirenamgino e'nerino otino agafa huno kana vu'ne. Ana kna mni fruhu kna (Sabat) zupa ana kaguvazana hu'ne.
Ana hige'za Jiu kva vahe'mo'za kri'ama eri amne huntea ne' antahige'naze, menina mni fruhu (Sabat) kna meno nagru hu'neankinka, naverisaka'a erinka vano osu'gahane.
Hianagi kri'a eri amne hu'nea ne'mo zamasmi'ne, agra aza'o kri'nima eri amne hu'nea ne'mo Agra nasmino, naverisaka'a erisaga hunka vuo huno hunante'ne.
Zamagra, agrira antahige'naze, Iza ana nera huganteno, naverisaka'a eri kofinka vuo huno hugante'ne?
Hianagi azeri so'ema hunte'nea ne'mo'a, iza anara hu'neo antahino keno osu'ne, na'ankure Jisasi'a maka vahepi ruhavia huno vu'ne.
Henka Jisasi'a ana nera ra mono nompi ome kefore huno asmi'ne, ko, krika'a hago vgare, mago'ene kumira osuo, e'inama hanunka tusi'a knaza henka'a erigahane.
Ana ne'mo'a atreno viazamo, Jiu vahera ome zamasmino, Jisasi kri'nia eri amane hunante'ne huno zamasmi'ne.
E'inage hige'za, Jiu kva vahe'mo'za agafa hu'za Jisasina azanva hu'naze, na'ankure ana zantmina mago'a, mni fruhu kna (Sabat) zupa hu'nea zante ana hu'naze.
Hianagi Agra zamasmino, Nenfa'a meninena eri'zana otreno e'neriankina, Nagra'nena eri'zana enerue.
E'i ana agafare, Jiu kva vahe'mo'za Agri ahenaku mraguza'ati'za maka kanku hakre'naze. Na'ankure Agra mni fruhu kasege hantagia zantekukera ana osu'naze. Hagi Agra Anumzanku Nenfa'e nehuno, Agra Anumzane mago tragave hu'noe, hia zante'ene ahenaku hu'naze.
E'inage hzageno Jisasi kenona zmirera amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Nagra tamagerafa hu'na neramasmue, Nemofo'a Agra'a avesitera mago'zana hugaosu'neankino, ke'nesigeno Nefa'ma huveri'nesia zanke, Nemofo'a anazanke hugahie.
Na'ankure Nenfa'a, Nemofona avesinenteno, Agra maka'zama nehia zana averi nehie. Ana nehuno Nefa'a agtereno tusi'aza averi hugahie. Anama hanigeta tamagra antri hugahaze.
Na'ankure Nenfa'a fri' vahe'ma zamazeri otino, asimu nezmia kna huno, Nemofo'a azano, Agri'ma avesi'nimofona asimura amigahie.
Na'ankure Nenfa'a Agra veara refko osugahie. Hagi maka vahe'ma refko hu'zana, Nemofo ami'ne.
Ana hina maka'mo'za Nemofo agi'a erisaga hugahaze. Nefa agima erisaga nehza kna hu'za, aza'o Nemofo agima erisaga osnimo'a, huntegeno'ma e'nea Nefana, anazanke huno agi'a erisaga nosie.
Nagra tamage hu'na neramasmue, aza'o Nagri nanekema nentahino hunantege'na e'nomofonte amentinti hanimo'a, manivava asimu enerino, vahe'ma refko hania knafina, fri'zana agtereno asimu erino manigahie.
Nagra tamage hu'na neramasmue, knamo'a kofta huno ne-eno hago menina ama efore hu'ne, fri'naza vahe'mo'za Anumzamofo Ne' mofavremofo ageru nentahi'za, ana ageru'ma antahisnamo'za manigahaze.
Na'ankure Nefa'a asimu erino mani'zamofo agafa'a Agripi me'ne. Nemofona anahu kna huno asimu erino mani'zamofo agafa'a Agri ami'ne.
Ana nehuno Agra Nemofona kema hugnare hunte hanavea (atoriti) ami'neankino, vahe'ma refko hu'zana Agri ami'ne, na'ankure Agra Vahe'mofo Mofavre.
Ana kegura antria osiho, na'ankure mago knama fore'ma hina kerifi asezamante'naza vahe'mo'za Anumzamofo Mofavre'agerura antahi'za,
oti'za esnageno knare avu'ava hu'nesaza nagamo'za, oti'za ksefa mani'za erigahaze. Hagi kefo avu'avazampi mani'ne'za fri'ne hanamokizmia, refako huno naneke huzmantegahie.
Nagra navesitera mago'azana osugahue. Anumzamofo ke nentahi'na anante zganena refko nehue. Ana kema refko'ma huana mago kante ante'na nezganoe. Na'ankure Nagra navesi'zantera kenontoe, hagi Agrama hunantege'na e'nomofo avesite refkoa nehue.
Nagrama, tamage nehue hu'na Nagrani'agu huama hanuana, Nagra havige hugahue.
Hianagi Nagri nagenkema rumo huama (testimoni) nehige'na, Agrama Nagriku huama hianke nentahi'na, tamage nehie hu'na nehue.
Tamagra Joninte vahe huzmantage'za ome antahi'nazana, Joni'a tamage nanekege huzmasmi'ne.
Hu'neanagi Nagrama hua kema e'neruana, mopafi vahepintira e'norue. Hianagi Nagrama nehuana tmagri'ma tmaza hanigu nehue.
Joni'a lampe tvi kna huno tvi'nereno remsa hurmantegeta, ana tvi'kura osasi'a knafi tmagu'a musena hu'naze.
Hianagi Nagrama hanua navu'navamo'a, Joni'ma hu'nea avu'avazana agtere'ne. Na'ankure Nenfa'ma nami'nea eri'za Nagra eri vgaresnugu e'nerue, ana eri'zama e'nerua eri'zamo, Nagrira eriama hugahie, na'ankure Nfa'nimo hunantege'na e'noe.
Nenfa'ma hunantege'na Nagrama e'noana, Nagriku huama Agra hu'ne. Hianagi tamagra mago'a knarera Agri agerura ontahitma, avugosa onke'naze.
Agri nanekemo'a tamagri tamagu'afina omne'ne, na'ankure Agrama hunantege'na Nagrama e'nogura, tamagra tamentintia Agritera nosaze.
Tamagra Anumzamofo avontafepi nehakraze, na'ankure tamagra mani'vava mani'zana hago eri'none hutma nentahize. Hianagi e'i ana avontafemo'a Nagriku huama nehie.
Hianagi Nagrite'ma e'netma tmasimu eri'zankura tamagrira tamavesra nehie.
Nagrira vahe'mo'za nagi erisaga (glori) hihogura nosue.
Hianagi Nagra tamagrira tamage'noe, Anumzamofo avesinte'zana tamagri tamagu'afina omne'ne.
Nagra, Nenfa agifi e'nogeta tamagra nonavraze, hagi mago'mo agra agire'ma esnimofona ame huta avregahaze.
Tamagra inankna huta tamentintia hugahaze, tamagri'ma ru vahe'mo'za tmagima erisaga nehazana, magoke Anumzamo tmagri'ma muse hurmante'sia zankura ohakre'gahazo?
Nefante naneke hurantegahie hutma Nagrikura tamagesa ontahiho, kema hurmantesia nera Mosese'e, Mosesete tamagu'a antetma tamentintina hu'naze.
Hianagi tamagrama tamage hutma Mosesente'ma tamentinti hunetasina, Nagrite ene tamentinti hazasine, na'ankure agrama kre'neana, Nagriku huno kre'ne.
Hianagi Mosesema kre'nea nanekema tamentinti osnutma, inankna huta tamagra Nagri nanekegura tamentintia hugahaze?
Anazama vgaregeno'a, anantetira Jisasi'a zamatreno Galili mago kaziga vu'ne, mago agi'a Taiberias tirure hu'za nehaze.
Tusi'a vahe krerfamo'za Agrira avariri'za vu'naze, na'ankure krima vase'naza vahe'ma kaguvazana huno zamazeri so'e hige'za nege'za avariri'za vu'naze.
Anante Jisasi'a agonarega mrerino amage nentaza disaipol naga'ane Agrane anante umani'naze.
Hagi Jiu vahe kinafinti zamare'nea kna (Pasova) muse hu'za ne'za ne kna'zmi atupa hu'ne.
Anante Jisasi'a, keganti kegma huno keama hakare vahe krerfa Agritega neageno Filipina asmino, Inantegati bretia miza hanunke'za ama vahe'mo'za negahaze?
Ama kema Jisasima hiana Filipina reheno ke'ne, na'ankure Agra inankna zano hni'ana antahi'neno, reheno antahige'ne.
Filipi'a ke nona'a amanage huno asmi'ne, 2 hantreti'a silva zgoreti mizama hania bretimo'a, mago'mago'mo'ma osi'a neterema haniana ama vea krerfafina knarera huozmantegahie.
Agri amagema nentea disaipol ne' Endru, Saimon Pita negna amanage huno Jisasina asmi'ne,
Amafi mago osi mofavre emani'neno 5fu'a bali bretigi, tare nozamegi huno eri'neanagi, asi'amo'a inankna huno ama veapina knarera hugahie?
Jisasi'a amanage huno hu'ne, ke huge'za mopafi maniho. Anampina trazamo hu'nefi 5 tauseni'a vahe'naza mopafi mani'nage'za, vene'ne age hampri'naze.
Jisasi'a breti erino Anumzamofonte nunamu hunteteno, erigorino mani'nare refko huno nezmino, anazanke huno nozamea zamige'za nenazageno zamu hu'ne.
Nazageno zamu'ma higeno'a, Agri'ma amage' nentaza disaipol naga'a zamasmino, atraza ne'zama'a eri atru hiho, e'inahinkeno amne zankna osnie.
Anage hige'za eri atru hzageno, 5fu'a bali bretima kori'za ne'naza atupa atupa'a, 12fu'a eka'eka kupi eriri'naze.
E'ina hige'za veamo'za ana kaguvazama Agrama hiaza nege'za, zamagra anage hu'naze. Ama'i tamage huno Kasnampa nere, ama mopafima henka'a egahie hu'za hu'naza ne' mani'ne. (Diu-Kas 18:15)
Ana vahe'mo'za zamagraregati eme azeriza kini kvazmi manisie hu'za azeri otiku hzageno, Jisasi'a antahino keno nehuno, anantetira zamatreno agonarega Agraku mreri'ne.
Kinaga sege'za, Agri amage' nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za ana kumara atre'za hagerintega urami'naze.
Anante ventefi marerite'za, hagerina tkahe'za Kapenium vu'naze. Hago haninkigeno Jisasi'a zamagrama mani'narega uohanati'ne.
Hagerimo'a tusiza huno kranto kranto hu'ne, na'ankure tusi'a zaho'mo atufeno egeno ana hu'ne.
Ana nehige'za kuta azotareti tina vakakiza 5fu'o, 6si'a kilo mita naza nevu'za zamagra kazana Jisasi'a hagerimofo agofetu ne-eno ventemofo erava'o hige'za nege'za, zamagra tusi zamanogu hu'naze.
Hianagi Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, ama Nagragi, korera osiho.
Anante zamagra zamagu'areti muse nehu'za, Agrira ventefi avrentazageno, vunaku zamagesa antahi'naza mopare ana ventemo'a ame huno uhanati'ne.
Vase'za ko'atige'za, ana hagerimofo ankenare mani'naza vahetmimo'za kazana magore huno onensa vente ramimpintira omne'neanki mago me'ne, anampina Agri amage nentaza disaipol naga'enena Jisasi'a mreorige'za ke'naze. Hianagi Agri'ma amage' nentaza nagamo'za zamagraku vu'naze.
Hianagi mago'a ne'one vente rami Taiberias kumateti e'za, Jisasi susu huteno breti zamige'za ne'naza mopa tva'onte ehnati'naz e.
Ehnati'za kazama Jisasi'ene, Agri'ma amage nentaza disaipol naga'anema omninage'za nege'za, zamagra osasi vente ramimpi mreri'za, Jisasinku hakre'za Kapenium vu'naze.
Ome hakre'za hagerimofo kantu kaziga Jisasima azeri fore nehu'za, amanage hu'za Agrira antahige'naze, Hurami ne'moka (Rabbai) Kagra nazupa amarera e'nane?
Jisasi'a kenonazmia anage huno zamasmi'ne, Tamage hu'na Nagra neramasmue, tamagra Nagriku nehakra'zana, kaguvazma hua zantekura nohakraze. Hagi tamagra bretima nazageno tmu'ma hia zanteku nehakraze.
Fanane hania ne'zantera eri'zana e'oriho. Hagi fanane osu manevava hanaza ne'zanku nentahita eri'zana eriho, e'i ana ne'zana Vahe'mofo Mofavremo tamigahie. Na'ankure Nefa, Anumzamo azanko avoma'a retro huno Agri hugnare hunte'ne.
Anankere zamagra anage hu'za Jisasina asmi'naze, tagra naza huteta, Anumzamo'ma hania eri'zana erigahune?
Jisasi kenona'a huno zamasmi'ne, Anumzamofona amanahu eri'za erihogu avenesie, Agri'ma huntegeno e'nemofonte tamentinti hiho.
Anankere zamagra Agri asmi'naze, Kagra na'a avame'zana nehnanketa negeta, tamage huta Kagritera tamentinti'a hugahune? Kagra nankna'za hugahane?
Tagri tfahe'za ka'ma mopafi mana ne'za ne'naze, hu'za krente'naze, Agra monafinti breti neho huno zami'ne. (Eks-Uti 16:4-36)
Anante Jisasi'a zamagrira zamasmi'ne, Nagra tamage, rfa hu'na neramasmue, Mosese'a monafinti bretia agra ontami'ne, hagi menina tamage bretia Nagri Nenfa monafinti neramie.
Na'ankure Anumzamofo bretia e'i ama monafinti erami'neankino, miko mopafi vahera zamasimu zamigahie.
Zamagra anante Jisasina asmi'naze, Ramoke, e'i ana bretia maka'zupa tmivava huo.
Jisasi anage huno zamasmi'ne, Nagra asimu eri bretia mani'noe, aza'o Nagrite esnimo'a aga'zankura osugahie. Hagi aza'o Nagriku amentinti hanimofona tinkura mago'ene ave'ositfa hugahie.
Hianagi Nagra neramasmue, tamagra ko Nagrira nage'nazanagi, tamagra tamentintia nosaze.
Maka vahe'ma Nenfa'ma, Nagri'ma nenmia vahe'mo'za Nagrite egahaze, hanige'na Nagrite'ma esimofona Nagra vuo hu'na retufe otregahue.
Na'ankure Nagra monafinti erami'noe, Nagra navesi'za hunaku ome'noe, hagi hunantege'na e'nomofo avesite erinaku e'noe.
Anumzamo hunantege'na Nagra e'nomofo avesira anahu hu'ne! Nagri'ma maka vahe'ma nami'nefintira mago'moe huno fnane osugahie, hagina vgare knarera zamazeri otigahue.
Na'ankure Nenfa avesi'zana amanahu hu'ne, maka'mo'za Nemofo nege'za Agrite zamentinti huntesamo'za manivava zamasimu erisage'na, vgamaresia knarera Nagrani'a azeri otigahue.
E'igu Jiu vahe'mo'za Agrikura ke hakare hu'naze, na'ankure Agrama huno Nagra ana breti monafinti erami'noe hiazante zamarimpa haviza nehige'za ke hakare hu'naze.
Zamagra anage hu'naze, ama Jisasi'ma, Josefe nemofo, nefane nereranema negona nepi? Nankna huno menia monafinti Nagra e'noe huno nehie?
Jisasi'a ana kemofo nona'a, amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Tamagra tamarimpa havizana osutma ke hakare osiho.
Mago'mo'a Nagritera omegahie, Nenfa'ma hunantege'na e'nomo agu'a avazu hanigeno Nagrite esige'na, vgare kna zupa azeri otigahue.
Kasnampa vahe'mo'za amanage hu'za Avontafepina kre'naze, Ana hanigeno Anumzamo maka'mokizmia huzmasmigahie. (Aisa 54:13) Maka'mo'za Nenfa ke nentahi'za rempi hanamo'za Nagrite egahaze
Mago mo'e huno Nefana onke'ne, Anumzane mani'neno e'nemo Agrake Nefana ke'ne.
Tamage hu'na Nagra neramasmue, aza'o amentinti hanimo manivava asimura erigahie.
Nagra'ni'a manivava hu'mofo bretia mani'noe.
Tmagehe'za ka'ma mopafi mana nete'za zamagra fri'naze.
Ama'ina bretia monafinti ermi'neankino, mago'mo'ma nesuno'a ofri manigahie.
Nagra ksefa mani'zamofo breti monafinti eramino'e, mago'mo ama ana bretima nesuno'a, agra manivava hugahie, E'i ana bretia Nagri navufa me'ne, ana navufamo maka mopafi vahe manivava asimu zamigahie.
Anage nehige'za anante Jiu vahe'mo'za nentahi'za, zamagra ke hugantigma hu'za anage hu'naze, Inankna huno ama ne' mo'a Agra avufa tamisigeta nenaku hunkeno nehie?
Ananku Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, Tamage rfa hu'na neramasmue, Vahe'mofo Mofavre'mofo avufane, korane onesutma tamasimu eritma mani'zana tamagripina omnegahie.
Mago'mo, Nagri navufa neneno, Nagri kora nesimo'a manivava asimu erisanige'na, Nagra vgare knazupa azeri otigahue.
Na'ankure Nagri navufgamo'a tamage ne'zane, higeno Nagri koramo'a tamage ti me'ne.
Mago'mo Nagri navufa neneno, Nagri korama nesnimo'a, agra Nagripi manige'na, Nagra agripi nemnue.
Mani'nea Nenfa, Nagrira hunante'ne, na'ankure Nenfa'ma mani'negu Nagra mani'noankino, aza'o Nagri'ma nesimo'a, Nagra mani'nogu agra manigahie.
Ama'i monafinti ermi'nea breti me'ne. Tmagehe'za ka'ma mopafi nete'za fri'naza ne'zana omne'ne, aza'o mago'mo ama bretima nesimo'a manivava hugahie.
Ama naneke zga Kapenium Jiu vahe osi mono nompi (sinagog) mani'neno Agra'a rempi huzami'nea naneke.
Anazanku hu'za hakare'a Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za, ama ana nanekema nentahi'za, ama kna'nentake naneke nehianki, iza agesa anteno antahigahie? hu'za hu'naze.
Hianagi Jisasi'ma hiankemo amage' nentaza disaipol nagara zamarimpa eri haviza hzageno, nezmageno, Jisasi amanage huno zamantahige'ne, Amama hua nanekegu tmarimpa kna nehazo?
Inankna hugahie, Vahe'mofo Mofavremo'ma negesageno ko'ma mani'nerega ete marerisigetma na'ane hugahaze?
Avamu'mo asimura neramie, tavufgamo'a mago'zana eri fore osugahie. Kema nagrama tamagrima neramasmua kemo'a, avamu ene ksefa mani'zane me'ne.
Hianagi mago'amota tamentintia nosaze. Na'ankure ese agafareti Jisasi'a zamentinti osnaza vahera, nezmageno iza'o komoru hanige'za Agri'ma ahe simofona agu'a ko ke'ne.
Anante Agra anange hu'ne, ama'na agafare nagra tmagrira tmasmi'noe, mago'mo'a Nagritera omegahie, Nenfa'ma avare namisimoke'za egahie.
Ana kema hiazanku Agri amage nentaza disaipol nagapintira ruga'amo'za atre'za, Agranena vano osu'naze.
E'igu Jisasi'a 12fu'a naga'a zamantahige'ne, Tamagrane natretma vunaku nehazafi?
Saimon Pita'a ana kemofo nona'a Agri asmino, Rantimoka izante katreta vunaku hunkenka nehane? Kagri kemo manivava asimura nemie.
Tagra tamentinti nehuta Kagrira antahita keta hu'none, Kagra magoke Anumzamofo Ruotge' ne', hugantegenka e'nane.
Jisasi'a ke nona'a zamagri zamasmi'ne, Nagra 12fu'a nagara huhampri tmante'noe, hianagi mago'moka havi avamu mani'nane.
E'i anagema hu'neana Saimon Iskarioti nemofo Judasinku hu'ne, na'ankure 12fu'a nagapinti, agra mago zmimoma henkama komoru huno Jisasima ha' vahe zmazampi avrezamisigeno ahesamofonku hune.
Ana nanekema huteno Galili kaziga vano nehuno, Judia kaziga vu'zankura ave'osi'ne, na'ankure Jiu kva vahe'mo'za ahenaku ke retro nehzageno ovu'ne.
Jiu vahe'mo'za fugagi nompi mani'neza, kave eri'za eme ante'za muse hu'za ne'za nekna kofa hu'ne. (Lev-Pri 23:34)
Ananku hu'za afu'agnahe'za Jisasi asmi'naze, Amafina atrenka Judia kaziga vuge'za, Kagri kamagenentaza disaipol naga'mo'za, Kagrama eri fore nehana avame'zana kageho.
Na'ankure mago'mo'a oku'a mago'zana osugahie. Vahe'mo'ma amate antahino keno haniema hanunka, avamezama maka mopafi vahete Kagraka'a kzeri ama hunka huge'za kageho, hu'za hu'naze.
Na'ankure Agri afu'agnahe'za anazanke hu'za, Agritera zamentinti osu'naze.
Anazanku Jisasi'a zamagrira zamasmino, Nagri knamo'a kofta osu'ne, hagi tamagra amne vano hugahaze.
Mopafi vahe'mo'za tmagrikura zamarimpa aheormantegahaze. Hagi Nagrira zamarimpa ahenantegahaze, na'ankure Nagrama huama hu'na avu'ava tmimo'a haviza hu'ne, huazanteku ana nehaze.
Tamagra'tmi ana muse nezantera mreriho, Nagra ana muse nezantera ovugosue, na'ankure Nagri knamo'a eohnati'ne.
Ama ana nanekema zamasmiteno, Galili kaziga mani'ne.
Hianagi Agri afu'agnahe'za ana muse ne'zantera mareritazageno, anante Agraku anazanke huno zamage'a mrerino, oku'a vu'ne.
Ana hige'za Jiu kva vahe'mo'za Agriku ana muse ne'za neknare nehakre'za anage hu'naze. Inantega Jisasi'a mani'nesie? hu'za hu'naze.
Jisasinku ana vahe kevufinti sumi ke ohumi ahumi hu'za Agra knare Ne' mani'ne, nehzage'za ruga'amo'za huza a'o havi ne'kino, vahera zamavreno havi kante nevie hu'naze.
Anage hzanagi mago'mo'e huno eri amateno Agrikura osu'ne, Jiu kva vaheku kore hu'za ana osu'naze.
Hianagi muse ne'zante mani'nageno knamo'a amu'nompi egeno Jisasi'a ra mono nompi mrerino, ome agafa huno rempi huzami'ne.
Rempi hunezmige'za Jiu kva vahe'mo'za nentahi'za antri nehu'za, anage hu'naze. Inantegati ama ne'mo'a antahi'zana eri'nesnie, avonona osu'nea ne'mo'a?
Ana kemofo nona'a Jisasi'a amanage hu'ne, Nagrama rempima huneramuana, Nagri zana omne'ne, Nagri'ma hunantege'na e'nomofo Agri sune.
Aza'o agu'amo otinkeno Anumzamofo avesi'za huku hanimo'a, rempima nehuana agra antahino, Anumzamofonteti e'nefi, Nagrani'a navesite nehufi refko huno kegahie.
Agra'a agu'areti nehanimo'a, agra avufa erira hunaku nehie. Hagi huntenegeno e'nemofo agi erira nehimo, Agra tamage vahe mani'ne. Hagi mago kzaki zama'a Agripina omne'ne.
Mosese'a kasegea taminefi, ontami'negeta, mika'mota ana kasegea amagera nontazo? Tamagra nahigeta nahe frinakura nehaze?
Ana vahe kevumo'za ke nona'a asmi'naze, Kagri kagu'afina havi avamu mani'ne! Iza Kagrira kaheku higenka nehane?
Jisasi ke nona'a zamasmi'ne, Nagra magoke avame'za hu'noe, anazanku maka'mota antri hu'naze.
Ama ana agafare Mosese'a eit (8) zupa mofavre zamufa tga hiho hu'ne. Na'ankure Mosesena agripintira ome'ne. Hagi tmagri tamagehe'impinti e'ne, higetma mni fruhu kna zupa (sabat) vahe zamufa tga nehaze.
Mago ne'mo avufa mni fruhu kna zupa tga hanigetma, Mosese kasege ruhanontagie nehaze. Hagi tamagrira tmarimpa nehe, na'ankure Nagrama vahe'ma mni fruhu knazupa avufa eri so'e hunte'noa zamo tmasia nevzio?
Amega zamufarera vahera refko hutma keaga (kotim) huozmanteho. Hagi fatgo avu'avate refko huta nanekea huzmanteho.
Anage hige'za mago'a Jerusale kumate vahe'mo'za amanage hu'naze, Ama'na Nera aheku'ma nehakraza nepi?
Keho, Agra amate kevumokizmi zamufi naneke nehiana nahige'za kea nosaze? Kva vahe'mo'za Agrama Kraisi mani'negura, antahi'nafi?
Ana hu'neanagi, tagra antahi'none igati ama nera e'neo, hianagi ina knarema Kraisi'ma esiana, mago ne'mo'a Agra igati e'neo ontahigahie.
E'i anage nehzageno Jisasi'a ra mono kumapinti (tempol) kezatino rempi hunezmino anage hu'ne, Tamagra, Nagri ene, inantegati Nagra e'noe tarezana hago antahita, ke'naze. Hagi Nagra navesitera ome'noe, hianagi aza'o hunantege'na e'nomo, Agrake tamage nere, tamagra ana nera onke'naze.
Nagra, Anumzamofona ke'na antahi'noe, na'ankure Nagra, Agritegati Agra hunantege'na e'noe.
Anage hige'za Jisasi'na azerinaku hu'nazanagi, mago'mo'a aze'orine, na'ankure Agri kna zahufa ome'ne.
Hianagi ana vahe kevufinti hakaremo'za, Agrite zamentinti nehu'za anage hu'naze, Mesaia'ma esuno'a, Agra hakare'a avame'zama ama ne'moma nehia zana agtereno hugahifi ana osugahie?
Atru hu'naza vahe'mo'za Jisasinku sumi ke hugantu hugma nehzage'za, Farisi vahe'mo'za nentahi'za, vugote'naza mono kva (Pris) vahe'mo'zane Farisi vahe'mo'za, Jisasi azerihogu ra mono nonte kegva hu'naza vahe (tempol gats) huzmantage'za vu'naze.
Anazanku Jisasi zamasmi'ne, osi'a kna tamagra ne manite'na, ete Agrama hunantege'na e'noa Netega Nagra vugahue.
Tamagra, Nagrikura hakre gahazanagi, Nagria nagefore osugahaze. Hagi Nagrama umani'surega tamagra ovugahaze.
Jiu kva vahe'mo'za zamagra zamagra ke hugantu hugma nehu'za anage hu'naze, Inantega Agra vnigeta Agrira onkeku hunkeno nehie? Agra tatreno Jiu vahe'mo'za Griki umani'naza vahe ene, Griki vahe rempi huzamiku Jisasi'a nehio?
Ina knahu ke Agra huno, Tamagra, Nagrikura hakre'gahazanagi, Nagria nage fore osugahaze, hagi Nagrama mani'nesurega tamagra vuga osu'naze huno nehie?
Ne'za nene'za musenkase nehzageno, vgare kna zupa ran knagino, Jisasi otino kezatino anage hu'ne, Tinku avesinimofona, atrenkeno Nagrite eno eme neno.
Anumzamofo avontafepi kre'nere, Aza'o, Nagrite amentinti nehnimo'a negahie, Agri agu'afinti manivava timo hageno evugahie. (Aisa 58:11)
Hianagi Agrama amanahu kema hu'neana Ruotge Avamuku hu'ne, Agrite zamentinti hanamo'za erisagu hu'ne, na'ankure Jisasi'a ra agi e'orineno, Ruotge Avamura eoraminegeno hu'ne.
Ana kema mago'a vahemo'za nentahi'za, amanage hu'naze, Ama'i tamage huno Kasnampa ne' mani'ne hu'za hu'naze.
Ruga'amo'za anage hu'naze, Ama'i Kraisi'e nehzageno, ruga'amo'za hu'za, Galili kzigatira tamage Kraisi'a omesnifigure?
Anumzamofo avontafe'mo huno, Deviti nagapinti Betrehemia Kraisi'a fore hugahie. Deviti mani'neno hu'nea kumateku osu'nazo? (Sam-Zga 89:3-4, Maik 5:2)
Ana vahe kevufinti Agriku hu'za antahi'za zamifi refko hu'naze,
Mago'amo'za Jisasina azerinaku hu'nazanagi, mago'mo'e huno aze'orine.
Anante ra mono nonte kva vahe'mo'za azage'za, vugota pris kva vahe'ene Farisi vahe'mo'za anage hu'naze, nahigetma Jisasina avretma ome'naze?
Ana ra mono nonte kva vahe'mo'za kenona'a hu'za, Mago ne'mo'a kora higeta ontahi'nona naneke, ama ne'mo'a nehie.
Farisi vahe'mo'za kenona'zmirera amanage hu'za zamantahige'naze. Tamagri'enena anazanke huno havi kante tmareno nevifi?
Mago ran kva vahe'motafi, Farisi vahe'mota, Jisasintera tamentintia nehumpi nosu'ne?
Hianagi ama vahe kevua, kasegema ontahi'nagu havizamofo agu'afi mani'naze.
Nikodimasi'ma kenagepi Jisasinte vu'nea kva ne'mo, amu'no zamifi mani'nereti amanage huno zamasmi'ne.
Tagri kase kemo'a mago nera refko huno kegaga hunonteanki, pusante agripinti na'a hu'nesie kea eriteno, tamagefi havige huteno keaga huntegahie. (Diu-Kas 17:6)
Zamagra kenona'a asmi'naze, Kagra anazanke hunka Galili kazigati e'nampi? Anumzamofo avon tafepi hamprinka ko, mago kasnampa (profet) nera Galilia fore osugahie, hu'za Nikodimasi asmi'naze.
[Ana nanekema hute'za, mago mago'mo noma'arega vuno eno hu'ne.
Hianagi Jisasi'a Olivi Agonare vu'ne.
Nanterame otino Agra ra mono kumapi eteno ege'za, maka vahe'mo'za Agrite ageno, Agra tamumnino agafa huno rempi huzami'ne.
Kasegere ugagota hu'naza vahe'mo'zane, Farisi vahe'mo'za ru vene monko'za hu'nea a' avare'za, ana nomofo amu'nompi eme azeri oti'za,
zamagra anage hu'za Jisasina asmi'naze, Hurami ne'moka, ama a'mo'a monko'za nehigeta keta eri fore hu'none.
Mosese kasegemo'a huramino, monko'za hu'nesia a'nea, have knonu ahe friho hu'ne. Hagi Kagra na'ane hunka hugahane?
Zamagra anagema hu'nazana Jisasi revatga hu'za naneke huntenaku, kema huntesaza agafa'a keza eri fore hunaku hu'naze. Hianagi Jisasi kepri huno azankonu mopare avon kre'ne.
Hianagi zamagra kazigzi hu'za antahi'negageno, Jisasi otino amanage huno zamagrira zamasmi'ne, aza'o amu'nontamifi'ma kumi'a omne'nenimo, pusantera havea erino aheno.
Ete pri huno mago'ane azankonu mopare avon kre'ne.
Ana naneke zamagra nentahi'za, esera ranra vahe atirami'za nevzageno, ana amage'a magoke magoke'mo'za atirami'za vutere hu'za vuhna hzageno, Jisasi'ene ana a' ene znagrake anampina mani'na'e.
Jisasi'a otino anage huno ana ara asmi'ne, kaheku'ma haza vahera iga vaze? Magora iza ke naneke hugantegahie?
Ana a'mo anage hu'ne, Ramoka mago'mo nanekea hunonante, anante Jisasi'a huno nagranena nanekea huogantegahue. Kagra nevunka, menintetira agafa hunka mago'ene kumira osuo.]
Anante Jisasi'a mago'ene anage huno zamasmi'ne, Nagra'ni'a ama mopamofo Msa mani'noe, aza'o namge'ma esimo'a hanimpina vano osugahie. Hianagi asimu eri Msa erigahie.
Nehigeno Farisi vahe'mo'za anage hu'za asmi'naze, Kagrama kema nehanana, Kagra kagenke huama nehane, Kagrama huama nehanana tamagea nosane.
Jisasi'a anankemofo nona'a amanage huno zamasmi'ne, e'ima Nagrama ke huama Nagragu'ma nehuana, Nagri nanekemo'a tamage, na'ankure Nagra igati e'na, ete'na iga vugahuo, Nagra antahi'noe, hianagi Nagra igati e'na, iga Nagra vugahuo tamagra ontahi'naze.
Amega zamuzmate tamagra vahera refko nehaze, Nagra mago vahera menina refko nosue.
Hianagi Nagrama mago'mofo refko huntegahue hanuana, Nagrama troma hanua antahi'zamo'a fatgo hugahie, na'ankure Nagrakera refko nosue, hianagi Nagrane hunantege'na e'noa Nenfa ene refko nehu'e.
Tamagri kasegefina anage huno krente'ne, tare vahe tremoke ke'ne'na'a zankuma (witnes) hana'ana tamage. (Diu-Kas 17:6, 19:15)
Nagra tamage ke huama Nagrani'agu nehugeno, hunantegena e'noa Nenfa'a Nagriku tamage huno huama nehie.
Zamagra amanage hu'za asmi'naze, Negfa'a iga mani'ne? Jisasi'a kenona'a zamasmi'ne, Nagri'ma onage nesnutma Nenfana antahita keta osugahaze, hagi tamagra ma Nagri'ma nage'anke resuta, anahu kna hutma Nenfana kegahaze.
Ama nanekema hu'neana ra mono nompi zgoma nentazare mani'neno, Jisasi'a rempi hunezmige'za mago'mo'a aze'ori'ne, na'ankure Agri kna'a ome'ne.
Anante ete mago'ene anage huno zamasmi'ne, Nagra tmatre'na vnugeta Nagrikura hakregahaze, tamagra kumi tmifi frigahaze, Nagrama vnurega tamagra ovugosaze.
Jiu kva vahe'mo'za anage hu'naze, agrazante ahe fri'naku nehifi, Agra huno Nagrama vanurega, tamagra ovugahaze hunoma nehiana?
Jisasi anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamagra amafinti vahe mani'naze, Nagra anagamutire, tamagra ama mopafi vahe mani'naze, Nagra ama mopafi vahera omni'noe.
E'ina hu'negu, kumi'tamifi tamagra frigahaze hu'na Nagra neramasmue, na'ankure tamagra ma ama kema nehia Nera ama'ne, hutma tamentintima osnazana, tamagra kumi tamifi frigahaze. (Ekso-Uti 3:14, Jon 8:28, 8:58, 13:19, 18:5-8)
Zamagra anage hu'za Jisasina asmi'naze, Kagra izage? Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, na'ane hu'na ese agafarera Nagra tmasami'noe?
Nagra rama'a zanku keaga nehu'na tamagrira refko hurmante'naku nehue. Hianagi hunantege'na e'nomo'a tamage Nere, Agripinti antahi'noa ke, Nagra ama mopafi vahera nezmasmue.
Nefanku Agra nehige'za zamagra antahi ama osu'naze.
Jisasi'a anage hu'ne, tamagrama Vahe'mofo Mofavrema azeri sgama hanutma, tamagra antahi ankeretma Agra ama ana Nere hugahaze, Nagra'ni'a nagesafintira nosuanki, Nenfa'ma rempi hunami'nea ke'age nehue.
Anumzamo hunantege'na e'nomo, Nagrane nemnie, Agra natrege'na Nagrakera nomanue. Na'ankure Nagrama, Agri avesizama huvava huazankura, Agra muse nehie.
Anagema nehige'za rama'a vahe'mo'za Agrite zamentinti hu'naze.
Jisasi'a, Jiu vahe zamentinti hu'namokizmia amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Nanekeni'a miko knama erizafa huvava hanuta, tamagra Nagri namage ante disaipol naga manigahaze.
Ana nehutma tamagra tamage naneke antahisnageno, ana tamage nanekemo katufe tmantegahie.
Zamagra kenona'a anage hu'naze, tagra Abrahamu agehete, magore huta mago netera kazokzo eri'zana e'ori'none, Kagra nahigenka katufe tmantesageta amne vugahaze hunka nehane?
Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamagerafa hu'na tamagrira nermasmue, maka kumi'ma nehza vahe'mo'za kumi'mofo kazokzo vahe mani'naze.
Kazokzo vahe'mo'a nompina manivava nosie, hanki mofavremoke nompina manivava nehie.
E'inahigu Nemofo'ma katufe tmantena knare hutma mani so'e hugahaze.
Nagra antahi'noe, tamagra Abrahamu ageheta mani'nazanagi' Nagri nahe frinaku kanku nehakaze, na'ankure Nagri nanekemo'a tamagri tamagu'afina omne'ne.
Nagrama kema nehuana, Nenfa'ene mani'nena ke'noa zanku neramasmue, tamagrama nehazana neramafampinti'ma antahinazaza nehaze.
Zamagra kenona'a Jisasina anage hu'za asmi'naze, Abrahamu'a tagri nerfa'e, Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, a'o, tamagra ma Abrahamu mofavrema mani'nenutma Abrahamu hu'nesia avu'ava hugahaze.
Nagra tamage naneke Anumza'mofompinti antahi'noa ke neramasmue, hianagi Nagrira nahe'za nehaze. Abrahamu'a e'inahura osu'neaza tamagra hunaku nehaze.
Tamagra neramafa avesiza nehaze. Zamagra kenona'a anage hu'naze, tagra savri avu'avatetira fore osu'none, tagrira magoke Nerfa, Anumzana Agrake mani'ne.
Jisasi'a anage huno zamagrira zamasmi'ne, Anumzamo'ma tmagri nerfa'ma mani'neasiana, tamagra Nagrira navesi nantasine, na'ankure Nagra efore hu'noana, Anumzamo hunantege'na e'noe. Nagrani'a navesitera ome'noe, hagi Anumzamo hunantege'na e'noe.
Nahigeta kema hua nanekea antahi amara nosaze? Na'ankure Nagrama hua nanekea antahi ama nosazagu, ana nehaze.
Tamagra Sata mofavre naga mani'naze, ana hunetma nermafa'ma avenesia avu'avaza nehaze. Ese agafare vahe ahe fri'nea ne' mani'neno, tamage nanekemofona amage nonte. Na'ankure tamage kea agripina omne'ne. Kema hifina, havigege nehie, agra avu'ava zanku kea nehie. Na'ankure havige ne' mani'neno, havigemofo nefa'e.
Hianagi na'ankure Nagra tamage nehugetma, tamagra nanekeni'arera tamentintia nosaze.
Amama, mani'nafitira izaga Nagrikura kumi hu'ne hunka nanekea hunantegahane? Nagrama tamage nehusugetma, nahnigetma tamentintia osugahaze?
Aza'o Anumzamofo naga mani'nenimo'a, Anumzamofo naneke nentahie, ama'na agafare tamagra nontahize. Na'ankure tamagra Anumzamofo nagara omni'naze.
Jiu vahe'mo'za anage hu'za kenona'a asmi'naze, hufatgo huta negasmune, Kagra Sameria vahe mani'nankeno hankromo kagu'afi fre'nefi?
Jisasi'a anage huno kenona hu'ne, Nagrira nagu'afina hankrora omni'ne, hianagi Nagra Nenfa ra agi nemugetma, tamagra Nagrira nazeri fenka nenatra'ze.
Nagra ra nagi erinakura nosuanki, Anumzamo Nagri nagi'a eri ra nehuno, naneketi refko hurantegahie.
Tamagerfa hu'na neramasmue, Keni'a nentahimo'a, agra ofrigahie.
Jiu vahe'mo'za Jisasinku anage hu'za asami'naze, menina tagra antahi'none, hankromo kagu'afi mani'ne. Abrahamu'a fri'negeno, kasnampa vahe'mo'zanena anazanke hu'za fri'nazagenka, Kagra anage nehane, iza'o nanekeni'a avariri simo'a, agra ofrigahie hunka nehane.
Abrahamu nerfa'a ko fri'neanki, Kagra agtere'nano? Kasnampa vahera ko fri'nazanki! Kagra kagesa antahinana aza'ne hunka nehane?
Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmine, Nagra nagi erira hanuana, ana Nagimo'a amnezasegahie. Hianagi Nenfa'a Nagri nagi erira nehigeta, Agrikura tamagra hutma, Agra, tagri Anumzane nehaze.
Tamagra Agrira antahinomize, hianagi Nagra antahi'na ke'na Agrira hu'noe, hankina Nagrama hu'na, Agrira antahi'na kena osu'noe hanuana, havige hu'na tmagrikna hugahue, hianagi Nagra Anumzamofona antahina kena hu'nena, ke'a erizafa nehue.
Neramafa Abrahamu'a Nagri kna kenaku muse nehuno, keteno tusi'a muse hu'ne.
Jiu vahe'mo'za Jisasinku anage hu'naze, Kagra 50'a kafuzge osu'nane, Kagra Abrahamuna ke'nano?
Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamagerafa hu'na neramasmue, korapa Abrahamuna kse onte'nage'na, Nagra mani'noane.
E'inagema hiazanku have eri'za mate vuza ahe'za hu'naze. Hianagi Jisasi'a ra mono nompinti (tempol) oku'a atiramino fegi'a vu'ne.
Anama Jisasi'a vugatereno nevuno, mago nera reranku'afinti avu asuhu'nea ne' ksente'nea omege'ne.
Agri amage nentaza disaipol nagamo'za antahige'za, Hurami ne'moka (Rabbai) aza kumira hu'negeno ama avu asuhu nera ksente'ne, agra'afi nererapi nefa'e?
Jisasi'a amanage huno kenona hu'ne, ama ne'mo kumira osigeno, nerera nefa kumira osu'ne. Hu'neanagi e'i zama fore hu'neana Anumzamofo eri'zamo agripinti eriama hanigu e'inahu hu'ne.
Hunantege'na e'noa ne'mofo eri'zana, tagra zgema me'nesire Agri eri'zana erisune. Hanima esigeno'a mago vahemo'a erizana e'origahie.
Nagrama ama mopafima emani'noana, Nagra ama mopafi vahe'mofo Tvire.
Anage Agra huteno, mopare avetu heno eri igri huno, higogna huteno, ana mopa tarega avure frenenteno,
amanage huno asmi'ne, Vunka Silomu tirupi ti omefro. (Silomue hu'nea kemofo agafa'a, huntegeno vu'ne hu'ne.) Ana hutegeno vuno ti ome freteno, avurga hari higeno mika'zana negeno e'ne.
E'ina hige'za, ana ne'mofo tvaonte nemni'za vahe'mo'zane, ana ne'mo keza netige'za negaza vahe'mo'zanena amanage hu'naze, Ama ne'mo mani'neno kezatino meme nehigeta negona nepi ru nere?
Mago'amo'za anage hu'naze, ama ana nere nehazageno, mago'amo'za hanaveti'za anage hu'naze, a'o agra ana ne' kna'nehie. Ana ne'mo huno, nagra ana ne' mani'noe, huno zamasmi'ne!
Zamagra anage hu'za antahige'naze, Inankna hankeno kavurga erihari hugante'ne? hu'za agenoka hu'naze.
Agra ana ke'nona anage hu'ne, mago ne'ma Jisasi'e nehaza ne'mo, mopa erino tinuti eri igri huteno navurgare frenanteno, amanage huno nasmi'ne, Siloamu vunka tirupi omefro hige'na, vu'na tina ome frogeno, navu rgamo'a hari hige'na navua ke'noe.
Zamagra ana ne'ku anage hu'naze, kvuma eri so'e hu'nea nera inantega mani'ne? Hzageno avuma azeri harima hunte'nea ne'mo'a, nagra onke'noe hu'ne.
Anama avu asu hu'negeno azeri hari hu'nea nera, avare'za Farisi vahete vu'naze.
Anankna mni fruhu kna (sabat) zupa Jisasi'a hapara erino avurga erihari hu'negeze.
Anante Farisi vahe'mo'za mago'ene antahige'za, nankna hankeno kavumo'a hari hu'ne hzageno, ana avuma eri so'e hunte'nea ne'mo anage huno zamasmi'ne, Agra hapa erino navure frenantege'na, ti ome frogeno navumo'a hari hige'na ke'noe.
E'ina hu'negu mago'a Farisi vahe'mo'za anage hu'naze, e'i ana nera Anumzamo'a huntegeno ome'ne, na'ankure mni fruhu kna ana ne'mo kegva nosie. Hianagi mago'amo'za anage hu'naze, inankna huno kumi ne'mo'a amanahu kaguvazana erifore hugahie? Anage nehu'za keha're'za amu'nompinti vahera refko hu'naze.
Ana hute'za mago'ene avuma asu hu'negenoma, eriso'e hu'nea nera antahige'za, na'ane hunka kavurgama eriso'e hu'nea nekura nehane? Ana ne'mo huno, Agra kasnampa nere.
Jiu kva vahe'mo'za, avurga asu osu'nea neku nehaze, nehu'za zamentinti osu'za, ana ne'mofo nererane nefane znagi hu'naze.
Zamagra nererane, nefane znantahige'naze, ama'i mofavrea avu asuhu'negeta ksente'na'o? Hanki inankna huno menina avua nege?
Nererake, nefake kenona'a anage hu'na'e, Tagra antahi'no'e, ama tagri mofavre, avu asu hu'nea ksente'no'e.
Hianagi tagra antahita keta osu'none, menima avuma negea'zane, aza avua eri so'e hunte'neo ontahi'no'e. Agra ra vahe mani'neanki, antahigenkeno agra tmasmino.
Nererake nefakea amanahu kema hu'na'ana, na'ankure Jiu mono kva vaheku koro huke anage hu'na'e. Na'ankure Jiu mono kva vahe'mo'za ke retro hu'za, mago'mo Jisasinku Kraisi'e huno, huama hanimofona, Jiu mono nompinti (Sinagog) ahe natigahune, hu'naze.
Ana ke agafare nererake nefakea huke, agra ra vaheki agri antahigeho hu'na'e.
Ete mago'ene, ko'ma avu asuhu'nea ne' agi hu'za asmi'naze, Anumzamofo avure tamage hunka huo, kavu eri hari hu'nea nera, kumi ne' mani'negeta tagra antahi'none.
Ana ne'mo anage hu'ne, nagra ontahi'noe Agra kumi ne' mani'neo, magoke'zama nagra antahi'noana, navua asu hu'neane, hagi menina navu negoe.
Anante Farisi vahe'mo'za asmi'za, Jisasi'a nankna'za kagrira hugante'ne? Inankna huno Agra kavurga erihari hu'ne?
Avuma eriharima huntenea ne'mo anage hu'ne, nagra ko tmasmi'noanagi ontahi'nazo. Nahigetma ru'ene antahinakura nehaze? Tamagra nena Agri amage'ante disaipol naga maninaku nehazafi?
Zamagra ana kemofo nona'a knara kefinti fra vazinte'za, kagra Agri amage nentana disaipol ne' mani'nananki, tagra Mosese amage nentona vahe mani'none!
Anumzamo Mosesena kea humigeta tagra antahi'none, hianagi ama'i nera igati e'neo, tagra ontahi'none.
Ana ne'mo anage huno zamasmi'ne, ama ruzahu'zama hu'nea nera, Agra igati eno, navurga erihari hige'na ke'noe, tamagra ontahi'naze!
Tagra antahi'none, kumi vahera Anumzamo'a antahi'nomie, hianagi iza'o mono hunenteno Agri amage' ante fatgohani'mofona, Anumzamo antahiamigahie.
Mona mopa fore hu'nea knareti, avu asu hu'nea vahera mago ne'mo'e huno avurga eri hari hie kea ontahi'none.
Ama ne'ma Anumzamofontegatima ome'nesuno'a, Agra mago'zana osugahie.
Farisi vahe'mo'za anage hu'naze, Kagrira miko kumi'zampi ksegante negenka, tagri rempi hurami'za nehano? Anage nehu'za Jiu mono nompintira (Sinagog) avazu hu'za, atufe atrageno vu'ne.
Ana ne'ma avazuhu megi atraze kea Jisasi'a nentahino, ome kefore huno Agra amanage hu'ne, Kagra Vahe'mofo Mofavrere kmentinti nehano?
Ana ne'mo anage hu'ne, Agra iza'e ramoka, nagrama Agrite namentinti'ma hanuana?
Jisasi'a anage huno asmi'ne, kagra Agrira negane, e'i ana ne'mo kagri'enena keaga nehie.
Avuma eri hari hu'nea ne'mo anage hu'ne, Ranimoka nagra namentinti hue, nehuno anante mono hunte'ne.
Jisasi'a amanage hu'ne, Vahe refko hunaku ama mopafina ermi'noe, e'ina hanugeno zamuma nonke'samo'za kesageno, zamuma negesa'mokizmi zamumo'a asu hugahie.
Mago'a Farisi vahe Agrane anante mani'namo'za, ana naneke nentahi'za anage hu'za Jisasina antahige'naze, Tagri tavumo'enena asu hu'nefi?
Jisasi'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamavurgamo asu hu'neasina kumi'tmia omne sine, hianagi tamagra huta tavua negone nehzagu, kumi'mo'a tmagripina megahie.
Nagra tamagerafa hu'na neramasmue, iza'o sipisipi keginamofo kafanteti agu'afi uofreno, ruganteti tka'uresimo'a, kumzafa ne'kino, vahe'za avazu hugahie.
Hianagi iza'o kahantegati ufresimo'a sipisipi kva fatgo mani'ne.
Kafante kva ne'mo agrira kafana anagintegeno, sipisipimo'za agri ageru nentahize. Ana afu kva ne'mo Agri'a sipisipimokizmi zamagi neheno, zamavreno vugota nehie.
Agrama afu'zga'ama zamavre atru huteno, vugoteno nevige'za, amage' avriri'za nevze. Na'ankure zamagra agerura antahi ani' nehu'za amage vu'naze.
Onke'nesaza nera, tamage hu'za zamagra amagera ovugahaze. Hagi atre'za fregahaze, na'ankure zamagra ontahi'nesaza agerutera kore hugahaze.
Jisasi'a fronka kefinti zamasmi'neanagi, zamagra nankna kema Agrama zamasmiana, ana kemofo agafa'a zmagra antahi ama osu'naze.
Ana hzageno Jisasi'a mago'ene zamasmino, Tmagerfa hu'na tmagrikura nehue, Sipisipimokizmi kafana Nagra'ni'a mani'noe.
Ko'ma egote'za e'naza vahe'mo'za, kumza vahekiza, vahe'za avazu hugahaze. Hianagi sipisipimo'za zamagerura ontahigahaze.
Nagra'ni'a kafana mani'noe, iza'o Nagri'teti efresimo'a knare huno mani'neno, efreno atiramino nehuno knare tra'zankura hakregahie.
Hanki kumzafa vahe'ma esuno'a, kumzafa seno, ahe nefrino, eri haviza hunaku egahie. Nagrama e'noana zamagra zamasimu e'neri'za, ana asimu eri avitetfa hanazegu e'noe.
Nagra'ni'a knare sipisipi kva ne' mani'noe, Knare sipisipi kva vahe'mo'a Agra'a sipisipireku huno asimura atregahie.
Zgo erinakuma avrema antesigeno erizama erisia ne'mo'a, sipisipi kva omnino sipisipi nefa'a omni'neankino, kesigeno afi krama esigeno'a, sipisipia atreno fresigeno, afi' kramo (wulf) zamagene reno zamahe panani hugahie.
Na'ankure agrira zgo erizante avrente'nazankino sipisipigura agesa ontahino, agra zamatreno fregahie.
Nagra'ni'a knare sipisipi kva mani'noe, Nagra sipisipi nagani'a ke'na antahi'na huge'za, zamagra Nagrira nage'za nantahi'za hu'naze.
Ana hu'negu Nenfa'a, Nagrira nageno nantahino nehige'na, Nagranena Nenfana age'na antahi'na hu'noe, Nagra nasimura sipisipimokizmire atregahue.
Ruga'a sipisipini'a ama kegina agu'afina omni'naze, Nagra anahu kna hu'na zamaresuge'za, nagerura nentahi'za, zamagra magoke afu kevu hu'za mani'nageno, magoke afu kva vahe manigahie.
Ama'na agafare Nenfa'a avesi'nenante, na'ankure Nagra nasimura atretena, hagi ete nasimura erigahue.
Mago'mo'a nasimura Nagripintira eriotre'gahie, hianagi Nagra'ni'a navesite antregahue. Nagrira hanaveni'a me'neankina antete'na, Nagripi hanavea me'neankina ete nasimura erigahue. Ama'na kea Nenfa nasamino huo hu'neankina hugahue.
Na'ankure anagema hiazanku, Jiu vahe'mo'za zamagra'zmi mago'ene tarefi refko hu'naze.
Rama'amo'za hu'za, kefo hankro'mo agu'a fre'negeno negi neneanki, nahigetma naneke'a nentahi'ze?
Mago'amo'za anage hu'naze, hankro'mo agu'afi fre'nea vahe nanekea omne'ne. Hankromo'a avu asuhu vahera erihari hanigeno kegahifi, onkegahie?
Anante mono noma renagi'za Anumzamofo ami'naza ne'zane kna Jerusale kumate fore hu'ne.
Zasi ko atu knafi, Ra mono kumapi Jisasi'a, Solomon agire asamare'naza no kinte'nafi vano hu'ne.
Jiu kva vahe'mo'za Jisasina eme regagi'za, anage hu'za asmi'naze, nama'a kna kagra tazeri antesanketa kvega antegahune? Kagra Kraisiga mani'nenunka huama hunka amne tasmio.
Jisasi'a kenona zamire anage huno zamasmi'ne, Nagra ko tamasmi'nogetma, tamagra tamentinti nosaze, mika eri'zama Nenfa agifima enerua eri'zamo, Nagri nazeri ama nehie.
Hianagi tamagra tamentintia nosaze, na'ankure Nagri sipisipia tamagra omni'naze.
Nagri sipisipimo'za nagerura nentahize, hige'na Nagra zamantahi'noge'za, Nagrira namage neaze,
Nagra, mani'vava zamasimura nezmue. Hagi zamagra fanene osugahaze. Mago ne'mo'a nazampintira ohanaregahie.
Nenfa'ma ana vahe nami'nemo, maka zampina ra hu'neankino, mago'moe huno Nenfa azampintira ohanaregahie.
Nenfa'ene, Nagranena magoke mani'no'e.
Huno nehige'za Jiu kva vahe'mo'za ahe frinaku ru'ene havekno eri'naze.
Jisasi amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Nenfantegati knare eri'zana hakare'a hurmeri'noanki, ama anampintira ina erizanteku hutma have knonura naheku nehaze?
Jiu kva vahe'mo'za ke nona'a anage hu'naze, knare eri'zama eri'nana zantera tagra have knonura onkahe'gosune, hianagi Anumzana huhaviza nehunka, kagra amne vahe'moka, Anumza mani'noema hanazanku kaheku nehune.
Jisasi'a kenona'a zamasmi'ne, tamagri kasegefina na'ane huno korapara krente'ne, Anumzamo'a huno, tamagra tmia anumza mani'naze hu'ne? (Sam-Zga 82:35)
E'ina higu Anumzamofo nanekemo'a zamagrite e'nea nagaku huno, anumza tmine hanuno'a, (Anumzamofo avontafepi krente'naza kemo'a fuotgigahie).
Nenfa'a nazeri ruotge huteno, hunantege'na ama mopafi e'nogu, tamagra Anumzamofo huhaviza hunentane huta Nagrikura nehaze, na'ankure Nagra hu'na Anumzamofo mofavre huazankuro?
Nagrama Nenfa eri'zama e'norisuana, tamagra Nagritera tamentintia osiho.
Hianagi Nagra eri'zama'a e'nerugetagi, tamagra tamentintia Nagrikura nosaze, eri'zama eruazante negetma tamentinti hiho, e'inama hanuta keta antahita hanazana, Nagra Nenfampi manugeno, Nenfa'a Nagripi mani'ne hugahaze.
Mago'ene azerinaku nehzageno, zamatreno rufanene hu'ne.
Jisasi'a eteno Jodani ti takaheno Joni mono ti ese'ma frezmante'nea kaziga vuno, anantega umani'ne.
Hakare vahe'mo'za mani'nerega uhnati'za amanage hu'naze, Joni'a mago avame'za osu'ne, ana hu'neanagi Joni'ma ama ne'ku'ma maka kema hu'neana tamage hu'ne.
Ana hige'za, anante rama'a vahe'mo'za Jisasinte zamentinti hu'naze.
Mago nera Lasarusi'e nehza ne'mo kri eri'ne. Agra Betanitire, Maria ene nenunkna Matake nemni'a kumate nere.
Maria Ramofo mananentake masavenu agare frenteteno, anu azokateti ana aga eri ho'mu hu'nea a'mofo nesaro kria eri'ne.
Ana nanunkna'moke Jisasintega kea atrenteke, anage hu'na'e, Ramoka antahio, Kagrama avesima nentamo'a kri eri'ne.
Higeno Jisasi'a ana ke nentahino, anage hu'ne, Ana krimo'a fri kantera avreno ovugahie, na'ankure Anumzamofo ra agi ami'nigeno, ana zantetira Anumzamofo Mofavremo ra agi erigahie.
Jisasi'a Matane nenunknane, Lasarusine avesizamante'ne.
Lasarusi kri eri'ne nanekema hzageno nentahino'a, tare zge'gna anama mani'nea kumate mani'ne.
Ana huteno amage'nentaza disaipol nagaku huno, Judia kaziga ete vanu'ne huno zamasmi'ne.
Amage' nentaza disaipol nagamo'za anage hu'za asmi'naze, Hurami ne'moke (Rabbi), Jiu kva vahe'mo'za mensitfama have knonu kahenaku nehzarega, Kagra ete vu'za nehano?
Jisasi'a kenona zamire anage hu'ne, 12fu'a kna (aua) mago zgefina omne'nefi? Mago vahe'mo'ma zge ferupima vanuno'a agra traka osugahie, na'ankure ama mopafi msa agra nege.
Hu'neanagi mago'mo hanimpima vanuno'a ome traka hugahie, na'ankure msa agripina omne'ne.
Anagema huteno, mago'ene Jisasi'a anage hu'ne, ronetimo Lasarusi'a avu mse'ne, hianagi menina Nagra ome azeri otigahue.
Amage nentaza disaipol nagamo'za anage hu'naze, Ramoka, agra avu'ma mse'nesuno'a, knare hugahie.
Jisasi'ma hu'neana, Lasarus ko fri'nea zanku hu'neanagi, zamagrama antahizana amne avu mse'zanku nehie hu'za antahi'naze.
Jisasi'a anante huama huno zamasmi'ne, Lasarusi'a ko fri'ne,
Tamagri tamaza hanigu Nagra muse nehu'na, ana kumatera omni'noe, e'ina hanigeta tamagra tamentinti hugahaze. Hianagi erinketa agritega vamneno.
E'ina hianagi Tomasi (Didimasi'e hu'neana kugavezare) nehaza ne'mo, magoka Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol nagaku huno, tagranena erinketa vuta Agrane ufri'maneno hu'ne.
Jisasi ana kumate uhnatino, ome antahiana Lasarusina ko kerifi asentageno, 4'a zgegna evu'ne.
Betani kumara Jerusale tva'onte 3 kilo mitanaza me'ne.
Rama'a Jiu vahe'mo'za e'za Matane Maria kiznia, neznasaro fri'negeza e'za zname rentinti hu'naze.
Jisasi ne-e hia kema Matama nentahino, kantega ome kenaku vu'ne. Hianagi Maria'a nompi mani'ne.
Mata'a, Jisasina ome keno anage huno asmi'ne, Ramoka, Kagrama amafima mani'nantesina, nensaro Lasarusi'a ofrisine.
Hianagi meninena nagra antahi'noe, na'anku'ma Anumzamofo antahige'sankeno'a, Anumzamo'a anazana kmigahie.
Jisasi'a kenona huno asmi'ne, negsaro Lasarusi'a ete otino asimu erigahie.
Mata'a amanage huno Jisasina asmi'ne, nagra antahi'noe, henkama otisaza zupa vgare knarera, agra otino asimu erigahie.
Jisasi'a amanage huno Matana asmi'ne, Fripinti otino asimu erino mani'zamofo agafa'a Nagra mani'noe, iza'o Nagrite'ma amentinti hanimo'a, frigahianagi asimu erino manigahie.
Maka vahe'mo'za mani'neza Nagrite zamentinti hanazana, ofri'tfa hugahaze. Amama nehua kegura kagra kmentintia nehampi?
Mata'a anage huno asmi'ne, izo Ramoka, nagra namentinti hue, Kagra Kraisige, Anumzamofo mofavre'moka Kagra ama mopafi erami'nane.
Mata'a anage huteno, vuno nenunkna Mariana sumi huno agesafi asmi'ne, Hurami ne'mo ne-eno kagriku ke nehie, huno asmi'geno,
ana kema nentahino'a, ame' huno Jisasinte vu'ne.
Jisasi'a ana kumapina uofreno, kantega Matama omege'nere mani'negeno, Maria'a emege'ne.
Anante Jiu vahe'mo'za Maria'ene nompi ame rentinti hu'za mani'nareti, kageno'ma agra ame' huno otino megi'a vige'za, zamagra amage nevu'za, keri'are zvi ome ate'naku nevie hu'za antahi'naze.
E'ina higeno, Maria'a Jisasi mani'nere eno eme negeno, agiafi emaseno, anage huno asmi'ne, Ramoka Kagrama amafi mani'nantesina, nensaro Lasarusi'a ofrisine.
Jisasima kegeno zavi'ma netegeno'a, ana a'ene e'naza Jiu vahe'mo'zane zvi atageno, Jisasi'a nezmageno avamupina tusi'za huno rimpamo'a kna nehigeno,
Jisasi'a zamantahigeno, inantega ana nera asente'naze? Zamagra kenona hu'za Agrira asmi'naze, Ramoka enka emego.
Jisasi'a zvi' ate'ne.
Zamasuma ragiku'ma e'naza Jiu vahe'mo'za anage hu'naze, Keho agrira tusi'za huno avesinte'ne!
Hianagi mago'amo'za anage hu'naze, ama ne'mo avu suhu ne' eri hari hunte'neankino, Agra Lasarusina mago'a zana huntegeno ofrino manisimpi?
Anante Jisasi mago'ene, rimpamo'a kna nehigeno ana ne'mofo kerire uhanati'ne. Havega me'nege'za ufrekantera have eri'za runkani re'naze.
Jisasi'a hunoana have rezahe hutreho, higeno fri'nea ne'mofo nesaro Mata anage huno asmi'ne, Ramoka, menina kno hi'mana vugahie, na'ankure 4'a zgegna ko mani'ne.
Jisasi'a anage huno ana ara asmi'ne, Ko kasmi'noe, kagrama kmentinti hnunka Anumzamofo hankve'a (glori) kegahane hu'na kasmi'nofi?
Nentahi'za ana have rezahe hutre'naze. Anante Jisasi'a kesga hunagamuteno, anage hu'ne, Nenfaga, Nagra muse hugantoe, Kagra ke'nia antahi nami'nane.
Nagra antahi'noe, hakare zupa keni'a nentahine, hianagi kema nehuana ama oti'za mani'naza vaheku hu'na Nagra nehue, Kagra hunantake'na e'noe hu'za zamagra zamentinti hanagu nehue.
Jisasi'a anagema huteno'a, kezatino Lasarusiga, atiraminka eno!
Higeno fri'nea ne'mo atiramino e'ne, agiane, azanena, tavrave nofi'nu ana'neki'za, avugosa tavravenu anovazinageno Jisasi'a zamasmino, Tavarave'a vakneta eri atrenkeno vino.
E'ina hige'za, rama'a Jiu vahe Maria'ene e'namo'za, Jisasi'ma hiaza nege'za, Agrite zamentinti hu'naze.
Hianagi mago'amo'za vu'za Farisi mono vahete uhnati'za, Jisasi'ma hu'nea zamofo naneke ome zamasmi'naze.
E'ina higeno, vugota mono vahe'ene (Sanhedrin), Farisi vahe'mo'za magopi eme atru hu'za anage hu'naze, Na'a menina hugahune? Ama ne'mo'a rama'a kaguvaza nehie.
Atresnunkeno anazanke huno Agra vaniana, maka vahe'mo'za Agrite zamentinti hanageno, Romu vahe'mo'za e'za ra mono nontine, mopatinena tarega hanaregahaze.
Anante mago'zmimo, Kaiafasi ra mono kva (hai pris) ana kafufina mani'nea ne'mo, anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamagra mago'za antahintahitamifina nontahize.
Na'a hanigeno maka kumatine, mopatia eri havizana hugahie? Atrenkeno magoke'mo miko vahekura frisnie.
Kazafasi'a agra antahi'zampinti ama kea osu'ne, hianagi ana kafufina ran mono kva (hai pris) mani'neno, kasnampa ke huno Jisasima frino maka Jiu vahe zamaza hania zanku hu'ne,
Nehuno Jiu kuma vaheke Agra zamaza osugahie, e'inama hanuno'a hazagre'za vu'za e'za hu'naza vahera zamazeri mago hanige'za Anumzamofo mofavre manigahaze.
E'i ana knareti erigafa hu'za, Jisasi ahe frisaza ke retro hu'naze.
E'inama hazazanku Jisasi'a mago'ene Jiu vahe zamurera kana onte'ne. Hianagi atreno vuno mago ka'ma kokampi me'nea rankuma kaziga Efraimie nehazarega amage' nentaza naga'ane umani'naze.
Menina Anumzamo Jiu vahe kinafinti zamare'nea knare (Pasova) ne'za ne kna atupa nehige'za, rama'amo'za kuma'zmi atre'za Jerusale mreri'za, ne'za nesagu zamagrazmi zmazeri agru huza retro hu'naze.
Ana nehu'za ra mono nomofo (tempol) kumapi oti'za mani'neza Jisasinku nehakre'za, zamagra zamagra anage hunaze. Na'ane hutma tamage'sa nentahize? Agra ama (Pasova) nezantera egahifi, omegahie?
Vugota hu'naza prisi vahe'ene, Farisi vahe'mo'za, anage hu'za rama'a vahepi hu'naze, iza'o Jisasima kesimo'a, eme tasamisigeta tagra azerisune hu'naze.
Kinafinti Jiu vahe zamare'nea kna (Pasova) 6si'a zgegna atupa nehigeno, fri'nefinti azeri oti'nea ne' Lasarusi'ma nemnia kumate Jisasi'a Betani uhanati'ne.
Anante Jisasima hu'nea nezana retro hunte'naze. Mata'a ne'za netigeno Lasarusi'ene, mago'a vahe'ene kave'ne sipare mani'naze.
Trazamofo rafu'nareti tro hu'naza msavena, zgo'amo mreri'nea masaventafe Maria'a erino, Jisasina agiare tagino frenteteno, anu azokateti eri ho'mu huntegeno, ana nomofona mana'amo avite'ne.
Hianagi Judas Iskariot, mago amage nentea disaipol ne'mo, komoru huno Jisasina avreno ha' vahe zamazampi antesimo anage hu'ne,
na'a hanigeta ama msavena 3 hantreti'a silva zgorera atreta, zgo erita zamunte omne vahera zamaza osugahuno?
Menima Judas Iskariotima ama kema nehiana, na'ankure agra zamunte omne vahe zamaza hunaku nentahino nosie, hagi agra kumza nere. Zgo tafente kva nehia nekino, ome nentazana osi'a anampinkati musufa eritere nehia ne'mo anage higeno,
Jisasi'a anage hu'ne, Asenante'saza knagu avega ante'nea zanki, atrenkeno agra ana hino.
Na'ankure zamunte omne vahe'mo'za maka kna tamagra ne manigahaze, hianagi Nagra, tamagra nena maka kna omnigahue.
Maka Jiu vahe'mo'za antahizana Jisasi emani'ne hige'za, zamagra Jisasinke kenaku ome'nazanki, Lasarusima, fri'nefinti azeri oti'nea ne' kenaku e'naze.
Ana nehu'za vugota prisi vahe'mo'za Lasarusi'nena ahe frinaku ke anaki'naze.
Na'ankure Lasarusinte'ma fore hu'nea'zanku, rama'a Jiu vahe'mo'za atre'za nevu'za Jisasinte zamentinti hu'naze.
Anante nanterana rama'a vahe'mo'za, kinafinti zamare'nea knagu antahimiza ne'za (Pasova) nenaza knare e'namo'za, Jisasi'a Jerusale ne-ea ke antahi'naze.
Antahite'za tofe zafamofo ani'na hantagi'za e'neri'za, ome ke'za amrara nehu'za kezati'za, Tza huogu ke'za netune! (Hosana!) Ramofo Agifi ne-ea nera agi'a hentesga hanune! Israeli vahemofo kinia agi'a hentesga hanune!
Jisasi'a mago agaho ve tonki afu keteno, agumpi mrerino mani'ne, kasnampa vahe'mo'za korapa krente'naza kemo efore hu'ne.
Korera osiho Saion veara, Keho tmagri Kinimo, agaho ve donki afumofo agumpi manino ne-e. (Zek 9:9)
Agri amage nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za e'inama pusante hiazana antahi so'e osu'naze. Hianagi Jisasi'ma hanave'afi mrerino, Ra agi erige'za zamagra zamagesa nentahi'za, e'i Agriku huno avontafepina krente'negeno, amazana Agrite fore hie hu'naze.
Ana higeno, rama'a vahe'mo'za, Jisasi'a kerifinti Lasarusi azeri otige'za ke'naza vahe'mo'za, mago'ene ome huama hume vu'naze.
Ama'na agafare, vahe'mo'za anahu kna hu'za ome Agrira ke'naze. Na'ankure vahe'mo'za nosaza kaguvaza (mirakol) hu'nea ke nentahi'za ome ke'naze.
Ana hige'za Farisi vahe'mo'za ohumi ahumi hu'za zamagra anage hu'naze, keho tagrira neratre'za maka vea'mo'za Jisasi amage avriri'za nevze.
Ana zupage Griki vahepinti mago'a vahe'mo'za, kinafinti zamare'nea ne'za ne'knare mono hunaku mreri'naze.
Ana vahe'mo'za Galili kazigati Betsaida kumateti ne' Filipinte uhaniti'za antahige'za, ramoka Jisasi kenaku nehune.
Filipi'a eno Andruna eme asmitege'ne, tarega'moke vu'ke, Jisasina ome asmi'na'e.
Jisasi'a anage huno kenona zani'arera hu'ne, Vahe'mofo Mofavremo ra agi erisia kna atupa nehie.
Tamage hu'na neramasmue, witi rgamo'ma mopafi taniramino ofrisigeno'a anante megahie. Hianagi taniramino mopa agu'afi frisigeno'a rama'a rga'a rentegahie.
Aza'o agragu'ma avesi antesimo'a, mani'zama'a eri haviza hugahie. Iza'o ama mopafi mani'zama'a ha'rentesimo'a, manivava asimu erigahie.
Iza'o, Nagri eri'za erinaku hanimo'a, namage eno, Nagrama umnisure, eri'za vahe nimo'enena anante umanigahie, iza'o, Nagri eri'za erisimofona, Nenfa'a ra agi amigahie.
Menina Nagu namemo kna navenesianki, na'ane hu'na Nagra hugahue, Nafa'nimoka, ama knare (aua) fore hania knazampinti naza huo, hianagi ama'na agafare ama knarera (aua) e'noe.
Nafa'nimoka, ra kagi erio. Anante mago ageru monafinti eno amanage hu'ne, hago Nagra erisaga hu'noanki'na, rune Nagra erisaga hugahue hu'ne.
Rama'a vahe'ma atru hu'za anante oti'namo'za, ana ageru nentahi'za, monage nehie nehzageno, mago'amo'za ankeromo naneke hu nemigahie hu'za hu'naze.
Jisasi kenona'a anage hu'ne, ama'na agerura Nagri naza hunakura nosianki, tmagri tmaza hunaku nehie.
Menina ama mopa refkohu knae, menina ama mopafi kva hu'nea nera retufe atregahie.
Hanki, Nagri'ma mopafinti nazeri'sga hanige'na, hakare vahera zamare Nagrarega atregahue,
E'inagema hu'neana, fri'zamo avate'ma fore hanigeno frisnigu huama hu'ne.
Hakare vahema atru hu'namo'za, Agrikura amanage hu'naze, tagrama kasegefinti antahi'nonana, Kraisi'a manivava hugahie hu'neanki, nahigenka Kagra hunka, Vahe'mofo Mofavre azeri sga hugahie nehane? Iza'e ana Vahe'mofo Mofavre'a?
Jisasi'a kenona anage huno zamasmi'ne, Osi'a knafi Msamo'a tmagri amu nompina me'ne. Msama me'nenire kana nentenkeno hanimo'a tmagate oreno, iza'o hanimpima nevimo'a, iga nevio antahino keno nosie.
Msama me'nenire, kagra Msagura kmentinti'a huo, e'inama hanunka kagra Msamofo mofavre manigahane. Jisasi'a anage huteno, Agra zamatreno vuno ome frakino mani'ne.
Jisasi'a rama'a kaguvaza (mirakol) huzmeri hu'neanagi, zamagra zamentintia Agritera osu'naze.
Ana higeno kasnampa ne'mo Aisaia hu'nea kemofo avufa'a fore nehie, Ramoka iza tagri kerera amentintia nehie? Ramofo hanave'amo'a izante eama hu'ne? (Aisa 53:1)
E'i ana agafare vahe'mo'za zamentinti osugahaze, Aisaia'a mago ene anage hu'ne,
Ramo zamurga erisu nehuno, zamarimpa kafana erigi'ne, e'ina hanige'za zamurga nonke'za, zamarimpa erigisige'za zamagu zamagesa antahi ama nosuza, zamagu'a rukrehe osnage'na, zmazeri so'e osugahue hu'ne. (Aisa 6:10)
Ama'i zanku'ma Aisaia'ma hu'neana, na'ankure Jisasi'a hanave'afi mani'negeno ke'negu huno, Agriku hu'ne.
Ana hianagi hakare'a mono kva vahe'mo'za zamentinti Agrite hu'naze. Hianagi Farisi vaheku kore hu'za Jisasi'a, Kraisi'e hu'za huama osu'naze, anagema hanage'za mono nompinti (Sinagog) zamahe fegi atre'zanku kore hu'za osu'naze,
Na'ankure vahe'mo'za husga huzmante zanku nehu'za, Anumzamo husga huzmante zankura ontahi'naze.
Jisasi'a ranke huno amanage hu'ne, iza'o Nagrite amentinti hanimo'a, Nagritekera amentinti osugahianki, Agrama hunantege'na e'nomofonte amentinti hugahie.
Iza'o Nagri'ma nenagemo'a, hunantege'na e'nomofo nege.
Nagra ama mopafi Msa e'noe, maka vahe'mo'za Nagrite zamentinti hanamo'za hanimpina omnigahaze.
Iza'o nanekeni'a nentahino, namage nome simofona kea huontegahue, na'ankure Nagra ama mopafi vahe refko hunaku ome'noe, hianagi mopafi vahe zamaza hu'na zamavrenaku e'noe.
Iza'o Nagri nenatreno, ke'ni'a ontahisimofona, e'i anamofona refko'ma haniana, ama nanekema nehua nanekemo maka'za vgare knare, henka'a refko huntegahie.
Na'ankure Nagrani'a antahintahifinti ama nanekea nosue, hianagi Nfanimo Agra hunantege'na e'nomo, zamasmio hianke ana naneke'age nehue.
Nagra antahi'noe, e'i Agri kasege'a manivava asimure, e'ina hu'negu Nagrama nehua kea Nenfa'ma huoma hia ke'age nehue.
Menina kinafinti zamare'nea knagu antahimiza (Pasova) ne'za nekna atupa higeno, Jisasi'a antahi'ne, ama mopa atreno Nefantega vnia kna egeno, amage nentaza disaipol nagara, Agrama zamesi nezmantea zamo'a atupare ehnati'ne.
Jisasi'a amage' nentaza disaipol naga'ane ne'za nenegeno, Hankromo (Sata) Judas Iskariot, Saimon nemofo rimpafi ha' vahe zamazampi komoru huno avrentesia antahi'zana eme ante'ne.
Jisasi'a antahi'ne, Nefa'a maka'zana Agri azampi ante'ne, Anumzamofonteti e'neankino, ete Anumzamofonte vugahie.
Ne'za nenafinti otino, anakre ku'a zafi nenteno, tauri erino afafafi rugagino anakine.
Anante Jisasi'a zompafi ti taginteno, amage nentaza disaipol naga zamaga agafa huno sese huteno, afafafi rugagi'nea taurinu zamagia eriho'mu huzmante'ne.
Anante Saimon Pitante aga sese hunte'naku egeno, agra Jisasinku anage hu'ne, Ramoka nagia sese hugahano?
Jisasi'a kenona anage huno asmi'ne, menima ama nehuazana kagra ontahi'nane, hianagi henka'a antahi ama hugahane.
Pita'a anage huno Jisasina asmi'ne, Kagra nagia sese osu'tfa hugahane! Jisasi anage huno kenona'a hu'ne, Nagra kagiama sese osnugenka, Nagranena omnigahane.
Saimon Pita'a anage huno Jisasina asmi'ne, Ramoka nagiarfana sesera osuo, hianagi anazanke hunka nazane, nanune sese huo!
Jisasi'a anage huno asmi'ne, iza'o ko'ma tima fre'nemo'a, agiage sese hugahie, e'ina nehuno avu sese huno mani'gahie. Hanki kagra ko avu sese hu'nane, hianagi ana maka'mota avu sese osu'naze.
Na'ankure mago'mo komoru huno ha' vahe zamazampima avrentesimofona, Agra ko antahi'ne, e'ina hu'nea agafare, tamagra maka'mota avu sese osu'naze hu'ne.
Anage huteno Jisasi'a zamagia sese huvga rezmantete'no, Nakre ku'a erino mani'neno hu'nere umniteno, Jisasi'a anage huno zamsmi'ne, amazama tmagri'ma hunermantoana antahi'nazo?
Tamagra Nagrikura rempi hurami Ne'ene, Rantie nehazana, tamagra tamage nehaze, Nagra ana nere.
Nagrama Rantimi manina, hurmasmi Ne'mona tmagia sese hunermantesugeta, tamagra nena anazanke huta rumokizmi zamagia, sese ohunte ahunte hiho.
Nagra hurmeri nehuanki, tamagranena anahu kna hutma rumokizmi'a zamagia sese huzmantegahaze.
Tamage hu'na Nagra nermasmue, kazokzo eri'za vahe'mo'a kva'amofona agateoregahie. Kema erino vnimo'a, katogema huntegeno vu'nemofona agateore'ne.
Tamagrama amazama keta antahita nehuta, anazama hanutma asomu erigahaze.
Makamotagura nosue, Nagra huhampri'noa vahera antahi'noe. Hianagi Anumzamofo avontafepi kre'nea nanekea eri knare hugahie. Nagrane breti nenemo ha' renantegahie huno kre'neana, hago avufga'a fore hugahie. (Sam-Zga 41:9)
Meninena Nagra anazana efore osu'nege'na neramasmue, anazama efore'ma hanigeta, tamagra tamentinti nehuta, ana nere hutma Nagrikura hugahaze.
Tamage hu'na neramasmue, Nagrama huntesugeno vnia vahe, avreno azeri so'e huntesimo'a, Nagri navreno nazeri so'e hunantegahie. Iza'o Nagri'ma nazeri so'e hanimo'a, Agra hunantege'na e'nomofo azeri so'e hugahie.
Jisasima anage huvgama reteno, agu'amo kna nehigeno anage hu'ne, Tamage hu'na nermasmue, tamagripinti mago'mo ha' vahe azampina navre antegahie.
Amage nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za zamagra zamagra oge age nehu'za, inamo anara hunaku higeno nehie hu'za hu'naze.
Amage' nentaza disaipol nagapinti, Jisasi'ma avesi nentemo, azantmaga kaziga tvaonte mani'ne.
Ana higeno Saimon Pita'a avesima nentea disaipol ne'ra avame'name huno, izanku Jisasi'a nehifi antahigenka ko huno asmni'ne.
Anante avesima nentea ne'mo, Jisasi asumpi mase kantiteno, anage huno Agrira antahige'ne, Ramoka ana nera iza'e?
Jisasi'a kenona anage hu'ne, bretima sosifima rete'na amisuana e'i ana nere, nehuno bretia sosifi reteno, Saimon Iskarioti nemofo Judasina ami'ne.
Ana bretima netegeno, Sata'a havi avamumofo kvamo agu'afi ufre'ne. E'ina nehigeno Jisasi anage huno asmi'ne, ina knazama hunaku'ma hnunka, kvune antenka huo.
Mani'ne'za ne'za ne'naza vahe'mo'za, anama Judasinku'ma hia kea na'a agafare hu'nefi, antahi amara osu'naze.
Judasi zgo taferote (bogisi) kva nehia neki'za, mago'amo'za antahizana mago'a upama hunona ne'za ome miza sege, amunte omne vahe, zgo ome zaminogu Jisasi'a hunente hu'za zamagesa antahi'naze.
Ana higeno, Judasi'a bretima nehana nehuno'a, atiramino megi'a vu'ne. (Ko hani hu'negeno ana hu'ne.)
Judasi'ma megi'a vute'geno, Jisasi anage hu'ne, menina Vahemofo Mofavremo ra agi erisigeno, Anumzamo'a ra agi Agriteti eri'nia kna ne-e.
Anumzamo ra agi Agriteti eritesuno'a, anazanke huno Anumzamo ra agi Agrira amigahie, nehuno hantaka'a ra agi amigahie.
Mofavre zgamota antahiho, Nagra osi'a knafi tamagra nena manigahue. Tamagra Nagrikura hakregahaze, Jiu mono kva vahera anankea ko zamasmi'noe. Meninena ana kege nermasmue, Nagrama inantega vnurega tamagra omegahaze.
Nagra kasefa kasege tamagrira neramue, Nagrama navesi neramantoa kna huta rumokizmia zmesinezmanteta, anahu kna hutma ovesinte avesinte hiho.
Tamagrama mago'mofo ovesinte avesinte nehnage'za, maka vahe'mo'za nege'za, tamagra Nagri namage nentaza disaipol naga mani'naze hu'za hugahaze.
Saimon Pita'a anage huno Jisasinku hu'ne, Ramoka, kagra iga vunaku nehane higeno? Jisasi'a ana kenona'a huno, Nagrama vanurega, menina kagra navaririnka omegahane, hianagi kagra henka egahane.
Pita'a anage Jisasinku hu'ne, Ramoke, na'a hanige'na nagra menina Kagri kmagera omegahue? Nagra Kagriteku hu'na frinaku menina tro nehue.
Jisasi'a kenona'a anage huno asmi'ne, Nagriku hunka frigahano? Tamage hu'na negasmue, Nagrikura onke'noe hunka 3'a zupa vahane hutesankeno, henka kokoregea hugahie.
Atrenkeno tmagu'amo'a kna osino, Anumzamofonte tamentinti nehuta, anahu kna huta Nagrite'ene tamentinti hiho.
Nenfa nompina rama'a hunaraginte nona me'ne, omne'neresina Nagra ko tamasmusine, Nagra, nonkuma tmia ome retro hunaku nevue.
Nagrama vu'na nonkuma tmi ome retro hutesu'na, ete e'na eme tmaresugeta, Nagrama umnisure, tamagra Nagrane umani'gahaze.
Hagi Nagra inantega vugahuo, tamagra antahi'naze.
Tomasi'a anage huno Jisasi asmi'ne, Ramoke tagra ontahi'none, iga Kagra vugahane, tagra inankna huta ana kana kegahune?
Jisasi'a anage huno asmi'ne, Nagra kana mani'na, tamage ke manina, asimumofo agafa Nagra mani'noe, mago'mo'a aru kantetira Nenfantera ovugahie. A'o, Nagriteti vugahie.
Nagri'ma nagenka nantahinka kagra hantesina, Nenfanena anahu kna hunka kenka antahinka kagra hantesine, meni agafa hunka Agrira nentahinka negane.
Filipi'a anage huno Agri asmi'ne, Ramoke Negfana tveri hugeno tagrira knare huranteno.
Jisasi'a anage huno asmi'ne, Nagra kagranena rama'a kna mani'noanki, kagra nahigenka Nagrira onage'nane? Iza'o Nagri'ma nagemo'a, Nenfana ke'ne! Nahigenka kagra hunka, Negfana naveri huo hunka nehane?
Nenfampi Nagra manugeno, Nenfa'a Nagripi mani'ne hua kegura, nahigenka kmentintia nosane? Nagra nagesafinti kea kagrira nonkasmue, hianagi Nenfa'a nagu'afi mani'nemo, Agra kaguvaza hu eri'za e'nerie.
Tamentintima hanazana, Nagra Nenfampi manugeno, Nenfa'a Nagripi mani'ne hiho, hu'neanagi ana'ma osnutma kaguvazama eri forehu eri'zama eri'nogu nentahitma tamentinti hugahaze.
Tamage hu'na Nagra neramasmue, iza'o Nagrite amentinti hanimo'a, Nagrama e'nerua eri'zana anahu kna huno kaguvazama eri forehu eri'za e'nerino, Nagatereno ra eri'za erigahie, na'ankure Nagra Nenfantega vugahue.
Inankna zanku'ma Nagri nagifi nantahigesazana, Nagra amne hugahue. Nefa'a ra agi Nemofompinti erigahie.
Tamagrama inankna zankuro Nagri nagifima nantahi kesage'na, Nagra anazana amne hugahue.
Nagri'ma navesinantesuta kasegeni'a amage antegahaze.
Nenfana antahigesugeno, Agra mago tmaza hu'zana tamisnigeno, Agra tamagra ne manivava hugahie.
E'i ana tmaza hu'zana tamage Routge Avamure, ama mopafi vahe'mo'za e'origahaze, na'ankure zamagra ke'za antahi'za osu'naze. Hianagi tamagra Agrira (Avamura) antahi'naze, na'ankure Agra tamagra ne mani'neno, tmagu'afi manigahie.
Nagra tmatresugetma megusa mofavregna huta omnigahaze, Nagra tmagrite egahue.
Osi'a knafi mopafi vahe'mo'za Nagrira onagegahaze, hianagi tamagra Nagrira nagegahaze. Na'ankure Nagra mani'noankita, tamagra nena anahu kna huta manigahaze.
E'i ana knazupa, tamagra antahigahaze Nagra Nenfana agu'afi mnugeta, tamagra Nagri nagu'afi manisagena, Nagra tmagri tmagu'afi manigahue.
Iza'o Nagri kasegema amage antesimo'a, Nagrira avesinantegahie, iza'o Nagri'ma avesinantenimofona Nenfa'a agrira avesintegahie, hnige'na Nagra avesintena, Nagra'ni'a agrite efore hugahue.
Ru Judasi amanage huno Ramofona antahige'ne, nankna hunka Kagra tagrite eama nehunka, ama mopafi vahetera eamara osugahane?
Jisasi'a ana kenona'a anage huno zamasmi'ne, iza'o Nagri'ma avesi nantesimo'a, ke'nia amage antesigeno, Nenfa'a avesintena tagra, agrane emanigahune.
Iza'o Nagri'ma avesi onantesimo'a, Nagri kea amage ontegahie. Ama kema nentahizana Nagri kea omne'ne, hianagi Nenfa'ma hunantege'na e'nomofo ke nontahize.
Ama zantminku Nagra nehuana, tamagra ne mani'nena nehue.
Hianagi tmaza hu'zana, Ruotge Avamu, Nenfa'a Nagri nagifi huntesigeno eno, Agra maka'zanku eme rempi huramigahie. Nagrama maka'zanku tmasmi'noana hurmagesa hugahie.
Tamarimpa fru Nagra tamagripi nentoe, Nagra narimpa frua tamagri neramue, ama mopafi vahe'mo'za nermizankna tamarimpa frua Nagra noramue. Atrenkeno tamaguamo'a kna nosina korora osiho.
tamagra nentahizage'na Nagra tmagrira tmasmi'na, tmatre'na vute'na, ete tmagrite egahue hu'noe. Tamagrama Nagri navesinantesuta muse hugahaze, na'ankure Nagra Nenfantega vugahue, Nagrira Nenfa'a nagtereno Ra mani'ne.
Nagra menina fore osu'negena neramasmue, fore'ma hania zupa, tamagra Nagrite tamentinti hugahaze.
Nagra za'zatera nanekea ontamasmigahue, ama mopa kva nehia ne' Sata'a hago ne-e, agrira hanave'a omne'neankino, Nagrira nagateoregahie.
Hianagi ama mopafi vahe'mo'a antahino keno hugahie, Nagra Nenfana navesinentoe, Nagra Nenfa'ma huo hunoma humanante'neaza nehuanki, otinketa amafintira vamneno.
Nagra tamage waini zafamofo nena'a mani'noe. Nenfa'a waini hozamofo nefa'e.
Hakare azankuna'amo Nagripi me'neno rga reontesimofona, Agra akafri netreno, hakare azankuna'amo rga rentesiana, mago'ene traga huno eri fatgo hanigeno, aguheno rga rentegahie.
Tamagra ko agru hu'naze, na'ankure kema tmasmi'noa kemo tmazeri agru hu'ne.
Nagri nagu'afi emaninenke'na, Nagra tmagri tmagu'afi mani'neno. Zafa azankuna'amo agra avesitera rga'a reontegahie, waini zafare azankuna'amo ru okamre snuno'a rga reontegahie. Hagi Nagrite'ma ruokamare'sutma rga'a reontegahaze.
Nagra waini zafa mani'nogeta, tamagra azankuna'a mani'naze. Iza'o Nagripi manige'na agripi mani'nomo'a, rama'a rga renente, Nagri'ma natresuta mago'zana osu'tfa hugahaze.
Mago'mo vahe'mo'ma Nagri nagu'afi omnisimofona, azankuna eritru hu'nazageno osaparea kna hina, mate vu'za tevefi kregahaze.
Tamagrama, Nagri nagu'afi mani'ne'nageno, naneke ni'amo tamagri tmagu'afi me'nena, tmesinia zankuma nantahigesazana amne erigahaze.
Tamagra rama'a rga renentenkeno, Nenfa'a ra agi erisige'za nege'za, Nagri namage nentaza disaipol vahere hu'za tamagrikura hugahaze.
Nenfa'ma, Nagri'ma navesi nante'neaza hu'na, Nagranena anahu kna hu'na tmesi nermantoanki, ana navesimofo agu'afi maniho.
Tamagrama kasege ni'ama amage' antesuta, tamagra Nagri navesimofo agu'afi manigahaze, Nagrama, Nenfa kasegema amage ante'na, Agri avesizamofo agu'afi mani'noankna huta manigahaze.
Ama zanku'ma Nagra nermasmuana, Nagri muse zamo tmagri tmagu'afi me'nigeno, musezantmimo'a avitegahie.
Ama'i Nagri kasege, tmararunku ovesinte, avesinte hiho, Nagrama, tmagri'ma navesi tmante'noa kna hiho.
Mago'mo'ma rone'agu avesinteno, agra asimuma atreno frisimo'a, tusi'a ugota hu'nea avesiza huzmerigahie.
Nagrama neramasmua kasegema amage antesutma Tamagra, Nagri rone manigahaze.
Nagra ru'ene kazokzo eri'za vahe'ni'e hu'na tmagrikura osugahue, na'ankure kazokzo eri'za vahe'mo'a kva'amo'ma hiazana ontahi'ne. Hianagi Nagra rone'nimote hu'na tmagrikura nehue, na'ankure Nenfantegati maka'zama Nagrama antahuazana, tmagrira neramasmue.
Tamagra, Nagrira huhampri'onante'naze, hianagi Nagra, tmagrira huhampritamantena, tmazeri oti'noe, vuta nena rga'a ome rentesageno, ana rgamo me'nena, na'ankuro Nagri nagifi Nenfama antahigesageno'a, Agra amne tmigahie.
Nagra ama kasege neramasmue, tmararuna ovesinte avesinte hiho.
Jisasi amanage huno zamasmi'ne, ama mopafi vahe'mo'za ha' rermantesaza zanku kva hiho, na'ankure ese agafare, Nagri ha' renante'naze.
Ama'na mopafi vahe mani'naresina, ama mopafi vahe'mo'za tagri vahere hu'za zamesi rmantasine, ana hu'neanagi na'ankure tamagra ama mopafi vahera omni'naze. Hianagi Nagra ama mopafinti tmagrira tmavre'noe, ana agafare ama mopafi vahe'mo'za hara reramantegahaze.
Ko'ma tmasmi'noa kegu tamagesa antahiho, kazokzo eri'za ne'amo'a, kva vahe'a knara osu'ne. Nagri'ma nazanva ante'nesu'za, tamagri enena anahu kna hu'za tmazanva antegahaze, ke'ni'a amage antenare'sina, tmagri kea ana zanke hu'za antahizasine.
Hianagi Nagri nagimo tmagripi me'nenigeno'a, e'ina hu'zana hurmantegahaze, na'ankure hunantege'na e'nomofona ke'za antahi'za osu'nagu ana hurmategahaze.
Nagrama naneke e'na eme ozmasmuasina, zamagrira kumi'zmi omne sine. Hianagi menina kumi'zmia eri fraki ka zamia omnegahie.
Nagri'ma ha'ma renantesimo'a, ana zanke huno Nenfana ha' renente.
Mago'a vahe'mo'za e'orinaza kaguva eri'zama zamagri amu'nompi e'ori'noasinia, kumi'zmia omnesine. Hianagi menina kaguva eri'zani'a kazanagi, Nagri'ene Nenfanena ha' renerantaze.
Menima anazama nehazana, zamagri kasegefi kre'naza ke eri knare nehaze, Mago havizana Nagra osunoge'za, hara renenantaze. (Sam-Zga 69:4)
Tmazama hu'zama huntesugeno Nenfantegati tmagrite esuno'a, Agra Tmage Avamukino Nagri nagenkea eriama hugahie.
Tamagranena ana zanke hutma Nagri nanekea huama hugahaze, na'ankure tamagra Nagrane mani'nage'na, eri'zana eri agafa hu'na eri'noe.
Ru tamentintifinti evuramizanku, ama nanekea menina neramasmue.
Jiu vahe mono nompinti (sinagog) tmahe anati atregahaze, mago kna ne-eankino, tmahefrisu'za zamagesa antahisazana Anumzamofo eri'za e'nerune hu'za antahigahaze.
E'ina hu'za zamagra hurmantegahaze, na'ankure Nenfane Nagri enena ontahi'nagu anara hurmantegahaze.
Hianagi ama zanku Nagra nermasmuankino, ana zgegna (aua) efore'ma hina, Nagrama tmasmi'noa kegu tamagra antahigahaze. Ese agafare Nagra ontmasmi'noe, na'ankure Nagra tamagra ne mani'nogu ontmasmi'noe.
Hianagi menina Agra hunantege'na e'nomofonte, Nagra vunaku nehugeta mago'moka nantahigenka, iga vunaku nehane hunka nantahi nonkane?
Hianagi vugahue hu'na Nagrama tamasmua kemo, tamagri tamagu'a erigna nehie.
Hianagi Nagra tamage neramasmue, tamagrima eme tamaza hanigu vugahue, na'ankure Nagrama tmatre'na ovanugeno'a, tmaza hu'zana tmagritera omegahie. Hianagi Nagrama vanuna, huntanena, Agra tamagritega egahie.
Hankino Agra esuno'a, mopafi vahe'mokizmi kumi'ene, Anumzamofo fatgo avu'ava zane, henkama refko huno keaga huzmantesiaza zameri nehuno,
kumi zamimofonku zamasmigahie. Na'ankure zamagra Nagritera zamentintia osu'naze.
Na'ankure fatgo navu'nava hanuana, Nenfantega vanugeta, tamagra Nagrira onagegahaze.
Hagi kema refko haniaza eme huramerigahie, na'ankure ama mopa kva hu'nemofona hago keaga hunte'noe.
Nagra mago'a rama'a naneke tamasmusine, hianagi menina tamagra antahise osugahaze.
Hianagi Tmage Avamu'ma esuno'a, agu'vazi zamanteno tamage nanekemofo eri ama huno tmasmigahie. Na'ankure Agra'a antahintahi'ane, hanave'arera ana nanekea osugahie, hianagi na'ano Agrama antahisia kege nehuno, henkama esia zamofonku tmasmigahie.
Avamumo'a, Nagri nagi erisaga hugahie, na'ankure Nagripi me'neazana erino tmagrira tmasmigahie.
Maka'zama Nenfa'ma ante'neana Nagri'zane, e'ina hu'negu, Avamumo'a Nagripinti ana nanekea erino tamagrira tmasmigahie.
Osi'a knafi omni'nanena tamagra onagegahaze, hagi ete osia knafi tamagra nagegahaze.
Mago'a amage' nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za zamagra zamagra ohumi ahumi nehu'za anage hu'naze, ama'i nankna naneke tasmino, osi'a knafi tamagra onagegahaze nehuno, ete osi'a knafi nagegahaze nehie. Na'ankure Nagra Nenfante vugahue nehie?
Amage' nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za anage hu'naze, ama'i na'anku Agra anage huno, osi'a knafine nehie? Tagra ontahi'none, na'anku Agra nehifi ontahi'none hu'za hu'naze.
Zamagra antahigenaku Jisasina nehazageno nentahino, anage huno zamasmi'ne, Nagra hu'na, osi'a knafi onageta, ete osi'a knafi nagegahaze hua kegu, tamagra antahintahi hakare nehazo?
Tamagerfa hu'na neramasmue. Tamagra tamavunu nehina ranke huta zavira ategahaze, hianagi ama mopafi vahe'mo'za muse hugahaze. Tamagra tamarimpa kna hugahazanagi ete tmarimpa knamo'a eri rukrahe hanigeta, muse hugahaze.
A'mo mofavrema nenteno'a atagu nehie, na'ankure mofavrema ksente kna egeno'e, hianagi mofavrema ksentete'no'a, ana atagura agesa nontahie. Na'ankure ama mopafi mofavrema ksentea muse nehie.
E'i ana hu'negu tamagra menina zavira netaze, hianagi Nagra henka nermagesugeno, tamagu'amo muse nehina, mago'mo ana musezana tamagripintira eri otregahie.
Ana knarera Nagrira mago'zankura nantahi onkegahaze. Tamagerafa hu'na tamagrira neramasmue, Nenfama mago zanku'ma Nagri nagifima antahigesageno'a, amne tamigahie.
Korapara Nagri nagifina mago'zankura nantahi onke'naze. Nantahigetma tamagra erigahaze, e'ina hanageno muse zantmimo'a avitegahie.
Nagra amanage hu'na fronka kefinti neramasmue, mago kna ne-eanki'na, ana kna zupa fronka kefintira ontamasmigahue. Hianagi huama hu'na Nenfankura tmasmigahue.
E'i ana knazupa, Nagri nagifi Nenfana antahigegahaze. Nagra tamagri tamagi eri'na, Nenfana asmigahue hu'na nosue.
Hagi Nenfa'a tmagrira Agra'a avesinermante, na'ankure tamagra Nagrira tamavesinenteta Nagrikura Anumzamofonteti e'ne huta tamentinti hu'naze.
Nagra Nenfantegati e'na, ama mopafina e'noe, hianagi ama mopa ete atre'na Nenfa hirega vugahue.
Agri amage' nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za anage hu'naze, ko menina Kagra amate ke huama nehunka, fronka kea osane.
Tagra menina antahi'none, Kagra maka'zana antahi'nane, mago zankura vahe'mo'a kagenoka osugahie. E'ina'ma hanazante tagra tamentinti nehuta, Anumzantegati e'nane huta nehune.
Jisasi'a kenona huno, Menina tamagra tamentinti nehazo?
Keho, knamo'a (aua) hago eno ama e'ne, mago mago'moka nonkarega nevunka, natresanke'na Nagrake manigahue, ana hugahazanagi Nagrakera omnigahue, na'ankure Nenfa'a Nagrane mani'ne.
Ama'ina naneke Nagra neramasmuana, Nagripinti tamarimpa fru erigahaze. Ama mopafina hazenke zane, kasuzamo egahianagi, oti hanavetiho, na'ankure Nagra ama mopa hago agtere'noe.
Jisasi ana naneke huvareteno, Agra kesga huno monafi negeno amanage hu'ne, Nenfaga hago kna (aua) eforehie, Negamofona ra agi amigeno, Negamofo anazanke huno, Kagrira rankagi kamino.
Maka vahete kvahu hihamu ami'nane, ana hankeno maka ami'nana vahera, Agra zamaza huno manivava mani'za zamigahie.
Ama'i manivava mani'zane hu'za, zamagra kage'za antahi'za nehu'za, magoketfa tamage Anumzane nehu'za, Jisas Kraisi huntankeno e'ne hugahaze.
Nagra ama mopafi Kagri kagi eri ra hu'na, Nagri'ma eri'za erio hunka nami'nana eri'zana hago eri vgare'noe.
Menia Nenfaga, Kagra kaziga navrento, korapa'ma mopa fore osu'nere mani'neta hu'no'a konariri zampi, Kagrane umanisu'e. (Eks-Utr 3:14)
Nagra Kagri kagi kagenkeka'a kokankoka vahe'pinti'ma avare nami'nana vahera zamasmi ama hu'noe. Zamagra Kagrika'a vahe, Nagrira nami'nane, hagi zamagra keka'a antahi'za amage' ante'naze.
Menia maka nami'nana zankura, Kagra nami'nane hu'za antahigahaze.
Na'ankure Kagrama nasmi'nana kea Nagra zamasmi'noe. Zamagra anankea eneri'za Nagrikura tamage Agriteti e'ne nehu'za, Agra huntegeno e'ne hu'za zamentinti nehaze.
Nagra, zamagri zamagi' eri'na nunamuna nehue. Nagra kokankoka vahe zamagi' eri'na nosue, hagi Nagri'ma nami'nana vahe zamagi' eri'na nunamuna nehue, na'ankure zamagra Kagri suza mani'naze.
Hagi maka Nagri vahe'mo'za, Kagri vahere, maka Kagri vahera, Nagri vahere, ana vahe'mo'za Nagrira ra nagi nenamize.
Mago'ene Nagra ama mopafina omanigahue, zamagra'zmi ama mopafina manigahaze, hige'na Nagra Kagritega neoe. Ruotge hunana Nenfaga, Kagrama ante nami'nana nagifi zamavu vazi'sankeza, tagrama mago hu'nonankna hu'za zamagra mago hugahaze.
