Nagra zamagranema mani'nena, Kagri kagire manisnaze hu'na zamagu'vazina kva huzmante'noe. Kagrama nami'namokizmia mago'mo'a fnane osu'ne, hianagi magoke'mofo fanane hinogura huhamprinte'ne, ana hanigeno Anumzamofo avontafe'mo hu'nea kantera avufa'a fore hugahie. (Sam-Zga 41:9)
Hu'neanagi Nagra, Kagrite menina ne-e'na, ama mopafina Nagra amanahu kea nehuankino, Nagri muse zamo'a (joy) zamagripi avitegahie.
Nagra, Kagri nanekea ko zamasmi'noe, huge'za mopa kagi'afi vahe'mo'za zamesra huzmante'naze, na'ankure zamagra ama mopafi vahera omni'naze, Nagrama ama mopafi vahe'ma omni'noa kna hu'naze.
Nagra ama mopareti zamavre atrogura nosue, hagi havi ne'mofo azampinti zamazeri anovazisanegu nehue.
Zamagra ama mopafi vahera omni'naze, Nagra enena anahu hu'na, ama mopafi vahera omni'noe.
Tamage kefi zamazeri avusese hunka zamazeri otge huo. Kagri keka'amo'a tamage.
Kagrama hunantanke'na ama mopafina e'noankina, Nagra ana zanke hu'na mopa kagi'afi hunezmantoe.
Nagra zamagri huzmeri'na avusese hu'na mani otage hu'noe, ana nehuanki'za zamagranena anazanke hu'za Kagrite avusese nehu'za, tamage hu'za mani otage hugahaze.
Nagrima namage nentaza disaipol nagakuke hu'na nunamuna nosue, hagi ke'ni'a huama nehzage'za, Nagrite zamentinti hanaza naga'enenku nehue,
ana hanuge'za zamagra maka'mo'za magoke hu'za, Nenfaga, Nagrane mago huta mani'no'a kna hu'za, Tagra ene mago hu'za zamagra mani'nesage'za, kokankokati vahe'mo'za nege'za, Kagra huntankeno e'ne hu'za zamentinti hugahaze.
Kagrama hanavema Nagri nami'nana hanavea, Nagra zamagri zami'noe, ana hanuge'za zamagra mago hu'za manisaze. Tagrama mago huta mani'no'a kna hu'za manisazegu zami'noe.
Nagra zamagripi manugenka, Kagra, Nagripi mani'nane, hanige'za zamagra magoke zamarimpa hu'za manigahaze. Ana hananke'za ama mopafi vahe'mo'za nege'za, Kagra huntankeno ama mopafina e'ne hu'za nentahi sagenka, Nagri'ma kvesi nante'nana kna hunka, zamavesi zamantegahane.
Nenfaga, Nagri'ma nami'nana vahe'zga, Nagrama manisufi manisazegu navenesie, ana hu'ne'za Nagri'ma nami'nana hanavea kesaze, na'ankure Kagra korapa mopa omne'nea knafi, Nagrite kagu'a antenka hanavea nami'nane.
Fatgo Nenfaga, kokankoka vahe'mo'za kage'za antahi'za osu'gahazanagi, Nagra kage'na kantahi'na hu'noe, hagi amama namage'nentaza naga'moza antahi'za, Kagra huntankeno e'ne hu'za nehaze.
Nagra, Kagri kagi'a hu'ama hu'na zamagrira nezmasamue, hagi'na mago'ene hagerfi'na hu'ama hu'na zamasmigahue, kvesima nenantana kvesi zamo'a, zamagri zamagu'afi mesige'na, Nagra anazanke hu'na zamagripi manigahue.
Ana nanekema huvareteno, Jisasi'a atreno disaipol naga'ane Kidron agupofi vute'za, ananteti vumare'za mago knagune zafa hoza me'nefi vu'naze.
Judasima komoru huntesia ne'mo'a, ana zafa knagune hoza ke'ne, na'ankure Jisasi'a disaipol naga'ane knagune hozafi mago'a knafina zamareno vutere'ma higeno ke'ne.
Higeno Judasi'a mago'a Roma sondia kevune, ra mono nonte kva nehaza naga'ene (Gat), vugote'naza prisi vahe'ene, Farisi vahe'enena olivi zafa hozafi tosine, tafentavi'ene, ha'zane eri'nageno zamavreno vu'ne.
Mika'zama Agrite fore haniazana, na'ankure Jisasi antahino keno nehuno, Azanku nehakraze? huno zamantahige'ne.
Zamagra ana kemofo nona'a Agriku hu'za, Nazareti kumateti Jisasinku nehakrone, hzageno, Nagra ana Nere. Judasima komoru huno ha' vahe zamazampi avrentesia ne'mo zamagrane anante oti'ne.
Jisasi'ma anage zamagriku huno, Nagra ana Nere hige'za, zamefiti vu'za mopafi traka truku humse'naze.
Ana hzageno, Jisasi'a mago'ene zamantahige'ne, tamagra azanku nehakraze? Hige'za zamagra hu'za, Nazareti kumateti Jisasinku nehakrone.
Jisasi'a ke nona'a huno, Ko'ma Nagra ana Nere hu'na tmasmi'noe, Nagriku'ma nehakrehanuta, ama vahera zamatrenke'za viho.
Agrama hu'neana, ko'ma Agra'ama hunte'nea kemofo nena'a fore hinogu hu'ne. Kagrama nami'nana vahepintira magore hu'na Nagra zamatroge'za afe osu'naze, hu'nea kegu hu'ne.
Pita'a ra kazinkno (bainat) eri'nereti anoma'afinti avazu hia zamo vugote'nea prisi ne'mofo kazokzo eri'za nera tamaga kaziga agesa ahe tavrofe atre'ne. Ana kazokzo eri'za ne'mofo agi'a Malakusi'e.
Ana higeno Jisasi'a, Pitanku huno, Kazinka'a anoma'afi vazinto. Nenfa'ma nami'nea tin tafempintira (kapu) Nagra onesuo?
Anante mago sondia kevune, sondia vahete vugota huno kvakri zmante'nea ne'ene, Jiu vahe'mokizmi ati vahe'mo'zane, Jisasi azeri'za azante nofi kinte'naze.
Anakite'za esera Anasinte avare'za vu'naze, na'ankure agra Kaiafasi nenemo'e, Kaiafasi'a ana kafumofo agu'afina vugota prisi ne' mani'ne.
Korapara Kaiafasi Jiu kva vahera antahintahizamino, hakare vahe'mokizmi nona huno magoke ne'mo frigahie huno hu'neane.
Saimon Pita ene, magora Jisasima amage' nentea disaipoli ne'ene Jisasima avare'za Anasinte vazage'za anantega zamavririke vu'na'e. E'i anama vu'nea disaipoli nera, prisi ne'mo'a ke'nea disaipoli nere.
Hianagi, Saimon Pita'a kasante fegi'a otino mani'ne. Ana higeno Jisasi amage' nentea disaipoli nera vugota pris ne'mo ke'nea ne'mo atiramino, kazokzo eri'za mofa'mo kafante kva hu'nea mofa asamigeno, Pitana avreno agu'afi emareri'ne.
Anante kazokzo eri'za mofa'ma kafante kva nehia mofa'mo Pitanku amanage huno antahige'ne, Kagra ama Ne' amage' nentana disaipol nere, tamage ana nepi? Huno antahigegeno, A'o, Nagra ru nere.
Anantera kazokzo eri'za vahe'ene, nonte kva nehaza vahe'ene, tanknuzare teve hegre'za oti'za mani kagi'naze. Na'ankure zasi hige'za teve tohiku hugre'naze. Pita'enena ana tevere uoti'neno teve tohi'ne.
Ana zama fore nehigeno'a, vugota pris ne'mo, amage nentaza disaipol naga'ene, rempi'ma huzami'nea kegu Jisasina agenoka hu'ne.
Jisasi ana kenona'a anage hu'ne, Nagra amate mika kaziga naneke hu'noe. Nagra maka zupa Jiu vahe osi mono nompine (sinagog) ra mono noma (tempol), Jiu vahe maka atru nehaza nomofo megi'a rempihuzami'noe, Nagra magore huna oku'a nanekea huozmi'noe.
Na'anku Nagria nantahi negane? Nentahizage'na huzmasmi'noa vahe zamantahigenka ko, Nagrama hu'noa nanekea, zamagra antahi'naze.
Jisasi'ma ana nanekema higeno'a, mago ra mono nonte kva nehia ne'mo, Jisasina avugosafi ruhapatino neheno amanage hu'ne, E'inahu hunka vugota pris vahe kerera ke nona hugahano?
Jisasi ke nona huno agri asmi'ne, Havigema hu'nesua zanku'ma nehanugenka, havizani'a hufore huo, hianagi tamage kema nehuana nahigenka kagra knonkevea nenamine?
Higeno anante Anasi'a nofira ovasneno huntegeno, Kaiafasi vugota pris nete avare'za vu'naze.
Saimon Pita'a oti'neno teve tonehige'za, tevere mani'naza vahe'mo'za antahige'za, Kagra'nena e'ina ne' amage' nentana disaipol ne' mani'nampi? Hu'za antahigageno, Pita'a vahane huno, A'o nagra ru nere.
Mago vugota pris ne'mofo kazokzo eri'za ne'ma, Pita kazi knonteti (bainat) agesa rutavrofe atre'nea ne'mofona nefu' Pitanku huno, Zafa hozafi Agrane mani'nanke'na kagrira kage'noa nepi, ru nere?
Higeno, Pita'a mago'ene vahane nehigeno, ana amage hantaka'a, kokoremo ageru ru'ne.
Ananteti zamagra Kaiafasintetira ko'atu avame Jisasina avare'za Roma ugagota kva (gavana) ne'mofo nonte vu'naze. Vunazanagi zamagra ugagota nemofo kumapina uofre'naze. Ana zamo zamazeri pehena resige'za, Hibru vahe kinafinti zamare'nea knagu antahimiza neza nenaza knare ovuzanku ana hzageno,
Paeroti ne'mo zamagritega megi'a atiramino eno anage hu'ne, Ama'na nera nankemofo agafare nanekea hu'nentaze? Huno zamantahige'ne.
Zamagra kenona hu'za asmi'naze, ama ne'mo'ma hazenke ne'ma omni'nesina, tagra avreta kagritera omosine.
Hzageno Paeroti'a zamasmi'ne, tamagratami avaretma tamagri kasegemo hu'nesia kante Agrira keaga hunteho. Jiu vahe'mo'za Paerotinku anage hu'naze. Tagrira vahe'ma zamahe fri'zantera i'o hurante'naze.
Ana kema hu'nazana, Jisasi'ma korapa Agrama fritenoma otinia zankuma zamasmi'nea kemo e'ama hu'ne.
E'ina higeno, anante Paeroti'a eteno ugagota vahe (gavana) nompi vuno, Jisasina kehuno, Kagra Jiu vahe'mokizmi Kinifi? Huno antahige'ne.
Jisasi kenona huno, Kagra kagesafinti ke nehampi, mago'a vahe'mo'za Nagri'kura kasmi nagenka nehano?
Paeroti'a ke nona huno, Nagra Jiu ne' mani'nofi? Kagri vahe'mo'zane, ra mono kva vahe'mo'za (hai pris) Kagrira kzerite'za, kvare'za eme nami'naze. Kagra na'a hu'nantere?
Jisasi ke nona'a hu'ne, Nagri kumara ama mopafina omne'ne. Ama mopare kva vahe mani'noresina eri'za vahenimo'za, Nagritekura ha' hazage'za, Nagrira navre'za Jiu vahera ozamizasine, hianagi Nagri kumara ama mopafina omne'ne.
E'inage higeno Paeroti'a asmi'ne, higenka Kagra kinio? Jisasi ke nona'a hu'ne, Kagra Nagriku'ma kinie nehanana tamage. Ama'na kegafare Nagra ama mopafina efore hu'noe. Nagra ama'na agafare ama mopafina e'noe, tamage naneke huama hunaku e'noe. Maka vahe'mo'za tamage nanekegu zamave'ma nesimo'za, Nagri nagerute zamagesa ante'za nentahiza tamage nehaze.
Paeroti'a antahige'ne, tamage nanekea inanknahu ke me'ne? Anagema huteno'a, megi'a atiramino Jiu kva vahete vuno anage hu'ne, Mago havizana nagra, Agripina ke'na erifore osue.
Hu'neanagi tamagri avu'avate kinafinti tamavare'nea (Pasova) knare mago ne' kinafinti azeri atretere hugahue hu'negu, tamagra ma antahizana nagra kinafintira, Jiu vahe'motma Kini ne' hunte'sugeno vanio?
Hige'za kezati'za amanage hu'naze, Ama'na nera avare otre'gahane, hagi Barabasi avare atro, Barabasi'a kumzafa ne'ku hu'naze.
Anante Paeroti'a huzmantege'za Jisasina sefu ami'naze.
Anante sondia vahe'mo'za ave'ave nofite kini vahe'mokizmi fetorikna huza tro hute'za, Jisasi anunte antani nente'za, koranke kukena hunte'naze.
Zamagra Agrite ete'vute nehu'za, Husga hunte'za ankaza nente'za, Keho, ama Jiu vahe'mokizmi kinia! Nehu'za avugosafi mago'ene ruhapa hapa hu'za ahe'naze.
Mago'ene Paeroti'a ete atiramino, Jiu kva vaheku amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Keho, ama ne'ma nagrama avare'na tmagrite'ma neoana, antahisazana mago keaga Agri'ma hunte'zana omne'ne.
Anante Jisasina ave'ave nofite fetori'ene, koranke kukena antani antetageno, atiramino e'ne. Paeroti'a anage hu'ne, Keho, ama Nera!
Vugote'naza pris vahe'ene, mono no kegva nehza vahe'mo'za (gad) Agri'ma nege'za amanage hu'za kezati'naze, aheta hantiho, aheta hantiho! Hzageno Paeroti'a zamasmi'ne, Tamagratmi avretma rugeka zafare ome aheho, na'ankure nagra mago hazenke'a omne'nege'na negoe, huno zamasmi'ne.
Jiu kva vahe'mo'za ke nona'a amanage hu'naze, Tagrira kasegetia me'ne, hagi ana kase kemofo amage' anteno Agra frigahie. Na'ankure Agra Anumzamofo Ne'mofavre mani'noe huno hu'ne.
Ana kema Paeroti'a nentahino, tusiza huno agra mago'ene amanogura hu'ne.
Eteno Paeroti'a kuma'afi ufreno, Jisasinku anage hu'ne, Kagra igati e'nane? Hianagi Jisasi'a magore huno agri kenona'a osu'ne.
Ke osigeno, Paeroti'a anage huno asmi'ne, kema hunami'zankura nahigeno kave nosie? Kagra ontahi'nano, Kagri'ma katufe katre hanavene, rugeka zafare kahena hanti hanavema nagrama eri'noana?
Jisasi ke nona'a asmi'ne, Kagra Anumzamoma hanavema onkamiasina, Nagri'ma kegva hunantega hanavea e'orintesine, hagi monafinkati ne'mo hanigenka anara hugahane. Na'ankure navreno kzampima eme ante'nemo'a, kagrira kagatereno tusi'a kumi hu'ne.
Ana kema antahiteno'a Paeroti'a aza huno katufe atrenaku tusiza huno agesa antahi'ne. Hianagi Jiu kva vahe'mo'za kezati'za, kagrama ama ne'ma katufe atresunka, kagra Sisa knampa omni'nane! Mago'mo kini manigahue hanimo'a, Sisana ha' rentegahie.
Paeroti'a ana kema haza nentahino, Jisasi avare fegi'a atreno naneke fgagohu trate umani'ne, ana kumamofo agi'a, Havereti simeni hunte'naza kumare nehaze, hagi Hibru/Arami kefina, Gabate hu'za nehaze.
Jiu vahe'mo'za kinafinti zamare'nea knagu antahimiza nenaza (Pasova) ne'za retro tra hunaku nehzageno, zgemo'a feru asegeno Paeroti'a Jiu vaheku huno, Keho, ama tamagri Kinia!
Anagema hige'za kezanke hu'za, Avretma viho, avretma viho, Agrira ahetma hantiho! Nehzageno Paeroti'a zamantahige'ne, Nagra, tamagri Kinia ahena hantisuo? Hige'za pris vahe'mo'za ke nona'a hu'za, Tagri kinia magora omni'neanki, Sisa agrake mani'ne.
Anagema hzageno Paeroti'a Jisasina ahe'zama keka zafare hantihogu zamige'za Jisasina azeri'naze.
Anante Jisasi'a keka zafa'a erino, vahe anu zaferine nehaza mopare, Hibru kefina Golgote nehazare erino vu'ne.
E'i anante Jisasina nehe'za, tare netrena ruga raga asopare znahe'za rugeka zafare nehanti'za, Agrira amu'nompi hanti'naze.
Paeroti'a mago avona kreno, ana keka zafare hanti'ne. Anage huno kre'ne, JISASI'A NAZARETI NERE, JIU VAHE'MOKIZMI KINIE.
Huno krente'nege'za hakare Jiu vahe'mo'za hampri'za ke'naze. Na'ankure Jisasima ahe'za hanti'naza mopa, rankuma tva'onte me'ne, ana kema krente'neana Hibru kefine, Latini kefine, Griki kefima huno ana avona krentene.
Anante Jiu vahe'mokizmi vugota pris vahe'mo'za Paerotina asmi'za, Jiu vahe'mokizmi Kinie hunka onkrenka, hagi Agra'a huno, Nagra Jiu vahe'mokizmi Kinie huno hu'ne hunka kro hu'za asmi'naze.
Paeroti'a ke nonazmire zamasmino, Inankna keo nagrama krente'noana hago krente'noe.
Anante sondia vahe'mo'za, Jisasi rugeka zafare ahe'za hantite'za, amegati kukena'a eri refko hu'za 4'a kevu ante'naze, mago'mo mago kevu eritere hu'are, avate kukena'ama hati'nazana eri mago hu'za anagamuti hati'za fenkamu urami'naze.
Hige'za sondia vahe'mo'za ke hugantu hugma hu'za, erisagnera osinkero, hagi satu zokago reta kesune, aza erisifi, e'i ana kemo Anumzamofo avon tafe'mo hu'nea ke eriama hu'ne, Zamagra amega kena'ni'a amu'no zamifi fagago hu'za eri'naze, zamagra nagri kenarera, taisi zokago re'naze. (Sam-Zga 22:18) Anama kre'naza kante anteza sondi'a vahe'mo'za ana kemofo eri knare hu'naze.
Hianagi Jisasi ahe'za hanti'naza keka zafamofo agafafina, Agri nereraki, nererana nenunknaki, Klopas nenaro Mariaki, Magdala kumateti Mariaki hu'za oti'naze.
Nerera'ene, amage' nentegeno avesi nentea disaipoli ne' ene anante oti'nakeno Jisasi'ma neznageno'a, Agra nereranku huno, A'moka ko, ama'ne kagri ne'mofavrea!
Anante amage' nentea disaipoli neku hu'ne, Ko, kagri negrera'a ama'ne! Ana knareti agafa huno amage' nentea disaipoli ne'mo ana ara avreno noma'are vu'ne.
Anama huteno'a, Jisasi antahino keno hiama maka'zamo hago vgaregeno, Anumzamofo avontafemo hu'nea kea eriknare huteno, tinku navenesie, huno hu'ne. (Sam-Zga 69:21)
Mago mopa kavofi akake waini ti aviteno anante menege'za, kapuki eri'za hisopu zafare anakite'za, ana aka waini timpi rete'za (spons) erisaga hu'za agite ante'naze.
Ana hzageno Jisasi'ma ana akake waini tima neteno'a, Agra hu'ne, Ha vgare! nehuno Agra kepri huno avamu'a atre'ne.
Anante retrotra huknazmi me'negu hu'za, mni fruhu kna (sabat) efregahianki rugeka zafare kerfa'a omnesie hu'naze, (na'ankure kinafinti zamavre'nea knagu antahimiza ne'za nenaza knane, mni fruhu (sabat) knanena magoka ra kna'zmi me'negu hu'za,) Jiu kva vahe'mo'za huza, zamagia ru hantagi tenketa, anante fri kerfa eri mopafi atreta, erita vamneno hu'za Paeroti antahige'naze.
Higeno sondia vahe'mo'za e'za, Jisasine znahe'za hanti'naza netremo'kizni znaga ru hantagi'naze, pusante mago'mofo ru'hantagiteno, mago'mofona henka ana hu'ne.
Hianagi Jisasinte'ma e'za eme kazana, ko fri'nege'za tarega agia ruha'ontagi'naze.
Hianagi mago sondia ne'mo krugru kevereti Agrira asopafi regeno, hantaka huno korane, avufa rimo'ene herfino evu'ne.
E'i ana zama ke'nea ne'mo ama naneke huama huno kre'ne, agrama hu'nea nanekea tamage hu'ne, agra antahi'neno tamage huno nehie. Ana hanigenka kagranena anazanke hunka kmentinti hugahane.
Na'ankure ama anazama fore hu'neana, Anumzamofo avontafepi kre'nea nanekemo nena'a fore hanigu huno, agri zaferina magore huza ruha ontagigahaze hu'ne (Sam-Zga 34:20)
Ete mago avontafemo mago'ene huno, Zamagra zamuma kesazana, agri'ma krugru asopafi re'namofonte kegahaze huno hu'ne. (Sek 12:10)
Anazama vgaregeno Arimatia kumateti ne' Josefe, Jisasi amage' nentea disaipoli ne'mo, Jiu kva vahe koro nehuno oku'a Jisasi fri'kerfa erino vanigu Paerotina antahige'ne. Antahigegeno Paeroti'a hugnare huntegeno agra vuno Jisasi fri'kerfa ome erino vu'ne.
Nikodimasi mago kenage, Jisasinte e'nea ne'mo, Josefe'ene tragoteno eno, mana nentake msavena miane, alone, magopi tagi havia hu'nea masvena kna'zanimo 34 kilo'naza hu'nea erino vu'ne.
Anante znagra Jisasi fri'kerfa eri'ne, ana masaventami avufare frente'ne, tvarave tafepi frikerfa'a kargina'e. Jiu vahe'mo'za vahe ase nezmante'za nehaza avu'ava hu'na'e.
Anama ahe'za Agri'ma hanti'naza kaziga hoza me'negeno, anante ksefa havegana, vahera ase ozmante'naza havega ana hozafina me'ne.
E'ina hu'negu Jiu vahe'mokizmi mni fru hunaku retro tra nehaza kna'zmi (sabat) atupa hige'za, ana tva'onte me'nea havegampi Jisasina eri'za ome asente'naze.
Pusa zgegna Sonta zupa msa osu'negeno, ko'atu hanimpi Magdala kumateti Maria, Jisasi asente'naza kerirega kenaku uhnatino ome keana, ana keri agite runknire'naza havea ko atufe atre'negeno ome ke'ne.
Ome keama agite renkanire have retufe atre'nageno, ete rukrahe huno agareno eno Saimon Pitane, mago amage nentegeno Jisasi avesi'nentea disaipoli ne'ene eme znasmi'ne. Ramofo fri'kerfa'a kerifintira hago erisaga hu'za iga Agrira ome ante'nafi onke'none.
Zanasamige'ne Pita'ene mago'ma amage' ante'nea disaipoli ne'ene ana keri ome kenaku vu'na'e.
Tarega'moke znaga re'ne nevapinti, mago'ma amage' ante'nea disaipol ne'mo, Pitana agtereno kagota huno asente'naza havegantera uhanati'ne.
Uhnatino upri huno ome keana anoma vazinte'naza tavrave (linen) anante me'negeno ke'ne, hagi agra ana havegamofo agu'afinka umre ori'ne.
Anante Saimon Pita'a amage'a ne-ereti ehnatino ana havegampi evumareri'ne, marerino ome keana avufare karagi'naza tavrave anantera me'negeno ke'ne,
avugosafi tavravene Jisasi anunte karaginte'naza tavravene, avufare karaginte'naza tavravenena, omne'negeno ke'ne. Hianagi avugosafi tavravea regazri'za rure antageno me'negeno ke'ne.
Anante amage nentea disaipoli ne'ma ese'ma kerire ehanati'nemo, mrerino ome negeno tamage huno amentinti hu'ne.
Na'ankure Anumzamofo avontafepima Jisasi friteno otigahie hu'naza nanekea, zamagra antahi ani osune'za ana hu'naze.
Ana huteke tarega amage' nenta'a disaipol ne'tremoke, noznirega atre'ne vu'na'e.
Hianagi Maria'a fegi'a ana havegante oti'neno zvi neteno mani'ne. Zavi netereti pri huno ana have kamofo agu'afinka keana,
tare ankero netremoke efe kukena hute'ne mani'nakeno, Jisasima antemse'nare znage'ne, mago'mo agama me'nea kaziga manigeno, mago'mo asenima me'nea kaziga manigeno hu'na'e.
Znagra ana a'mofonku amanage hu'na'e, Ama a'moka na'anku zvira netane? Maria ke nonaznire huno, na'ankure Ranimofona inantega eri'za vu'nazo, inantega ante'nazo nagra ontahi'noe.
Anagema a'mo huteno rukrahe'ma hiana, Jisasi anante oti'negeno keanagi, Jisasi'e huno ontahi'ne.
Jisasi ana a'ku huno, A'moka na'anku zavira netane? Azanku nehakrane? Na'ankure ana a'mo antahiana hoza kva nehia nere nehuno Agriku hu'ne, Kva vahe'moka, Jisasina inante ome ante'nampi naveri hananke'na Agrira ome eri'na vugahue
Jisasi ana a'ku hu'ne, Maria! Higeno a'mo rukrehe huno Jisasinku Hibru kefinti, Rabonai! (ana kemofo agafa'a Hibru kefina Hurami ne're) hu'ne.
Jisasi'a ke nona'a huno, Nagrira eme navako osuo, na'ankure Nenfantega mreori'noe, hianagi vunka nafu'heina ome zamasmio, Nagri'ene tmagri'ene Nerfante, Nagra mrerigahue. Nagri Anumzane tmagri Anumza mani'nerega, vugahie hunka ome zamasmio,
Magdala kumateti Maria'a ete rukrahe huno eazamo, amage' nentaza disaipol naga'a eme zamasmino, Nagra Rantimofona ke'noe! Ana a'mo Jisasi'ma hu'nea ke eme zamasmi'ne.
Ana zupa kinaga, eri'za knamofona ese zupa Sonta, haninkige'za amage nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za Jiu kva vaheku zamagoro hu'za kafa eri ki'za no agu'afi mani'nageno, Jisasi eazamo amu'nozmifi eme otino zamagriku anage hu'ne, Tamarimpamo fru hino, huno zamasmi'ne.
Anagema Agra huvgareteno, tarega azane, ratimpa avufane zamaveri higeza nege'za amage' nentaza disaipol nagamo'za, Rantie hu'za muse hu'naze.
Ru'ene Jisasi zamasmi'ne, Tamarimpamo fru hino, Nenfa hunantege'na e'noaza hu'na, Nagra anazanke hu'na huneramantoe.
Anage Agra huteno, Jisasi asimu'a zamagrite huhu huvazi nezmanteno, Ruotge Avamu eriho.
Hagi tamagra vahe'mokizmi kumi atre zamantesageno'a, kumi'zmia atre zamantegahie, hagi tamagra ma kumi'zmi atre ozmante sageno'a, atre ozmante'gahie.
Hianagi Tomasi, mago 12fu'a amagema nentaza disaipol nagapinti, Didimasi'e nehazana, ana agimofo agu'agesa kugavezare nehaza ne'mo Jisasi'ma e'nea zupa omni'negeno e'ne.
Ana hu'negu mago'a amage nentaza disaipol nagamo'za asmi'za, Tagra Ramofona ke'none! Hianagi agra ke nona zamire zamasmino, Azante niri afuhe nege'na niri afuhete avako nehu'na, ratimpare nazama avako hutesu'nage, nagra namentintia hugahue.
7'a zgegna agaterege'za, rosaza hu'za amage' nentaza disaipol nagamo'za, Tomasi'ene magopi kafana erigi'za mani'nazageno, zamagri amu'nompi Jisasi eme otino, Tamarimpa fru eriho, huno hu'ne.
Anante Tomasinku huno, Kza antegma atenka kza avozareti, Nagri nazana avako hunka ko. Kza antegma atenka nasopare antenka ko. Kmentintifina krogro onkio, hianagi kamentinti huo.
Tomasi ke nona huno Jisasi asmi'ne, Nagri Ranimoka, nagri Anumzane!
Jisasi agriku hu'ne, Kagra Nagri nagetenka kmentintia hugahampi? Onage'neza zamentinti hanamo'za, Asomura erigahaze, huno Jisasi'a hu'ne.
E'izanku hakare'a kaguvazama Jisasi'a amage nentaza disaipol naga'mokizmi zamufi huzmeri'ne. Ana zantmina ama avontafepina kre onte'noe.
Hianagi ama kre'naza avomo hugasmisigenka kmentinti nehunka, Jisasi'a Tzahu ne', Anumzamofo Ne'mofavre, Kraisi'e hunka kmentinti hanunka kagra manivava mani'zana Agri agireti erigahane.
Henka'a Jisasi'a mago'ene Taeberias mago agi'a Galili tiru ankenare, amate efore huzmerige'za amage' nentaza disaipol naga'amo'za ke'naze. Ama'amokizmire efore hige'za ke'naze.
Saimon Pita'ma, Tomasi mago agi'a Didimasi'ma, Natanael Kana kumateti ne'ene, Zebedi nemofokegi, tare amage' nenta'a disaipol netrene atru hu'za mani'naze.
Saimon Pita zamasmino, nagra nozame kuko atreku nevue higeno, tagra anazanke huta magoka vugahune, nehu'za ventefi mreri'za vu'naze. Ana kengera magore hu'za nozamea avazu osu'naze.
Anante ko'ma atigeno, nanterana Jisasi'a tinkenare oti'neanagi, amage nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za, Jisasi'e hu'za keso'e osu'naze.
Anante Jisasi zamasmi'ne, Mofavre nagare tamagra nozamea avazu osu'naze, tamageo? Huno zamantahigege'za, zamagra ke nona'a izo avazu osu'none, hu'za hu'naze.
Agra zamasmino, kukon tmia eritma ventemofo tmaga kazigati omo atretma, mago'a nozamea avazu hugahaze. Hige'za ana kukoma atrete'za, avazu hu'zanku kasgeke hu'naze, na'ankure rama'a nozamemo ana kukompi frevitege'za ana hu'naze.
Jisasi'ma avesi nentea disaipol ne'mo Pitanku anage hu'ne, antu e'i Ramo'e! Saimon Pita'ma antahiama Rane higeno'a, amega kukena'a eri hankre'ne, (na'ankure timpi eri'za erinaku agra atova hutre'nereti ana hu'ne), timpi tkaureno nagosa runo ti ankenarega vu'ne.
Hianagi mago'a amage' nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za osi ventefi e'naze, na'ankure mopa afete'are omne'negeze. Hagi 100ti'a mita zaza'a hu'nege'za nozame zgamo avi'ma te'nea kukona avazu huzma e'naze.
Zamagrama tinkenare e'za eme kazana tanknuza (sakol) teve hegre'nare, mago nozamene, breti'ne ana tevere menege'za ome ke'naze.
Jisasi, zamagriku huno, Menima azeri'za nozamefinti mago'a eritma eho.
Higeno Saimon Pita'a ventefi mrerino ana kukona avazu huno tinkenare e'ne. Ranra nozamea 153'amo avite'ne, mago'a rama'a nozamemo kukompina ufre'neanagi, ana kukona tagato osu'ne.
Jisasi'a zamagriku anage hu'ne, Eta nantera ne'za eme neho. Hianangi amage' nentaza disaipol nagapinti mago'mo, Kagra azage, hu'za antahige'zankura koro hu'naze, na'ankure zamagra Rane hu'za ko antahi'naze.
Jisasi eno breti emerino zamagrira nezmino, nozamea anazanke huno zami'ne.
Fri'nefinti Jisasi'ma otino zameri'neana, tagufa (3) zupa amate efore huzmerige'za amage' nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za ke'naze.
Nantera ne'zama nehna hutageno, Jisasi'a Saimon Pitanku huno, Saimon, Joni nemofoga, kagra ama vahe'zga zamagterenka Nagrikura kvesinenantampi? Huno antahi'gegeno, Ozo Ramoka, Kagra antahi'nane, nagra navesi negantoe. Jisasi'a asmino, sipisipi nagani'a ne'za zamio.
Jisasi'a tare zupa mago'ene asmi'ne, Saimoni, Joni nemofoga, Nagrikura kve'nesio? Ozo, Ramoka, Kagra antahi'nane nagra Kagrira navesi negantoe, Jisasi agriku hu'ne, Sipisipi zga'ni'a kegva huo.
Jisasi'a tagufa zupa ana kege huno asmi'ne, Saimon, Joni nemofoga, Nagrikura kvesi nenantano? Higeno Pita'a arimpa kna hu'ne, na'ankure tagufa zupama Nagrikura kve'nesio? Huno antahigea zankure. Pita'a Agriku hu'ne, Ramoka, Kagra maka'zana antahi'nane. Nagrama navesi negantoana Kagra antahi'nane. Higeno Jisasi ke nona'a asmino, Sipisipi zga'ni'a ne'zana zamio hu'ne.
Tmagerfa hu'na negasmue, Kagrama kahefa'ma mani'nantera kenakarera kamu'nofi hunka kvesi'zante kana vano hu'nane, hianagi ranafa resunka, kzana rutaresanke'za rumo'za kagrira kukena hugante'za, ovuku hanantega kavare'za vugahaze.
(Menima Jisasi'ma hu'neana, Pitama henka frino Anumzamofoma ra agi ami'nia zanku huama hu'ne.) Ana kema Agra huteno, Jisasi'a Pita asmino, Namage anto! Huno asmi'ne.
Pita'a rukrahe huno keana, Jisasi avesi avesi hunentegeno amage' nentea disaipoli ne'mo znavaririno e'ne. Ana nera Jisasi ahihi'zafi umase tragoteno ne'zama nenafima antahigeno, Ramoke, iza Kagrira vahe zamazampina kazerino antegahie? Huno antahige'nea ne' e'ne.
Pita'ma ana ne' negeno'a, Jisasina antahige'ne, Ramoke, ama nera nankna hugahie?
Jisasi ke nona'a agri asmino, Nagrama, Agriku mani'nesige'na ete'na esuema hanua knarera, kagri'zana omne'neanki, na'ane hugahane? Kagra namage anto!
Higeno anama hu'nea kemo'a Jisasinte zamentinti nehaza nagate vuno eno higeno, ama'na disaipol nera ofrigahie hu'naze. Hianagi Jisasi'a, agrikura ofrigahie huno osu'ne, hianagi frisio manisio Nagrama mani'nesigena e'tena esue hanuazamo'a kagri'zana omne'neanki, na'ane hugahane? huno hu'ne.
Ama'na disaipol ne'mo agra'a amazana huama huno ana zantamina kre'ne, higeta tagra antahita agri kegura (testimoni) tamage huta nehune.
Hagi hakare ruga'a zama Jisasi'a hu'nea zana me'ne, ana maka'zama avon tafepima kre'neresina, nagrama antahuana ama mopafina avon tafemo'a titipa higeno, anama kraza avontafe ante kankamuna omneresine.
Nagra Luku'na, ese avontafe'ma kre'nofina, Tiofolisiga ko kasmi'noe, Jisasi'ma agafa huno hakarezama nehuno rempima hunezamigeno,
avreno monafinka vu'nea knare ehanati'ne. Hianagi vunaku nehuno Agrama zamavare'nea aposol nagara ruotge Avamu'mo aza higeno, eri'zama erisaza'zanku zamasmi'ne.
Ana amage nentea aposol nagateke, atama erino fri'nefinti otino, Nagra mani'noe huno 40ti'a zage'gnafina zamavure vano nehuno, anahu kna huno Agra rama'a kampinti, ruzahu ruzahu ke nehuno, mika'zama Anumzamofo kumapima me'nea avu'ava zanku kea nehige'za nege'za antahi'naze.
Ko'ma zamagrane mani'neno'a, anage huno huzmante'ne, Jerusale kumara otretfa hiho, hianagi Nenfa'ma huvempa huno huhampri nante'nea zanku'ma tmasmi'noana avega antetma maniho.
Na'ankure Joni'a tintfanu mono tina frezmante'ne, hianagi ama knaretira upa knafi, tamagra ruotge Avamuteti tina fregahaze.
Aposol nagamo'za eritru hu'za magopi manite'za, agafa hu'za Jisasina antahige'naze. Ramoka amagna, Israeli vahe'mokizmi nomani'za zamazeri fatgo nehu'na, kva krizmantegahue hu'nana knafi?
Agra anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamagri'zana omane'neakita tamasmi'sugeta ontahigahaze, nanknarero, nanknafino Nenfa'a agra hanave'afi, anankna huhamprinte'ne.
Hu'neanagi ruotge Avamumo tamagrite esigetma, tusi'a hanave eritetma, Nagri nagenkea Jerusale kumate huama nehutma, Judiane Sameriane huama nehutma, afete mopa omeatre eme atre arega ome huama hugahaze.
Ana naneke zamasmiteno, negageno hampompi ufrege'za onke'naze.
Monafi kete'za mani'nageno, ame' huno efeke kukena hu'na'a ne'tremoke anante oti'ne'ne,
anage hu'na'e, Galili vahe'mote na'a higetma amarera oti'netma monafinka negaze? Ama ana Jisasi tmatreno monafi negageno mreri'neaza huno, ete anahu kna huno egahie, huke zamasmi'na'e.
Anante mago agona Olivie nehaza agona atre'za Jerusale e'naze, e'i ana agona Jerusale tva'onte me'ne, kama vu'amo'a, mani fruhu kna zupa vute'za neaza avamente me'nea agone. (1 kilomita avamenteku hu'ne.)
Zamagrama Jerusale ufrete'za, nemaniza nompi anagame umreri'za hunaragintepinka mani'naze. Pita ene Joniki, Jemisi ene Endruki, Filipi'ene Tomasiki, Bataromio ene Matiuki, Jemisi Alfiasi nemofo ene Saimon Zelaiotiki, Judasi nemofo Jemisiki hu'za anampi umani'naze.
Maka ana naga'mo'za magoke antahintahifi maka'zupa nunamu nehu'za mago'a a'nene, Meri Jisasi nerera'zane, Jisasi nefu'za mani'naze.
Ana knafina zamentinti nehaza nagapinti Pita'a 120ti'a naza naga amu'no zamifi otino anage hu'ne.
Nafuhete, Ruotge Avamumo ko Deviti asmigeno avontafe krente'neana, Judasi zamareno vige'za ha' vahe'mo'za azeri'naze kemo'a avufa'a forehie.
Tagrane mani'neno, agra ama mono eri'zana eri'ne.
(Menina Judasi havi avu'ava'mo ana mopa miza se'ne, ana mopafi kanahegeno rimpamo tagatiramine.
E'ina huno frige'za Jerusale kumate vahe'mo'za ana naneke nentahi'za ana mopagu Aramu kefi Hakaltemie hu'naze, zamagra kefina Korantmi'nea mope hu'naze.)
Anazanku Zgame avontafipina anage huno kre'ne, Atregeno mago'zana noma'afina omaneno, Anampina atregeno mago vahere huno omanino, (Sam-Zga 69:25), Atregeno mago vahe'mo agri nona erino, eri'zana erino huno avona krente'ne. (Sam-Zga 109:8)
Ana hu'negu tagra mago ne azeri otisunkeno, Judasi nona erisie. Ana ne'mo'a tagrane maka knama, Ramo Jisasi'ma mani'nereti vuno,
Joni'ma mono tima fre ante'nea knareti eno, tagripinti avareno monafi vu'neaza ke'nenimo, fri'nefinti oti'neazana huama huno tagranena vano hugahie.
Ana hute'za tare ne'tre znazeri oti'naze, Josefenku Banabasi'e (nehaza ne'kino mago' agi'a Jastusi'e) magora Matiasi'e.
Ana hute'za nunamu hu'za, Ramoka kagra hakare vahe'mofo zamarimpa ke'nane. Hanki ama tare ne' trenpintira, inamofo huhampri antenampi taveriho.
Ama ana eri'za erinogura, kamagema'ante'nea aposol ne' Judasi eri'zana atreno kuma'arega vu'ne.
Anante mago'zokago (lots) Tais zokago reza kazageno, Matiasi huhampri'naza su'amo eama hige'za, Matiasi azeri otizageno, 1lni'a aposol nagapi ufre'ne.
Kasefa hoza vasage kna Pentikos ege'za, aposol nagamoza mago nompi atru hu'naze.
Ana hu'za mani'nageno amehuno zaho'mofo agasasamo hiaza huno, tusi'a agasasa runo monafinti eramino mani'naza nompi avite'ne.
Tevemofo agefu'nagana huno, tagareno vuno eno huno, magoke magoke'mofonte emani'ne.
Maka'mofona Ruotge Avamu'mo zamagu'afi viteno, zamazeri otige'za, Avamu'mo zamasamia kante ante'za, agafa hu'za aru agerupinti kea hu'naze.
Ana knafina knare hu'za amage ante'naza Juda vahe'mo'za, mopane mopane kotegati e'za Jerusale kumate emani'naze.
Ana agasasa fore nehige'za, miko vahe'mo'za atru hu'za na'a fore nehie hu'naze. Na'ankure mago mago'mo'a agra'a agerupi antahitere hu'ne.
Zamagra antri nehu'za anage hu'naze, ana maka Galili vahe'mo'za kea nehazanki na'a fore nehie?
Na'a higeta tagra mago mago'mota tagra mofavremota nehuna tagerupina nentahune?
Tagra rukotegati rukotegati (Amama mani'nona vahera) Patia mopareti'ene, Medes mopareti'ene Elami mopareti'ene, Mesopotemia mopareti'ene, Judia mopareti'ene, Kapatosia mopareti'ene, Pontasi mopareti'ene, Esia mopareti'ene,
Frigia mopareti'ene, Pamfilia mopareti'ene, Isipi mopareti'ene, Livia kazigati'ene, Sairini mopareti ene, Romuti nantu vahe'ene, Hibru vahe'ene, megi'a vahe'mo'za zamagu'a rukrahe hu'naza vahe'enene.
Kriti mopareti'ene Arab mopareti vahe'mota tagra hanavenentake avu'ava'zama Anumzamo'ma hia zana tagerupi nentahune!
Maka'mo'za mago'ene na'a fore nehie nehu'za, tusi'za hu'za antahintahi hakare hu'naze. Zamagra'a ohumi ahumi nehu'za anage hu'naze, Na'a amazana fore nehie?
Hianagi mago'amo'za anama haza zankura anage hu'za zamagi'za nereza, zamagra kahefa waini ti ne'za negi nenegahaze! Hu'za hu'naze.
Hianagi Pita otino 11ni'a amage' nentaza naga'ane mani'neno, ranke huno zamasmino, tamagra Judia vahe'ene, miko Jerusale mani'namota ama huankea tamagesa anteta antahi ankereho.
Amama kema nehaza zanku'ma tamagesa hakare nehazana, menina nantera 9 kiloki hu'neanki'za, zamagra negi tina one'naze.
Hu'neanagi ama'i korapa kasnampa ne'mo, Joeli hu'nea nanekemofo avufa'a meni negaze.
Hagi vagare knafina, Anumzamo'a anage hu'ne, Nagra Avamuni'a vahepi eri herafi atresugeno, tamagri ne'mofa tamimo, kasnampa kea huama nehina, kasefa vahe'mo'za ava'na keaza nehanageno, ranafa tamimo'za ava'na kegahaze.
Nagri eri'za vahete'ene, vene'nere ene, a'nerera Nagra Avamu'ni'a ana knafina eri herafi atresugeno zamagra kasnampa kea hugahaze.
Nagra monafina ruzahu'za eri fore nehu'na, kaguva avame'za ama mopafina erifore nehu'na, korane, tevene, hampone tokira hugahie.
Zgemo'a rukrahe huno hani hanigeno, ikamo'a kora hanigeno, henka tusi'a hanave'nentake Ramofo kna egahie.
Ana nehanigeno miko vahe'mo'za, Ramofo agi hanta nevazisamo'za zamu'vazinke'za knare kuma erigahaze. (Jol 2:28-32)
Israeli vahe'motma ama kea antahiho, Nazareti ne' Jisasina, Anumzamo azeri oti'nea ne'mo, kaguva zane ruzahu'zane, avame'zana Anumzamo'a, Agripi runtanino amuno tamifina eri'zana erigeta, keta antahita hu'naze.
Ama ana nera, Anumzamo antahino ahegahaze huno korapa retro hu'nea kante antetma, tamagra avaretma megi'a vahe zamazampi antage'za, keka zafare hanto ahegeno fri'ne.
Hianagi Anumzamo'a fri'nefinti azeri otino, fri'zamofo atazampinti azeri so'e hu'ne. Na'ankure frizamofo hanave'amo'a azerintega osu'ne.
Deviti'a amanahu ke agriku hu'ne, Nagra maka zupa negogeno, Ramo'a navuga nemanie, na'ankure Agra nza tmaga'a mani'neankino, nazeri kazara osugahie.
E'ina hu'negu nagu'amo'a so'e nehanigeno, nagipintira tusi'a musenkemo atiramigahie. Navufamo'enena anazanke huno fore'ma haniazanku avega anteno manigahie.
Na'ankure kagra nagu'namena fri vahe kumapina (Heidis), otregahane, huge atresankeno Ruotge hu'nemo'a kerifina okasrigahie.
Kagra mani'zanimofo kana ko eri'ama hunami vare'nane. Kagrama navate'ma nemaninkeno'a, musezamo avinete, huno Deviti'a hu'ne. (Sam-Zga 16:8-11)
Nafuhete, nagra fatgo hu'na neramasmu'e, mago tahiti'a Deviti'a frige'za asentageno, keri'amo'a menina tagrane me'ne.
Na'ankure agra kasnampa nekino antahine, Anumzamo'a mago negeho avareno tra'are (kini trate) antesigeno mani'nigu averino huvempa hu'ne.
Deviti'a kegamuteno, Kraisi friteno otisniazana ke'ne, fri vahe kumapina (Heidis) avufamo'a atresigeno zaza kna omaneno, onkasrisia zanku hu'ne. (Sam-Zga 16:10)
E'i ana Jisasina, Anumzamo'a fri'nefinti azeri otigeta, tagra maka'mota tavufinti ke'nona zanku nehune.
Ana higeno Anumzamo ragi nemino, azantamaga kaziga'a avarentegeno, huvempama hu'nea Ruotge Avamura Nefampinti erino, eritagitregeta menina negeta nentahita nehaze.
Na'ankure Deviti'a monafinka mareori'neanagi, Deviti agra'a huno, Ramo'a, nagri Ramofonku huno, Naza tamaga kaziga mani'nege'na,
Nagra ha' vaheka'a zamazerina kagia tra antesugenka, kagiareti arentrako hugahane huno hu'ne. (Sam-Zga 110:1)
E'ina hu'negu, maka Israeli vahe'motma tamage hutma antahi ankereho, tamagrama aheta hanti'naza nera, Anumzamo azeri otigeno, Ra vahe tro huno Kraisi mani'ne.
Ana kema zamagrama nentahizageno, kemo'a zamarimpafi agonaza zamareaza hige'za, Pitanku ene ruga'a aposol nagaku anage hu'naze, tafuhete tagra na'a hugahune?
Hazageno, Pita'a zamagrikura anage hu'ne, tamagu'a rukrahe nehutma, Jisas Kraisi agifi mono tina frenkeno, kumi'timia apaseramante'na, ruotge Avamu'mofo museza tamagra erigahaze.
Na'ankure huvempama hu'neana tamagri'ene, mofavre tamimofonku'ene, afete mani'namokizmigu'ene, ruga'a vahera tagri Ra Anumzamo zamagi hanige'za, Agrite egahaze.
Rama'a ruga'a ke Pita'a huama nehuno, zamazahuke zamasami'ne. Kefo zampima mani'naza vahe'pintira, manigneta manisaza zamo tamagu'vazina, knare huta manigahaze.
Agri kere zamentintima haza nagapintira, monoti fre'naze, anazupage tima fre'nazana, 3tauseni'a nazamo'za fre'naze.
Ana vahe'mo'za aposol nagamokizmi naneke antahiza atru hu'za monora rempi hu'za nentahiza, magopi breti kori'za nene'za (Lords sapa) nunamuna hu'naze.
Aposol nagamo'za hakare ruzahu'zane, kuguva'zana erifore nehazageno, maka'a vahe'mo'za nege'za zamanogu nehu'za amazana na'za fore'nehie hu'naze.
Hanki Jisasinku zamentinti hu'naza vahe'mo'za tragote'za nemani'za, maka'za zamia omi'ami nehu'za,
mago'a zazamine, mopa zaminena agafa hu'za zagore atrage'za, miza'sage'za zago eri'za upama hu'naza vahe refako hu'za zami'naze.
Maka kna ra mono (tempol) kumapi atru hu'za mono kea nehu'za, zamagu'a anterami'za, zamarimpa fruregati nonte nonte bretia koriza nene'za kave'zamia fako hutere hu'naze.
Anumzamofo agi hentesga nehazageno, mago'a vahe'mo'za ana vahe'mokizmi muse huzmante'naze. Ana nehazageno Anumzamo zamagu'ma vazi'nea vahe'mo'za mago mago kna rama'a efare'naze.
Mago zupa, Pita'ene Jonikea, ra mono nontega nunamuhu knare, mago kiniga 3 kiloki higeke marerike nevakeno,
mago nera, nerera agu'afinti agia frinea ksente'nea nera zafa hu'za vazaza'mo'za ra mono nomofo kasana, knare so'e kasane hu'za agia nehare ome ante'naze. Mika zupa anante ome ante'nageno mani'neno, mono nompima umreriza vahekura, azama hanagu meme nehiane.
Ana nemo'a znagege'ne Pita'ene Jonikea ra mono nompi umreri'snuanki nehakeno, ana ne'mo'a zgogu znantahige'ne.
Hianagi Pitake Jonikea avufi kefatago huke negeke, kma tagrira tago! Huno Pita'a hu'ne.
Higeno, ana ne'mo mago'a zana zanagritegati erigahue huno agu'agesa antahi'ne.
Hianagi Pita'a anage hu'ne, silvane, kolinena e'ori'noanki, nagrama eri'noazana kamigahue. Jisas Kraisi Nazareti ne'mofo agifi, otinka vuo!
Nehuno Pita'a azantmaga'a ana nera azerino azerioti'ne. Anama nehigeno'a ame' huno agia avozamo'ene, agia avu'a zaferinamo'a hanaveti'ne.
Higeno agra haru huno marerino tamino nehuno, agia reno vu'ne. Pita'ene Joni'ene magoka ra mono'nompi nevuno, haru huno marerino tamino huno nevuno, musenkase huno Anumzamofo agi erisaga hu'ne.
Ana hige'za miko vahe'mo'za negageno nevuno, Anumzamofo agia hesga hu'ne,
hige'za mika vahe'mo'za nege'za, ra mono (tempol) nomofo knare so'e kasante mani'neno zagogu meme nehia ne'mo amanahura nehianagi, nankna hu'neha hu'za tusi'a antri nehu'za zamagogogu hu'naze.
Pitane Joni kizni ana ne'mo zanazeri'negeke, mika vahe krerfamo'za magoka zamagare'za zamagritega Solomonine hu'za humegi atre'naza nompi, vano nehaza kante tusi zamagogogu nehu'za e'naze.
Hianagi anama hazaza Pita'a negeno, anage huno ana vahe'zga zamasmi'ne, Israeli vahe'motma nahigeta amanahu zankura antri nehutma, tamagogogura nehuta, tagrira uruhara neragaze? Tagritia hanaveretiro, Anumzamofo avu'ava hu'azamo azeri otigeno kana vifi? I'o,
Abrahamune, Aisakine, Jekopu Anumzana tafahe'i Anumzamo kesga nehia eri'za Ne'a Jisasina, Paeroti atrenigeno vunaku nehigeta, tamagra ma azeritma ha' vahe azampi ahenogu nenteta, Paeroti ne'mofo avufi tamefi humi'naze.
Hianagi tamagra fatgo huno ruotge hu'nea Nera, tamefi humitma vahe'ma ahenefria neku avare atreho, hazage'za avare'za tamami'naze.
Hagi tamagra Asimu'mofo agafa ahe fri'nazanagi, Anumzamo azerioti nemofo, tagra tamage huta tavufinti ke'no'a zanku nehu'e.
Hagi Jisasi, Agri agire tamentinti hu'azamo, e'i ama ana agimo amama negaza nera azeri knare hu'ne. Hagi Jisasinte amentinti hu'nea zamo, mika vahe'moka kavufina agrira azeri so'e hu'ne.
Menina nafuhete, nagra tamantahi'noe, ontahinetma Jisasima tamavutamavama hunte'nazana, kva tamimo'za nehazankna hutma ontahi'netma hu'naze.
Hagi korapa Anumzamo'a, Kasnampa vahepima runtaninoma, Kraisia ata hoza erigahie hu'noma hunte'neazamo, ana kante efore hu'ne.
E'i zanku, kasunku hunka kagu'a rukarehe hunka, Anumzamofonte egeno, kumika'a eri atregantegahie.
Ana knafi Rantimofo avateti kahefa hanave ne'e sigeno, hagi ko'ma Agra'ma huramante'nea nera Kraisina huntesigeno egahie. E'i Jisasi'e.
Ama ana Nera monamo avare'anagamu tenesigeno umani'nenigeno, Anumzamo'a mika zana azeri kasefa hugahie, Anumzamo ko' huama hu'ne, korapa knafima ruotge kasnampa vahe'mofo zamagipi huvempa hu'naze.
Mosese'a huno, Ra Anumzamo'a kasnampa nera nagrikna huno tamagri nagapinti azeri otigahie. Agrama na'ane kema haniana, ke'a erizafa hunka amage anto.
Mika vahe'mo'za ana kasnampa ne'mofo kema ontahisnamo'kizmia, zamahe nefrino, vahe'afintira zamahenati tregahie.
Anahu kante maka Samuelinteti'ma eno erami'naza kasnampa vahe'moza, ke nehu'za huama hu'nazana, ama knagu hu'naze. (Diu-Kas 18:15-19)
Tamagra kasnampa vahe'mokizmi mofavre, Anumzamo'ma tmafahe'zanema huvempa huno huhagerafinea kemofo mofavre mani'naze, Abrahamunku'ma huno, Kagri ka'a mofavrefinti, hakare kogna, famomo'a ama mopafina asomura erigahaze hu'ne. (Jen-Agf 22:18)
Na'ankure Anumzamo'a pusante eri'za Ne'a azeri otigeno tagrite e'ne, havi zampintira magoke magoke'mota, tazeri rukarahe huno asomu hurante'ne.
Pita'ene Jonikema ana vahe zganema keaga nehake'za, prisi vahe'ene ra mono nonte kva nehaza kva vahe'mokizmi kva'neki, Sadusi vaheki hu'za znagrite e'naze.
Na'ankure keagama hapina, vahe'ma frisutma, Jisasi hanavefi etetma otigahaze huno zamasmia kegu zamarimpagna hu'naze.
Ana higeno znazerino kina nompi ome znantege'ne mase'na'e. Na'ankure hago kinaga se'negeno'e.
Hianagi mika kema antahi'naza vahe krerafamo'za zamentinti hu'nazana, venene'agema hampri'nazana 5 tauseni'a nazampi mareri'ne.
Msakeno ko atigeno, kasegere ugagota hunaza vahe'ene mono nonte kva vahe'ene Jerusalemi etru hu'naze.
Ugagota hu'nea prisi ne' Ananaisi'a anampina mani'ne. Hagi Kaiafasi'ma Joni'ma Aleksendaki, ugagota hu'nea prisi ne'mofo nagapinti ruga'a mani'naze.
Amu'no zamifima Pitane Joni kizni zanzeri otite'za, agafa hu'za znantahige'naze, Inankna hankavereti ene iza agifi amanahu'zana hu'na'e?
Pitana Ruotge Avamu'mo avite'nea ne'mo, zamagri kenona anage hu'ne, tra kere ugagota hu'naza vahe'ene ranra kva vahere,
menima knare tavutva'ma kri ne'ma hunte'no'a zantema, tagri'ma refko hutma tagesnazana, na'amo higeno ama nera kri'amo'a atrente'ne nehazana,
tamagra ne Israeli vahe'enena antahi ankereho. E'i Nazareti Jisas Kraisima tamagra ma aheta hantizageno, Anumzamo'ma azeri oti'neama, e'ina ne'mofo agire, amama tamugama oti'nea nera kri'amo'a knare huntegeno oti'ne.
Ama ana Jisasina, Tamagra nogi vahe'motma tamavesra hutma retufe atre'naza haveagi, e'i ana havemo'a no renagentete azeri hanaveti have fore hu'ne. (Sam-Zga 118:22)
Mago vahe'mo'e huno tza huga osu'ne, na'ankure ama mopafi vahe'motafina, tahokehehesia agi'a ontami'neanki, magoke ne' Jisas Kraisi agifi, Anumzamo'a tahokehegahie.
Anante'ma ana vahe'mo'za znagazana, Pitake Jonikea, kema ha'ana korera osake'za, zanagrira antahi ama hu'za, avonona osuke, nontega ne'tremoke Jisasi'enena mani'na'e hu'za antahi ama nehu'za tusi antri nehu'za, nankna'za fore nehie hu'naze.
Ana higeno azeri so'e hunte'nea ne', znagranema oti'nege'za nege'za, anazanku kema huznantekea omane'ne.
Hianagi kva vahe'mo'za huznantegeke ana atru zamifintima atirami'ne fegia vake'ne, zamagrazmi ke hugantugma hu'za,
anage hu'naze, ama netrena na'a huznantegahune? Na'ankure ama kri ne' azeri so'e'ma hu'nea kaguvazamo'a, mika Jerusale mani'naza vahe'pina amate hige'za hago ke'nazankita tagra onke'none huta hufra okigahune.
Hianagi ama kemo'ma mago'ane vahepima vuno'eno osanigura, kore ke znasamisunke'ne, mago'ane ama ana agirera mago'a vahera ozanasmisaze huta zanasamisune.
Pitane, Joninena ke hzageke efrake'za zanasmi'za, mago ene Jisasi agirera vahera zamasmige, rempi huzamige osutfa hi'o, hu'naze.
Hianagi Pitake Jonikea, anage huke ke nona zamire hu'na'e, Anumzamofo avurera knare, tmagri ke antahisupi, Anumzamofo ke antahigahu'e, tamagra tmi fako huta antahiho.
Na'ankure tagra keta antahita huno'a zante keaga nehuankita, tagra'ma kema tagane'zamo'a amuho hurantegahie.
Anama hu'za mago'ane korekema huznantete'za, kina huzanante kankmuna hake'za eri fore osu'za hu'zanantage'ne vu'na'e. Na'ankure ana mika vahe'mo'za e'inahu zama fore hiazankura Anumzamofo ra agi amizage'za nege'za, vaheku koro hu'naze.
Na'ankure ana nera 40ti'a zgekfu agatere'nea nete ana avame'zana fore huno azeri so'e hu'ne.
Huma znantegekea, va'azamo'ke, prisi vahe'mo'zane, ranra vahe'mozama makazama humaznante'naza kea magoka zamentinti nehaza naga ome zamasmi'na'e.
Ana kema nentahi'za, mago zamagu zamagesare zamagerura erintesga huza Anumzantega anage huza hu'naze. Maka'zamofo Ramoke, Kagra monane, mopane, hagerine, hagi mika zama anampinkama me'nea zantmina trohu'nane,
Kagra ka'a Avamukafi hankeno Deviti nerafa eri'za ne'kamofo agipi huvazinkeno anage hu'ne, Na'a hige'za kokankoka vahe'mo'za zamasigura nehu'za, osuga'zana huku retro nehaze?
Ama mopafi kini vahe'mo'za magote etru hazage'za, trakere ugagota vahe'tmimo'za zogitru hu'za Ramokane, Kraisinena ha' reneznantaze. (Sam-Zga 2:1-2)
Na'ankure tamagerafa huno Herotiki, Pointus Pailatiki, megi'a vahe'ene, Israeli vahe ene, ama rankumapina zogitru hute'za, Ruotge eri'za Ne'ka'a huhamprinte'nana Jisasina ha' rentaze. Tamage e'i ana avamente Heroti'ene Paeroti'ene ru vahe'ene Israel vahe'mo'zane ama kumate eri atru hu'za manine'za kagri mofavre kagrama hampri'nana nera Jisasina ahenaku hu'naze.
Himamu hanaveka'afima ko antahinka egahie hunka retro hunte'nanazamo efore nehie.
Hagi menina Ramoka, amama tazeri kore'ma hunerantaza'zana ko, tagra kagri eri'za vaheki, tazeri hanavetigeta oti hampona huneta Kagri nanekea huama hugahune.
Kagra kri vahe'ma krizmima zamazeri amane huzantema, tazama nentesunkeka avame zane, kaguva zanena, Kagri ka'a ruotge eri'za ne' Jisasi agire eri fore huo.
Nunamu hutageno, anama zogitru hu'za mani'naza nomo'a kazakaza higeno, ruotge Avamumo'a zamagu'afi avitege'za, Anumzamofo nanekea reku osu'za agafa hu'za hu'naze.
Jisasinte zamentinti nehaza vahe'mo'za raru hu'za mago zamarimpare ene antahintahire nemni'za, tagri' zane hu'za osu'za havia mika'zana omiami nehu'za mani'naze.
Tusi'a hanavereti aposol nagamo'za, Ramo'ma Jisasi'ma fripinti oti'nea nanekea huama nehazageno, zamentintima haza nagara tusi'a asunku huzmante'ne.
Anampima mani'naza kevufintira mago'zankura mago'mo'a upara osu'ne, na'ankure inamofoma mopa'a me'neo, noma'a me'nemo'a zagore atreno ana zago erino,
aposol naga eme zamizage'za, fako hu'za zagogu'ma upa'ma hu'naza vahe zami'naze.
Hagi mago Livae nera, Saiprus hageri amuragozafi ksente'nea nera Josefe'e, mago agi'a aposol nagamo'za antemi'nazana Banabasi'e. (Ana agimofo agafa'a, zamazeri hankaveti ke zamasmi mofavre.)
Hanki agripina mopa'a menegeno ana mopa zagore atreno, ana zagoa erino viazamo aposol nagamofo ome zami'ne.
Ana hutegeno Ananaiasi ene nenaro Safaira enena anahuke, mopa zania zagore atreteke,
nenaro'a mago rimpa huno antahi'negeno, mago'a zagoa refako huno agra suna nenteno, mago'a zagoa erino aposol naga ome zami'ne.
Hu'neanagi Pita'a anage hu'ne, nahigeno Ananaiasiga Sata'a kaguafina efregenka ruotge Avamura revataga hunka mago'a zgoa mopama atrantetira refko hunte'nane?
Zagore'ma otre'nantera, kagri mopa megeno, zagore'ma atrantera, kagri kavesite me'neane. Na'a higenka amanahu antahintahia kagu'afina antahi'nane? Kagra vahe rezmataga osananki, Anumzamofo revtaga hane.
Hagi anankema nentahino'a, Ananaiasi'a traka huno frige'za, anankema antahiza nagatera tusi'a kore'zamo zamagrite e'ne.
Anante nehazave nagamo'za azeri anteno vazite'za, eri'za ome asente'naze.
Tri'a aua evigeno nenaro'a anazama fore hu'neana ontahineno anante e'ne.
Pita'a, anage huno Safairana antahige'ne, zgorema mopama atra'ana, mizana asma'areke atrenampi? nasamio higeno agra anage hu'ne, Izo atreno'a mizana asi'ne higeno,
Pita'a amanage huno Safairana asamine, Nahigetna kagrane negave'enena mago tanarimpa huta Ramofo Avamura reheta nega'e? Negavema ome asentete'za aza vahera, kasante oti'nazanki ko, kagrira anazanke hu'za eri'za vugahaze.
Anage nehigeno agafi hantaka'a traka huno frige'za, nehazave zgamo'za emegazana hago fri'nege'za, erizafa hu'za vazazamo'za, nevema asente'naza asopare ome asente'naze.
Higeno tusi'a kore zamo ana mika mono vahete'ene, ana zama hia kema antahi'naza vahete enena e'ne.
Aposol nagamofo zamazantera, rama'a avame'zane, kuguva zamo mika vahetera fore hige'za, ra mono nompi, Solomoni'e hu'za hunaraginte'pinka ana mika vahe'tamimo'za mago zamarimpa huza magopi atru hu'naze.
Magore hu'za anampintira zamagripina hageorafi'nazanagi, mika vahe'moza kentahiza, agazone hunezmante'za husga huzmante'naze.
Hanki hakare vahe krerfamo'za a'nea, venenea hu'za Ramofonte zamentintia hu'za, rama'a vahekrerfa efre'naze.
Ana higeno mika vahe'mo'za Pita'ma ene vanigeno, amemo'a hagutesie huza kri vahera sesenku huza zafa hu'za kampi, nosiva masi'ne'za zmantage'za mase'naze.
Anazanke huno ranra kuma'ma Jerusalemi me'nefintira, kari'erinea vahepi, havi avamu'mo agu'afi fre'nea vahe tmina zamare'za ageno, maka vahera zamazeri so'e hu'ne.
Hianagi ugagota prisi kva ne'mofo, agri kvafima erizama e'neri'za nagamo'za, (sadusi nagare) aposol nagara kanive rezmante'naze.
Zamagra e'za aposol naga eme zamazeri'za mika vahe'mokizmi kina nompi omezmante'naze.
Hu'neanagi ana kenegera Ramofo ankeromo'a eno kina vahe kafantmina eme anagino, zamareno atineramino, anage huno zamasmi'ne,
Ra mono nompi vutma vahepi omo otitma kahefa mani'za eri'zamofo keaga mika zamasmiho.
Anankema nentahiza, zahufa ko'ma atiama'afi, ra mono nompi umareri'za agafa hu'za rempi huzami'naze. Anante mono nonte ugota kva ne'ene (hae pris), agranema nemni'za naga'ane e'za, kanisol (Senhidren) vahe ke hige'za atru nehazageno, ana maka Isareli kva vahetminena ke hutru hute'za, kina nonte kva vahetega ke atre'za, kinama hu'naza aposol vahera zamaretma eho hu'naze.
Hu'neanagi kina nonte eri'za vahe'mo'za kina nompi eme kazana onke'za, ete'za naneke eri'za vazazamo'za ome zamasmi'za,
anage hu'naze, Ome konana kina nona nofinu hentrako hunte'za, kerage kva vahe'ene ana nonte kegva hu'naza vahe'mo'za kafante otiza mani'naze. Hu'neanagi tagrama anagitama ufronana, agu'afina mago vahere huta onke'none.
Ra mono'nontema kegva nehaza (tempol kat) vahe'mofonte ugagota hu'nea kva ne'ene, mono nonte ugota kva (hae prisi) vahe'mo'za anankema nentahi'za, tusi'za hu'za hava nehu'za antahintahi hu'naze. Amanahu'zamo'a nankna hugahie hu'naze.
Hu'neanagi mago vahe'mo eno, kinama ome huzmante'naza vahe'mo'za, mono nompi otine'za, vahe'zgarmi mono naneke rempi hu'nezmize huno zamasmi'ne.
Mono nonte kva nehia ne'mo'a, magoka sondia vahe'ene vazazamo'za, ana aposol nagara ome zamavare'za e'nazanagi, sondia vahe'mo'za akohe'za agazone hu'za zamavare'za e'naze. (Na'ankure vahe'mo'za have knonu zamahe frizanku kore hu'za razana osu zamare'za e'naze.)
Ome zamare'za ana aposol nagara ete'za kanisol (Senhidren) vahe zamure eme zamazeri oti'naze. Mono nontema ugote'nea nemo'a (hae prisi) zamantahigeno anage hu'ne,
tagra menina hanave kea huta, mago'anena ama ana agifina vahera rempi huozmitfa hiho huramantone. Keho amama rempima huzamiza zamo'a Jerusale kumapina antahi vgaraze, hankino Jisasima ahe'nazana tagriku ahe'naze hutma huneranta'ze.
Hu'neanagi Pita'ene ruga'a aposol nagamo'za kenona zamire anage hu'naze, Anumzamofo ke'age nentahita ama mopafi vahe'mofonkea ontahigahune.
Tagri tafahe'i Anumzamo, keka zafarema ahetma hantinaza nera Jisasina azeri otine.
Anumzamo'a azeri otino aza tmaga kaziga'a anteno, ugagota kva ne' taguvazi nere hu'ne. Agrite Israeli vahe'mo'za zamagu'a rukrahe hanageno, kumizmia eri atrezmantegahie.
Higeta tagra e'i ana zama fore'ma hu'neana keteta, ama anankea hu'ama nehune. Ana higeno tagrama ke'nonazana ruotge Avamumo'a keteno huama hu'ne, kema antahiza avariri'za vahera Anumzamo'a zami'ne.
Kva vahe'mo'za anankema nentahi'zageno'a, tusi zamarimpa hege'za zamahe frinaku hu'naze.
Hianagi Farisi nera Gamalieli'e nehaza ne'mo tra kemofo (lo) kagota huno rempi hunezmige'za, rama'a vahe'mo'za antahinemiza ne'kino otino, osia kna ama vene'ne zga zamare megi'a zamanteho huno huzmante'ne.
Anante amanage huno kansol vahera zamasmi'ne, Israeli vahe'mote, Inazama huzmante'gahune hutma kema retroma hana'zana, antahi so'e hunetma anazana huzmanteho.
Mago'a kna koma evunefina, Tiutasi'a otino, Nagra ra vahe mani'noe hige'za, vahera 400ti'a naza vene'nemo'za, agranena eme hagerafi'naze. Hianagi agrira ahefri'zage'za, amage'ma nentaza naga'moza atre'za panini hazageno mago'zana osu'ne.
Anama hutegeno'a ana mefiga, mago Galiliti nera, Judasi'e nehaza ne'mo, zamagi kre'za erifatago haza knare otino, mago'a vahera zamare agrarega atre'nea nera anazanke huno fri'geza amage'ma antenaza naga'mo'za panini hu'naze.
E'inahu'za fore hu'negu, tamagrira ama nanekea neramasmue, ama nagara mago kea huozmanteta zamatreho. Na'ankure, mopafi vahe'mo'ma amanahu'zama hanigeno'a, amne'zankna hugahie.
Hianagi Anumzantegati'ma ne'esigetma keaga huozmantegahaze. Anama hanutma aru Anumzamofo ha'rentezanku nehue, hige'za nentahi'za zamatre'naze.
Kanisol vahe'mo'za ana zamumro kema nentahi'za, ana aposol nagara kehu'agu'a zamante'za zamazeri'za tusi sefu zamite'za, mago'anena Jisasi agifina nanekea osutfa hiho nehu'za, zmatrage'za vu'naze.
Hige'za aposol nagamo'za ana kanisol naga zamureti'ma zamatre'za nevu'za, Anumzamofo avure mani'neta Jisasi agire'ma eriga knaza erune, nehu'za muse hume vu'naze.
Hanki hakare knafina, ra mono nompi'ne, nonte nontera nevu'za Jisasi'a, tazahu ne' Kraisi'e hu'za knare muse kea rempi hunezmi'za huama hu'naze.
Anama haza knafina, amage nentaza disaipol nagamo'za ra hu'za ame'nanempi mareri'zageno, Griki kema nehaza Jiu vahe'mo'za, Hibru kema nehaza Jiu kuma agafa vahetmina kanive rezamante'za, mika zupa kave'ma fakoma hazana kento a'ne nagara antahi nozamize hu'za hu'naze.
Hage'za 12fu'a aposol nagamo'za ana mika amage'ma nentaza disaipol kevu zamasmizage'za emeritru hazage'za anage hu'naze. Ne'zama fakohu avu'avazamo'a, Anumzamofo nanekema hu'zampina tazeorigahie.
E'ina hu'negu tafuhete, tamagra amu'no tamifinti keso'e hutma 7ni'a vahema zamu'zmamo knare'ma hu'nesnia vahe'ma, Avamu'ene knare antahi'zamo'ma avitenesia vahe zamazeri otinke'za, esageta tagra ama erizana refako huta zamazampi antesune.
Hu'neanagi tagratia nunamu hu'zante'ene, Anumzamofo naneke'a huama huta veamofona zamasmita maka knafina vugahune.
Ana mika vahe kevumokizmia zamesige'za, ana hugahune nehu'za, ana 70ti'a vahe hampri'naze, mago ne'ma hampona amentintine ne' Ruotge Avamu'mo agu'afima avite'nea nera Stiveni huhampriza Filipinki Prokulusinki Nikenanki Taimoninki Pamenasima, mago Antioku ne' Nikolasi'a megi'a nagapinti ne'mo agu'a akrehe huno Jiu monopi amentinti nehia ne' huhampri'za zamaretru hu'naze.
Ana hute'za ana vene'ne zga zamare'za aposol nagate vazage'za zamaza ante'za, nunamu huzmante'naze.
Anumzamofo kemo'a mago'ane ra huno nevigeno, amagema nentaza disaipol nagamo'za Jerusalemi kumapina rama'a efore nehageno, ra'ma'a Jiu prisi vahe'mo'za zamentinti hu'za ke amage'anteme vu'naze.
Ana higeno, Stivenina Anumzamofo asunkuzamo'ene hihamumo avite'negeno, tusi'a kaguva zane, avame'zanena vahe'mokizmi amunompi erifore hu'ne.
Hianagi mago'a vene'nezga, Hibru osi mono nona (Sinagog) vahe zamazeri atre monore nehazafinti Sairini kumate'ene Aleksandria kumate'ene, mago'a Silisiane, Esia rankuma'mo kegva hu'nefinti (provins) vahe'mo'za oti'za Stiveni keha rente'naze.
Hianagi Stiveni'ma knare Avamupine, knare antahizampine kema hiazamofona, zamagra magore hu'za kea osu'naze.
Anante zamagra oku'a mago'a vahera anage hiho hu'za zamasmi'naze; Tagra nentahunkeno Mosesene, Anumzanena zanazeri havizahu kea hu'ne hutma hiho hu'naze.
Ana kema hazazamo vahera zamarimpa zamazeri otigeza, ranra vahe'mo'zane kasere ugagota hunaza vahe'mo'zanena oti'za Stivenina eme avazu hu'za kanisol (Senhitren) vahe zamure vu'naze.
Zamagra pusante havigema hunte vahe zamaretageno, ana vahe'mo'za hu'za ama ne'mo'a, ontagneno Mosese kasegegu'ene, ra mono nonku enena huhaviza hunte'ne hu'za hu'naze.
Na'ankure tagra nentahunkeno ama nemo'a amanage huno hu'ne, Nazareti Jisasi'a eri haviza ruotge mono nona nehuno, Mosesi'ma tami'nea avu'ava'zana, eriatreno kahefa avu'ava eri fore hunaku nehie.
Anankema huntaza fakohu'za kenaku nehu'za ana mika kva vahe'mo'za avugosafima kazana, avugosamo'a ankero vahe'mofo avugosamo msa hiaza hige'za ke'naze.
Ugagota prisi ne'mo'a Stiveniga, amama hunegantaza kemo'a tamagefi?
Higeno Stiveni'a huno, nafuhetane nafaheta mika'motma nagri kea antahiho, nerageho Abrahamu'a, Mesapotamia mani'negeno, Msanentake Anumzamo'a avure ehanati'tegeno henka'a atreno Harania umani'negeno,
Anumzamo'a amanage huno asami'ne, Vaheka'ane mopaka'anena atrenka, kaveri hanua mopare vuo. (Jen-Agf 12:1)
Anante Kaldia mopa atreno, Harani kumate umani'ne. Anante Abrahamu nefa frigeno, Anumzamo'a huntegeno amama menima mani'nana mopare e'ne.
Anumzamo'a mago mopa manisana zane huno Abrahamuna omi'ne, mago osi atupa'e huno refako huomi'ne. Mofavrea onte'tfa hunananagi Anumzamo'a huvempa hu'ne, ana hu'neanagi Nagra kagri'ene mofavre zgaka'a henka zamigahue huno hu'ne.
Hianagi Anumzamo'a amanahu ke huno Abrahamuna asami'ne, Kagehe'za ru vahe mopafi, mopazmi omne vahe umanigahaze. 400 ti'a zgegfu'mofo agu'afina, mopa agafa vahe'mo'za kazokzo eri'za vahe zamavrente'za, kva huso'e huozmantegahaze.
Hianagi Nagrani'a kazokzo eri'za zamisaza mopare vahera, nona'a zamazeri haviza huzmantegahue, huno Anumzamo'a hu'ne. Anama hute'za henka zamagra atre'za e'za ama mopare Nagrira eme nagi hanta vazigahaze. (Jen-Agf 15:13-14)
Anumzamo'a Abrahamu'ene huvempa hagerafikea huno oku avufama tagahu nanekea hutegeno, Abrahamu'a, Aisakina nefaza higeno 8'a zgegnama nemaniana, oku avufa taga hu'naze. Aisaki'a Jekopu nefaza higeno, Jekopua 12fu'a tagehemofona nezmafa mani'ne. (Jen-Agf 17:10-14)
Ana tagehe'mo'za Josefena kanive rente'za mizante atrage'za ru vahe'mo'za avare'za Isipi vu'naze. Ana hu'nazanagi Anumzamo'a agrane mani'neno,
knama nemizageno'a aza nehuno, knare avu'vazane, antahizana Josefena amigeno, Isipi kini ne'mofo Fero avurera knare higeno, Fero'a huntegeno ugagota kva Isipia hu'neno, noma'afima me'neazane nemania vahetera anazanke huno kegva hu'ne.
Anante Isipi mopare'ene Kenani moparera ne'zana fanane higeno, vahe'mo'za tusi'a zamagate'zampi mani'zage'za, tagehe'za mago kavera hakare'za eri fore osu'naze.
Hianagi ne'zana Isipi me'ne kema Jekopu'a nentahino'a, tagehemofona esete ne'za omerihogu huzmantege'za vu'naze.
Anante'ma mago'ane (second time) vazageno'a, Josefe'ne huno agra'agu huama higeno, Fero'a, Josefe afuhe'za e'naza kea antahi'ne.
Anantera Josefe'a ke naneke atrenteno nefa Jekopunku ene ana miko tuzgarazga'agura nagritega eho huno hu'ne, ana mika'a 75fu'e.
Hanki Jekopu'a Isipi umani'neno, anantega agrane tagehezanena fri'naze.
Anantegatira zaferina'a eri'za Sekemu vazazamo'za, Abrahamuma zagoma atreno Hamori mofavre nagapinti'ma mago'a zagoreti'ma mizama asente'nea kerigampi Sekamu ome asente'naze. (Jen-Agf 50:13)
Hu'neanagi, Anumzamo'ma, Abrahamuma huvempama hunte'nea knamo'a kofta huno eku nehigeno, Isipima tagri vahe'ma mani'naza vahe'mo'za tusi vahe krerfa fore hu'naze.
Henka Josefema antahino keno osu'nea kini ne' Isipi fore huno kegva hu'ne.
Ana kinimo'a vahetia rezmatga nehuno, tagehe'ina havi avu'ava hunezmanteno kasefa mofavrema ksentenazana megi'a zamatrenke'za friho huno huhanavetine. (Ekso-Uti 1:82:15)
Anama hianknafi Mosesena ksentegeno Anumzamofo avurera hentofa mofavre fore huteno, 3'a ikamofo agu'afina nefa nompi manitegeno,
henka avare'za megi'a ometrageno, Fero mofamo'a avareno agri'a mofavregna huno kegva hu'ne.
Mosese'a Isipi vahe'mofo antahi'zana rempi huno maka eriteno, kema hu'zampine, avu'ava'zama'afina hankave nentake ne' fore huno mani'ne.
Hu'neanagi 40ti'a zagegafu huku'ma nehuno'a nafuhei, Israeli vahera nantu antezmante nagesahie huno antahi'ne.
Mosese nevuno keana Isipi ne'mo, Israeli kazokzo eri'za nera nehegeno negeno, Israeli ne'mofo ahoke heno Isipi nera ahe fri'ne.
Mosese'a antahiana agri vahe'mo'za antahi ama hu'za, nagripi huvazino Anumzamo'a huntegeno tagrira tahokeheno tavarenaku e'ne hu'za hugahaze huno antahine, hianagi zamagra Mosesena antahi omi'naze.
Umaseno nanterana Mosese'a nevuno keana, tare Israeli ne'tremoke ha' nehakeno, zanarimpa zanazeri fru hunaku, agra amu'noznifi vuno znazeri atrenaku nehuno anage hu'ne, Ama ve rarena, tanagra kogna mani'na'e. Nahigeta hara neha'e?
Magomo'ma haviza huno ahe frinaku nehimo'a, Mosesena retufe kanti netreno anage hu'ne, aza kva mani'nenka tagrira refako hurantegahane?
Kagra okima Isipi ne'ma hae fri'nananankna hunka nagrira nahe frinaku nehampi? (Ekso-Uti 2:14)
Ana kema hia Mosese'a nentahino, Isipia atreno viazamo, Midieni mopare anantega rurega vahe umani'ne. Mosese'ma Midienima umani'neno'a, tare ne'mofavre kseznante'ne.
Foti'a zgegfuma agateregeno mago ankeromo hagage kokampi Sainai agonamofo agiafi osi zafafi teve srasra huno nerefi fore humi'ne.
Mosese'ma anazama negeno'a, naza fore nehieha nehuno kenakuma etvaoma higeno'a, Ra Anumzamo keza tino,
Nagra kagri kagehei Anumzane, Abrahamuma Aisakima Jekopu Anumzane, huno higeno, Mosesena, tusi ahirahitegeno avuge'zankura tusi agogogu nehuno uravao osu'ne.
Higeno Anumzamo'a Mosesena anage huno asami'ne, Kagia nona, kagaretira zafitro, na'ankure e'ima otinana mopa, Ruotge hu'nea mopare oti'nane.
Vahe'nima Isipima manine'za knama e'neriza zana tamage hu'na Nagra ke'noe, zamata hozama zamizage'za krafa kema nehazana Nagra nentahina zamaza hunaku menina erami'noe. Menina kagra eno, hugantesugenka, etenka Isipi vugahane.
E'ima ana Mosesima zamesra hunente'za, anagema hu'za, Iza kagrira kva mani'nenka vahera refko huo huno huntenemofo, e'i ana nera Anumzamo'a hunteno, kva ne' mani'nenka, zamazahu ne' manio huno Anumzamofo ankeromofo azampi osi zafafinti efore huno hunte'ne,
Ana ne'mo zamavreno nevuno Isipi mopare ene koranke hagerinte'ene ka'ma hagege mopafina kaguvazane avame'zana 40ti'a zgegfufina huzmeri hu'ne.
Ama ana Mosese, Israeli vahe'zgagura huno, Anumzamo'a kasnampa vahe'tmia tmagri'pintira nagrima hiaza huno azeri otigahie.
E'i ana ne'mo, vahe kevumokizmi amu'nompima ka'ma mopafi mani'negeno ankeromo Sainae agonafima tagri tagehemokizmi, Anumzamo kea huntegeno asimu erino mani naneke erino'ma eme tmi'nea nere.
Tagri tagehe'za ke'a antahizanku zamefi hunemi'za, retufeganti netre'za, zamagu'afina Isipigura tusi zamagesa antahi'naze.
Eronina amanage hu'za asmi'naze, Kagotama hurantesia anumza'tmina tro huranto, na'ankure ama ana Mosese'ma Isipi mopareti tvarenoma e'nea nera na'a fore humi'nefi tagra antahita keta osu'none hu'naze.
Hige'za ana knafina kolire havi anumzana bulimaka anenta kna huza tro hu'za, kre sramna avuga vunente'za anama zamazanuma troma hazazankura muse hunte'naze. (Ekso-Uti 32:1-10)
Hu'neanagi Anumzamo'a amagena huzmantege'za, zamagra havi anumzantema zagere'ma, ofunte'ma ikante monora hunte'naze, ko'ma kasnampa vahe'moma krente'neana tamagra Israeli vahe'mota ka'ma kokampima kre sramna vu'nazana foti'a zage kafufima Israeli vahemota Nagrite kre sramna vu'nafi? A'o. Nagrite kre sramna ovu'naze.
Tamagra Moleki havi seli mono no erita magoka ne-eta, Rafani havi anumzamofo ofu eritma ne-etma, havi anumzamofo amema'a mono huntenaku tro hu'naze. Ana hu'negu ama mopafintira tamazeri atranenketma Babilon umanigahaze. (Emo 5:25-27)
Tagri neragehoza seli mono no zamia eri'za magoka ka'ma kopi vu'naze. Anumzamo'ma Mosese asamino e'inahu hunka tro huo huno hunte'nea kante ante'za, anahu kna hu'za trohu fatgo hu'naze. (Ekso-Uti 25:9)
Henka tagehe'za ana seli mono nona e'neriza, zamagra ana mopafi Josua'ene naga'amo'zanena megi'a vahe'mofo mopafi ha'hu'za eri'za mani'neza, seli mono nona kiza mani'nageno henka Deviti kna e'ne.
Anumzamofo avesi zamo'a Devitinte megeno, Anumzamoka natregena ra mono nonka'a kineno huno antahige'ne, Jekopu Anumzamo'ma manisia no kinaku hu'ne.
Hu'neanagi Solomoni'a Agri ra mono nona kinte'ne. (1 Kin 6:1)
Hu'neanagi, Mareri Agatere'nea Anumzamo'a vahe'mo azanteti kinte nompina omanigahie huno, Kasnampa ne'mo hunte'ne,
Mona kumara trani'e, Mopa nagiamofo trare, inankna no Nagrira kinantegahaze? huno Ramo'a hu'ne.
Mika'zana monafine mopafinena Nagrake tro hu'noe. (Aisa 66:1-2)
Tamagra ke ontahi vahe mani'nageno tamaguamo ene tamagesamo'a tamage kemofona ifo nehie! Tamagra Ruotge Avamumofona tamagehemoma hu'nea kna hutma maka kna tmefi hunemize!
Kasnampa vahepintira ina'na vahe tamagehe'za zamahe ofri'naze? Fatgoma Hu'nemo'ma esia zamofoma ko'ma huama'ma hu'naza vahera, zamagra zamahe fri'nazanki, tamagratmi menina komoru huta zamahe fri vahe fore nehaze.
Korapara Anumzamo'a kasege'a ankero'mokizmi zamazampi antege'za, eri'za eme tamasmigetma antahi'nazana, ana nanekea tamagra amagera ontetma kea rutagare'naze.
Ana kema Jiu kva vahe'mo'za nentahi'za, tusi zamasi vazige'za zame'anikreki hu'naze.
Hianagi Stivenina Ruotge Avamumo agu'afi efregeno, kefatgo hunagamuteno monafinka Anumzamofo msa'zana negeno, Jisasi'a Anumzamofo azantamaga kaziga'a oti'negeno ke'ne.
Nehuno agra anage hu'ne, Keho Monamo'a anagige'na negogeno, Vahe'mofo mofavremo'a Anumzamofo azantmaga'a oti'negena negoe.
Hianagi, zamagra tusi'za hu'za rankege nehu'za, zamagesa rekani nere'za, magoka zamagare'za Stivenina ome azeri'naze.
Rankumapinti retufe'za megiama ete'za, agafa hu'za have knonu ahe'naze. Ana nehazage'za, havige hunteza huama hanigeta antahi sune hu'naza vahe'mo'za amega nakreku'zamia hate'za mago nehazavea, Soli'e nehaza ne'mofo agafi eme ante'naze, (Apo 6:13)
Stivenima have knonu nehageno'a, Ramofo agi aheno amanage hu'ne, Ramoka Jisasige, avamuni'a erio!
Anage huteno rena reno ranke huno amanage hu'ne, Ramoka kumi'zami'a aze'orinka atrezmanto, huno nehuno fri'ne.
Stiveni'ma ahe friza zankura Solina rimpamo'a so'e hu'ne. Jerusale kumapina mono vahe'ma zamahe'zamo'a tusiza huno ana knarera avitege'za, maka vahe zgamo'za panini hu'za fre'za Judia kaziga nevazage'za, Samaria kaziga nevzage'za aposol vahe'age mani'naze.
Knare hu'za fatgoma hu'naza vahe'amo'za Stiveni asenente'za, tusi zamasunku hu'za zavike agriku hu'naze.
Hianagi Soli'a, mono vahe zamazeri haviza nehuno, mago'mago nompina vuno eno huno vene'nene, a'nene zamazuhu zmavazu hu megi nezmatreno zamavreno kina ome huzmante'ne.
Anante e'ima zamahe pananima hige'za fre'naza vahe'mo'za, maka kumate kumate vutere hu'za mono kea hu'naze.
Filipi'a, Sameria rankumate viazamo, Kraisinku zamagrite huama ome hu'ne.
Filipi'ma hia nanekema tusi'a vahe'mo'za nentahiza, avame'zama hiazante'ma nege'za nentahiza, magoke antahintahire mika vahe krerafamo'za zamagesa ante'za antahi'naze.
Na'ankure havi avamu'tamima zamagu'afima mani'naza vahe'pintira, havi avamutmimo'a tusi'a kezati'za krafa nehu'za atirami'naze. Hagi mika zamufa fri'nea vahe'ene, kama vano nosaza vahera kri zamimo'a knare huzmante'ne.
Higeno ana rankumapina tusi'a museza fore hu'ne.
Ana rankumatera, Saimoni'e nehaza ne'mo, afa' vahe'mofo avu'ava'za eri fore huvava nehia nera mani'neakino, Sameria vahera huzamerige'za tusi'a zamagogogu nehu'za antri nehageno, agra ra ne' mani'noe huno hu'ne.
Ositetima vuno rante'ma vu'nea vahe'mo'za, ke'ankere'za nege'za ana mika vahe'mo'za agri ke nentahi'za anage hu'naze, Ama nera, Ra Anumzamofo hanavegino, tusi'a hanave hu'za hu'naze.
Hige'za agri ke'are antahi'za amage hu'naze. Na'ankure agrama zaza knafi havige nehuno, zagoreno eri fore hu'neazanku ana hu'naze.
Ana hu'nazanagi Anumzamofo kumamofo avu'avaku'ene, Jisas Kraisi agire knare musenkema Filipi huama nehige'za zamentintima nehu'za, vene'nene, a'nemo'zanena erigafa hu'za monoti fre'naze.
Saimoni'enena amentinti nehuno henka mono tina nefreno eteno ovu'are Filipi'ene mani'ne. Hagi mika ruzahu zane ra avame'zama hiaza fore higeno negeno tusi agogogu nehuno antri hu'ne.
Jerusale mani'naza aposol vahe'mo'za antahizama Samaria vahe'mo'za Anumzamofo naneke erize kema nentahi'za, Pitane Joni kizni huznante'naze.
Zanagrama uramina'ana nunamu huzmante'sake'za Ruotge Avamu'ma erisnagu urami'na'e.
Na'ankure mago mago'mofontera Ruotge Avamumo ome'nege'za, ko Ramofo Jisasi agire mono tinke fre'naze.
Anante Pita'ene Jonikea agafa huke zanazama ana Sameria vahe'mokizmi zamufare antake'za Ruotge Avamura eri'naze.
Hianagi Saimoni'ma kegeno Aposol vahe tfamo'zama zamazatfama antaza zante'ma Ruotge Avamu'ma zamigeno'a, agra zagoma zanamikema nehuno'a,
anage hu'ne, amana hanave'a nagri'enena nami'nenkena ina vahe'tema nazama antesugeza anahu'za Ruotge Avamura eriho.
Hianagi Pita'a, agrikura anage hu'ne, zago ka'ane kagranena haviza hugahie. Na'ankure kagrama kagesama antahinana zagoreti Anumzamofo muse'zana miza hugahue hunka nehane.
Kagrira ama erizampina mago erizanka'a omanetfa hu'ne. Na'ankure Anumzamofo avurera, tumoka'amo'a knarera osu'tfa hu'ne.
E'i zanku kefo kavukva zanka'a neterenka, kagu'a rukarehe hunka havizama nehana zana atrenka, Ramofonte nunamu nehugeno, kagu'amo'a knarema hanigeno'a kumi ka'a atregantegahie.
Na'ankure nagrama navuma kagoana, kagra kanive nerenka, kumi'mo kegina hugantegenka mani'nane, huno Pita'a higeno,
Saimoni'a ke nona anage hu'ne, nagrikura, tanagra Ramofontega nunamuna hikeno, kema hu'na'a zamo'a nagritera ometfa hino hu'ne.
Anante'ma Pita'ene Jonikema hamponatine, Ramofo nanekema huama'ma hutekea, ete Jerusale vunaku nevuke, Sameria vahe'mokizmi nonkumapi mono naneke hume vuna'e.
Anante mago Ramofo ankeromo Filipina asamino, Sameriatira otinka Jerusale kaziga Gaza urami'nea kantega kavugosa huntenka vuo. E'i, hagage ka'ma kopi vuo huno asamigeno,
nevigeno magora agonkna'za hari'nea Itiopia nera, kantesi'e nehaza Itiopia kuini a'mofo zagore kegavama hu'nea ne'mo, Jerusale mono eme huteno eteno kuma'arega nevigeno,
hosimo renteno avazu huno vano nehia karisifi manino nevuno, kasnampa ne' Aisaia krente'nea avontafera hamprime nevigeno,
Avamumo'a Filipina asami'no, vunka antuma hosimo renteno avazuma hu'nea karisire urava'o huo higeno,
Filipi'a agiareno agrite viazamo ome antahiana, Aisaia kasnampa ne'mofo naneke nehamprigeno nentahino, amama nehamprina nanekea, kagra antahiama nehano? Huno antahige'geno,
Agra huno mago'mo'ma huonasamisigena, inankna hu'na antahi amara hugahue? Nehuno Filipina ke higeno umarerino agrane umani'ne.
Ana ne'mo'ma hampri'nea avontafemo'a, amanahu ke hu'ne, Sipisipi afu'ma ananke taga hunaku avare'za nevazankna hu'za nevu'za, sipisipi afu anenta azoka taga hunaku nehazageno, agira aka huno krafa osu'nea kna huno, Agra agira aka osu'ne.
Agrira azeri agaze hu'za knare fatgo zamuzmara huonte'naze. Na'ankure ko'ma Agri asimura ama mopafintira eri'nazana, nankna huno Agra mofavre antegahie? (Aisa 53:7-8)
Anante ke'nonama hifina, agonkna'zama hari'nea ne'mo'a anage huno, Filipinkura hu'ne, muse hugantoanki (plis) azanku kasnampa ne'mo'a ama kea hu'ne, agri'agu hu'nefi, hipi ruga'a vaheku hu'ne?
Filipi'a anama hampri'nea avontafepinti nanekea agafa huno, Jisasi knare musenkea ana nera asmi'ne.
Anama hu'za karankama nevu'za mago'a ti me'nere ageno, agonkna'zama hari'nea ne'mo'a, Keho! Ti me'neaki! Na'amo mono tima frezanifina nazerigahie? huno nehigeno,
[Filipi amanage huno hu'ne, tamage hunka maka kagu'areti Jisasinku kmentinti hanunka tina fregahane nehigeno ozo hu'ne. Anumzamofo nemofo Jisasi Kraisi'a mani'ne, hu'na nentahue, huno hu'ne,]
ana hosimo renteno avazu nehia karisia ana ne'mo kehigeno azerigeno, anantarega'moke uramike tinte vuke, Filipi'a agonkna'za hari'nea nera mono tina tigua repanogino frente'ne.
Anama huteke timpinti'ma megi'a akeno'a, Ramofo Avamumo Filipina avaresga huno vigeno, agonkna'zama hari'nea ne'mo'a mago'ane nonkeno, tusi muse hume karanka vu'ne.
Hianagi Filipi'a Azotasi kumate mani'neno nankna hu'na e'noeha huno agra'a keno erifore hu'ne. Ana kazigama nevuno'a mika ranra kumatera mono kea hutere hume nevuno Sisaria kumate uhanati'ne.
Ana knafinke Soli'a ana zanke huno Ramofo amage' nentaza disaipol nagara zamahe frinaku tusi asi nevazigeno, rimpa henezmanteno, ugota prisi nete vuno,
ome antahigegeno mago'a avona kremigeno erino Damaskasi vuno atruma nehu'za mono nehaza nontamimpi (sinagogs) marerino huama huno, agrama veo, aro Kraisti amage' nentaza vahe'ma zamagesuno'a, kina rezmanteno eteno zamareno Jerusale vugahie huno kre'ne.
Agrama vuno Damaskasi urava'o nehigeno'a, ame huno monafinkati hanavenentake tavi'mo agrite remsa huntegeno,
traka huno mopafima nemseno'a, agrama mago kezankema antahi'nea kemo'a anage hu'ne, Sol! Sol! Na'a higenka Nagrira kna nenamine?
Higeno kenona'a, Ramoka, Kagra izage? huno higeno, Agra huno, Nagra Jisasine, kagrama knama nenamina Nere.
Hu'neanagi otinka ana kumapi ufrenka vuge'za, kagrama nankna'zama hanana zamofo kea kasmigahaze.
Soli enema nevaza vene'nemo'za kea osu'za oti'za mani'ne'za, kema hia agerura antahi'nazanagi, mago vahera onke'naze.
Soli'a mopafinti otigeno, avumo'a hari hu'neanagi, mago'zana onke'ne. Magoka vu'naza vahe'mo'za azante avazu hu'za Damaskasia avare'za ufare'naze.
Taregi magoki zagene haninena, avua onkeno ne'zane, ti'nena oneno amane mani'ne.
Magora Jisasi amage' nentea nera, Ananaiasi'e nehaza ne'mo Damaskasi kumatera mani'neno, ava'na keankna huno negegeno, Ramo'a anage huno asami'ne, Ananaisi'o! Higeno ke nona hunteno, ama mani'noe Ramoka.
Anante Ramo'a asamino, otinka fatgoe nehaza kuma kampi vunka, Judasi nonte vunka, Tesasiti nera, Soli'e nehaza neku ome zamantahigo, na'ankure menina manino nunamu huvava nehie.
Ana nehigeno Soli'ma ava'nagna'zama kefina, Ananaisi'ema nehaza ne'mo efrea zamo avuma kesigura azanteno nunamu hunentegeno, ana avanagnazampina ke'ne.
Hianagi Ananaisi'a ke'nona'a huno, Ra Anumzamoka nagra rama'a vahepinti, nama'a vahe krerafama Kagrite'ma zamentintima nehaza vahe'ma Jerusale kumapima mani'naza zamahe'neana ana ne'mofo agenkea nagra antahi'noe.
Nehuno ama kumapi eno, ugagota kva (hai pris) vahe'mo'za hugnare huntageno, iza'o Kagri kagima ahesaza vahera zamareno kina huzamante kva agi eri'ne.
Hianagi Ramo'a anage huno agrira asami'ne, Vuo, na'ankure agrira ko huhampri ante'noakino, Nagri eri'za ne' manigahie. Hagi Nagri nagi nagenkea erino megi'a vahete'ene, kini vahete'ene, Israeli vahetera vugahie.
Na'ankure nama'a kna'zama Nagri nagire'ma eri'sia zana, Nagra averi hugahue.
Huno higeno, Ananaisi otino mani'nea nonte vuno, azama omenteno nunamuma hunteteno anage huno asami'ne, nenafu Soliga, kantegama neankeno, Ra Jisasi'ma kagrite efore'ma hu'nemo, kagrama etenka kavu negenka, Ruotge Avamura eri avitesane huno hunantege'na nagra e'noe.
Anagema nehigeno'a, ame huno avuragafinti irikna'zamo knope ramigeno, avua eteno negeno otino mono ti fre'ne.
Hagi anante ne'za neno hanavema e'nerino'a, Jisasima amage' nentaza disaipol naga'ene Damaskas mago'a kna mani'ne.
Ame huno, ana zupage Jisasi agigenkea osi mono nompi marerino, ama Nera Anumzamofo Mofavre huno huama huno zamasmi'ne.
Hige'za maka antahiza vahe'mo'za tusiza hu'za antri nehu'za, anage hu'naze, Ama'na nera Jerusalema mani'neno, Jisasi agire'ma zamazeri havizama nehia nero? Menina eno Jisasi agima huama nehaza vahera kina huzamanteno zamareno ugota ra mono (hetprisi) kva vahete vunaku ne-eo? Hu'naze.
Hianagi Soli'a, antahintahi'afina hageno nevuno Jisasi'ema nehaza nera tazahu ne' Kraisi'e huno eri ama huno tusiza huno hanavetino nehigeno, ana kema Damaskasima mani'naza Jiu vahe'mo'za, nentahiza inankna huta nanekea huntesune ha hu'za kea osu'naze.
Mago'a knama evutege'za, Jiu vahe'mo'za komoru hu'za Solina ahenaku hu'naze.
Hu'nazanagi ana komoru hu'naza kemo'a Soli agesafi efre'ne. Zgene haninena ahe fri'snagu zamurga ra vihu kafante ke ankerete'za mani'naze.
Hu'nazanagi, Polima amage'nentaza disaipol nagamo'za kerage'afi avare'za eka eka kupi antete'za, kumamofo vihu keginamofo megi'a kankamumpi nofi rentete'za mago kaziga avazu nehu'za atrageno urami'ne.
Jerusale ema nehanatino'a, Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol nagapi hagerafigahue huno hianagi, agrikura tusi kore nehu'za agra Jisasi amage' nentea nere hu'za maka'mo'za antahi'za zamifina ontahi'naze.
Hianagi Banabasi'a, Solina avareno aposol nagate viazamo, Jisasima kampi kegeno keaga humi'neazane, Damaskas mani'neno hanavetino'ma Jisasi agifima keaga hu'neazanku ene, agigenke'a hu'ama huno aposol vahera zamasmi'ne.
Ana huteno Soli'a zamagrane mani'neno, Jerusalemia fru huno vuno eno huno, Jisasi agigura korera osuno hanavetino keaga huama hu'ne.
Agra keaga nehuno, Griki kema nehaza Jiu vahe'enena, keha hu'nazanagi, zamagra ahe frisnaza kanku hakare'naze.
Hige'za mono afuhe'za anankema nentahi'za, avare'za Sisaria urami'za ometrageno Tasisi vu'ne.
Anante Judia kazigane Galili kazigane Sameriama nemaniza mono vahe'mo'za, hagera hu'za nevu'za zamarimpa fru hu'za nemani'za, Anumzamofonku kore hunentageno, Ruotge Avamu'mo zamazeri hanavenetige'za, rama'a mono vahe fore hu'naze.
Pita'a mago'a kumate kagino vano vano huteno, agra Lida kumate mani'naza (saints) mono nagatega erami'ne.
Anampina mago nera Ainiasi'e nehaza ne' 8ti'a zgegfu'mofo agu'afi avufa fri kri erino sipa'a atreno novia ne' keno erifore huteno,
Pita'a anage huno asami'ne, Ainiasiga, Jisas Kraisi'a krika'a kazeri so'e huganteanki, otinka tafeka'a atrenka vuo, higeno anante ame huno oti'ne.
Ana hige'za ana mika Lidane, Saroni kumate ene mani'namo'za agri nege'za, Ra Anumzamofonte zamagu'a rukarehe hu'naze.
Jopa kumatera Jisasi amage nentea a'mofo agi'a Tavita'e. Ana a'mofo agima (Griki kefi eri rukarehe'ma hazana Dokasi'e hu'naze. Ama ana agimofo agafa'a, dia afure hu'ne) agripina knare eri'zamo avite'negeno upa'ma nehu'za zamasunku zampima nemaniza naga miko zupa zamaza hu'ne.
Ananknafina kri erino fri'geno, avufama tinu sesema huntete'za eri'za vazazamo'za, anaga nomofo hunaragintepinka ome ante'naze.
Jopa kumamo'a Lida kuma tva'onte me'ne, Pita'a anantega Lida kumate mani'ne hianke nentahiza, Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol nagamo'za tare ne'tre huznantageke, vuke hampo'nage huke, Tagriku tavega ontenka muse hugantonaki (plis) ko eno huke ome asami'na'e.
Anankema asamikeno nentahino'a, Pita'a otino zanagrane vu'ne. Uma hanatige'za, avare'za anaga agofetu nomofo hunaragintepinka vu'naze. Miko kento a'nemo'za agrane oti'ne'za, zavira nete'za Dokasi'ma zamagranema ofri mani'neno tro hu'nea zanra kukenarami'ne, ruga'a kukenane averi'naze.
Hianagi Pita'a ana mika vahera megi'a hunezmanteno, rena reno nunamu hu'ne. Huteno fri vahe kerafarega rukarehe huno, Tabitaga otio! Higeno avua hari huno, Pitana negeno oti'ne.
Nehuno Pita'a aza antegantuteno azeri oti'ne. Anama nehuno zamentintima nehaza naga'ene, kento a'ne nagara kehuno asimu erie huno avazu huno eme zami'ne.
Anama hia nanekemo'a Jopa kokampina zamukino vuno eno higeno, rama'a vahe krerfamo'za Ra Anumzamofonte zamentinti hu'naze.
Pita'a mago'a zaza kna, afu akruteti hanave'zantami tro nehia ne' Saimoni'ene Jopa mani'ne.
Sisaria kumatera mago nera Koniliasi'e nehaza ne'mo, Italie hu'za nehaza 100ti'a Roma Sondia vahete ugagota kva nera,
megi'a nagapinti monoku agesa nentahino, noma'afi nemaniza naga'ane, Anumzamofo kore hunenteno, zamunte omane vahera ne'zane, kukena muse huno nezamino, Anumzantega nunamuna huvava nehia nere.
Mago kinaga ferura 3 kilokinaza higeno, agra kefatgo huno ava'nagna'za kegeno, Anumzamofo ankeromo efreno anage hu'ne, Koniliasio! higeno,
tusi kore huno uruha negeno anage hu'ne, Ramoka, na'ahie. Higeno agra anage huno asami'ne, nunamu ka'ane, zamunte omane vahe'ma zamaza nehana kavukvara Anumzamo'a ko antahino keno hu'ne.
Menina mago'a vahera huzamantege'za Saimoni'e nehu'za, mago agi'a Pita'e hu'za nehaza netega Jopa vu'za ome kehinkeno eno.
Mago nera Saimoni'e hu'za nehaza nera, afu akruteti hanave'za tro nehia ne'mo, hageri ankenare noma'a me'nefi anampi Pita'a mani'ne.
Kema humia ankeroma atreno vigeno, agrite eri'za erinenta'a netre'ne, mago sondia ne'mo monoku agesa antahintahi nehuno agri tvaonte nemni'a ne' ene kehige'za e'naze.
Mika kema zamasmiteno huzmantege'za, Jopa vu'naze.
Anante kna zupa kantega vu'za ranku'ma tvaonte'ma vzageno'a zgemo'ma feru asegeno, Pita'a no agofetu nunamu hunaku mareri'ne.
Huteno aga'zamo higeno ne'za nenaku nehige'za ne'zama retroma nehazageno'a, avu evuevu higeno nemaseno ava'na keankna huno,
kegeno monamo'a hagaro higeno, mago'zana, tusi'a tavarave'gnaza 4'a atupare atupare azerino mopafi atrageno erami'ne.
Anampina ruzahu ruzahu 4'a agazane zgarmi'ne, ama mopafi zge havu nehia zgane, zahopi hareno vono nehia nama zgagi hu'za mani'naze.
Anama higeno'a mago ageru'mo agrite eno Pitaga, otinka ahenka no!
Anage hianagi Pita'a huno i'o Ramoka, na'ankure nagra magore hu'na onetfa hu'noe. Vahe'mo'zama nonaza kfane, avusese osuno ruotage osu'nea zgagfa onegahue.
Higeno mago'ene eteno ana ageru'mo agrite eno, ina kna'zama Anumzamo'ma azeri avusese hu'nesia zankura, avusese osu'ne hunka osuo.
