Anahu'zana 3'a zupa fore hutegeno, anazana ame huno erino monafinka mreri'ne.
Pita'a agu'afi nentahino, nazafore hige'na koeha huno agesa omeantahi emeantahi nehigeno, Koniliasi'ma huzmantege'za aza nagamo'za Saimoni nonku zamantahigeke hu'za, kegina kafante eme oti'ne'za,
kezati'za Saimoniku mago'agi'a Pita'ema hu'za nehaza agine nera amifina mani'neo hu'za zamantahige'naze.
Ava'na kna'zama ke'nea zanku Pita'a agesa nentahigeno, Avamu'mo asami'no, Ko, 3'a nagamo'za kagriku nehakaze.
Hianagi kagesa ontahinka otinka uraminka zamagrane vuo, na'ankure Nagra hu'zmantoge'za e'naze.
Pita'a ana nagate uramino anage huno zamasmi'ne, antahiho, ama nagritfanku nehakraze, nagafare tamagra e'naze?
Hige'za zamagra anage hu'naze, mago sondia vahe kva nera, Koniliasi'e megi'a ne'mo fatgo huno Anumzamofonku kore nehia nekino, mika Jiu vahe krerafamo knare nere hu'za nehaza ne'mofo Ruotge hu'nea ankeromo asamigeno, kagriku noniarega eno keaga eme nasminkena antahineno huno hurantegeta e'none.
Higeno Pita'a zamarenompi zamantege'za masete'za, ko ati'geno otino zamagrane nevige'za Jopatira ruga'a zamentinti nehaza afuhe'za agrane vu'naze.
Hute'za anante knazupa, Sisaria uhanati'naze. Koniliasi'a egahaze nehuno, naga'ane tragoteno nemania knampa'aramina kehutru hu'ne.
Pita'a noma'afi e'fregeno'a, Koniliasi'a negeno, agafi rena omereno mono hunte'ne.
Pita'a avazuhu o'netino anage hu'ne, Otio! Nagra amama hanaza hu'na vahetfa mni'noe.
Nehuno agranema keaga hume nevu'ne, nompima ufreno omegeana rama'a vahe krerafa atru hu'za mani'naze.
Pita'a omenezmageno amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Tamagratmi ko kasegea antahitma ketma hu'naze, megi'a vahepinti mago'mo'a Jiu vahe'ene tragotezano, nantuma antente zakuma i'o hu'za hampo'na kasegema ante'nazana antahi'nazanagi, Anumzamo'a naverino, mago'mofonkura haviza hu'ne huge, avusese osu'ne hu'na osugahue.
E'ina hu'negu nagriku'ma kema hu'nana ke antahina e'noana, ke huhaviza hurmantezani'a omane'ne, higena nagra kantahinegoe, na'amofo agafare nagrikura huzmantanke'za vu'naze? Huno antahigegeno,
Koneliasi'a kenona'a anage hu'ne, 4'a knama evia knafina noni'afi mani'nena, amanahu knare tri kilokia nunamu nehu'na, koana ame huno mago nera msa'nentake kukena hu'nea ne'mo navuga eme o'netino,
anage hu'ne, Koniliasiga nunamu nehunka, zamunte omane vahe'ma zamaza nehana kavukvara Anumzamo'a ko antahino keno hu'ne.
E'izanku vahera huzmantege'za Jopa vu'za Saimoninku, mago'agi'a Pita'e hu'za nehaza nera ke humisageno eno. Zgagfa akruteti hampo'naza tro nehia nera, Saimoni'e nehia ne'mofo nompi hageri ankenare mani'ne.
Hige'na avega ontena ko huzmantoge'za kagritega vazagenka knare'za hunka e'nane. E'inahu'ma hu'negu menina, mika'mota Anumzamofo avurera emeritru hu'none. Ramo'ma tagriku'ma ome zamasmio huno hugantegenka e'nana nanekea tasmio.
Higeno Pita'a amanage hu'ne, tamagerafa hu'na menina antahue, Anumzamo'a rukna rukna huno vahera zamesi nozmanteanki, magoke avamente avesinezmante.
Hianagi mika kotegati vahe'mo'za (nation) Agri'ma koro hunte'za, fatgoma hu'neazama nehaza vahera, Agra avesi nezmanteno, Agrarega zamarenente.
Nagra antah'inoe, tamagra ko knare musenkema Israeli vahe'ma zamasmi'neana antahi'naze. Anumzamofo rimpa fruzana Jisasi Kraisimpi efore hu'ne, Agra mika zamofo Rane.
Tamagratmi ko antahita ketma hu'naze, Judia kokampi Galiliti erigafa hu'ne, henka Joni'a mono tima frenezmante kea huama hu'ne.
Tamagra ko antahi'naze Nazareti Jisasina inankna huno Anumzamo'a Ruotge Avamuteti'ene hanave areti'ene huhamprinte'ne. Ana higeno Jisasi'a vano huno knare hunezmanteno, Sata'ma knama nezmia vahera zamazeri so'e huzmante'ne, na'ankure Anumzamo'a Agrane mani'negeno ana hu'ne.
Tagra mika'zama Judia mopafine Jerusalema hiazama tvuma keta antahita hu'nona vahere. Zamagra anazanke hu'za avare'za keka zafare hantite'za ahe fri'naze.
Hu'neanagi ama ana Nera, Anumzamo'a taregi magoki knazupa azeri otino, azeri anteama hu'ne.
Mika vahe'mo'za onke'nazanagi, tagra ke'none, Anumzamo ko'ma huhampri tante'nea vahe'mota ke'none, Agrama fripinti'ma otigeta, ne'zane tinema ne'nona vahere.
Mono kea vahera ome zamasmiho huno huhanavetino huranteno, kore ke huzmanteta, Anumzamo azeri antesga huno fri vahete'ene mani vahetera keaga Jisasi'ke refko huzmantegahie.
Agrikura korapa mika kasnampa (profeti) vahe'mo'za kea hunte'za, miko'mo'ma Agri agire'ma amentinti hanimofona, kumi'a atrentegahie hu'naze.
Pita'ma ana naneke nehigeno'a, Ruotge Avamu'mo ana mika nanekema nentahiza vahete e'ramine.
Hige'za zamufama tagahu'nea vahe'pinti zamentintima nehaza vahe'ma Pita'enema e'naza vahe'mo'za, megi'a vahete'enena Ruotge Avamu'mofo muse zamo'a herafiramie hu'za tusi antari nehu'za rama'a antahintahi hu'naze.
Na'ankure zamagra nentahizage'za, ruzahu ruzahu zamagerupinti Anumzamofo muse hunte'za Agi'a hesga hu'naze. Anante Pita'a huama huno,
tamagerafa huno, magomo'a timpima vahe'mo'ma mono tima fre'zankura i'o osugahie. Menima Ruotge Avamu'ma tagra erunakna hu'za eri'nazankita, mono tima frezamante zampina iza i'o hurantegahie?
Anante Jisas Kraisi agire mono ti freho huno hampo'nanentake ke zamasmi'ne. Mago'agna tagrane manitenka, vugahane hu'za agrira antahige'naze.
Menina Anumzamofo aposol naga ene mago'a Judia nemni'za mono naga'mo'za, megi'a vahe'mo'za (Gentiles) Anumzamofo naneke eri'naze nanekea antahi'naze.
Ana huteno Pita'a Jerusale kumate mrerino vige'za, zamufama tgahu (circumcised) zamentinti vahe'mo'za agriku ke hakare hunente'za,
kagra zamufa tga osu vahe nompi vunka ne'zana zamagrane omene'nane.
Hu'neanagi Pita'a ke aseni'are erinte erinte huno huama hu'ne,
Nagra Jopa ran (city) kumapi manine'na nunamu hute'na mase'nena ava'nagna'za kogeno, mago tavrave'gna zamo erami'ne, atupare atupare azeri'neno atregeno monafinti eramino nagrite e'ne.
Keankere'na ana tavravefi koana, 4'a agiaza hunte'nea zgagfa ama mopafi mani'neane, trampi zgane asagugati vano nehia zgane afi' namaramine ke'noe.
Nagra nentahugeno mago agerumo'a anage nagrikura hu'ne, Pitaga otinka, ahenka no hu'ne!
Hu'neanagi nagra anage hu'noe, Ra'moka nagru hu'nanke'na nonoa zgagfagina onegahue hu'na hu'noe!
Hianagi ana ageru'mo mago'ene anage monafinti hu'ne, Anumzamo'ma azeri agruma hu'neniazana, haviza huno agaru osu'ne hunka osuo!
Anazana tagufa (tri) zupa fore huteno, ete ana mika'zana avazu higeno monafi mareri'ne.
Anama nehigeno, Sisaria kumateti huzmantege'za tagufa vahe'mo'za, nemanua nonte ehnati'naze.
Avamumo nasamino i'o osunka ana vahe'ene amane vuo hige'na, 6si'a nenafu'za nagrane azageta Konilias nontega vu'none.
Koniliasi kegeno ankeromo noma'afi oti'neno asami'nea kea, anage huno tasami'ne, huzamantege'za Jopa vu'za Saimoni'e nehaza ne', mago agi'a Pitana avare'za esageno,
agra mono naneke neramasaminkeno, kagri'ene mika nagaka'anena, kefo zantmifinti tamahoke ahegahie.
Anante naneke erigafa hu'na nehugeno, Ruotge Avamu'mo zamagrite erami'ne, ese'ma tagrite e'neaza huno emani'ne.
Ana hige'na Ramo'ma huno, Joni'a tinu mono tina fre ramante'neankina, Avamunu tina frermantegahue hu'nea kegu nagesa antahi'noe.
Ana hu'negu Anumzamo'ma magozahu muse'zama (gift) zamagri'ma zami'neana, anahu kna huno Agra Ramofo Jisasi Kraisinte tamentinti nehunkeno tami'neaza hu'negu, iza'na nagra Anumzamofo eri'zankura i'o huzamantegahue?
Ana kema zamagrama antahite'za, kema huzmanteku'ma hazana netre'za, Anumzamofo ra agi ami'za anage hu'naze, Anumzamo'a megia vahera zamarege'za zamagu'a rukarehe hu'za zamasimu e'nerize hu'naze.
Ananknafi Stivenina ahe nefri'za mago'a nagara zamahe fragu vazige'za, atre'za Fonesiane, Saiprasine, Antiokune, nevu'za ru vahete mono osu, Jiu vaheteke mono kea ome zamasmi'naze.
Hu'neanagi Saipras vahe'ene Sairini vahe'mo'za zamagripinti mago'a Antioku e'za, agafa hu'za Ramofo Jisasi knare musenkea huama hu'za Griki vahe zamasmi'naze.
Ramofo hihamumo zamagripi me'negu, tusi'a vahe'mo'za zamagu'a rukarehe hu'za Ramofonte zamentinti hu'naze.
Anama zamagrama hazankemo'a, Jerusale mono vahete ege'za nentahi'za, zamagra Banabasi huntageno Antioku vu'ne.
Agrama eno Anumzamo'ma asunku'ma humazmanteaza negeno, muse nehuno zamazeri hanaveti ke zamasmino, tamage huta tmaguareti Ramofonte maniho hu'ne.
Banabasi'a knare ne' mani'neno, Avamupi aviteno amentinti hu'negeno, maka vahe'mo'za Ramofonte e'naze.
Ana huteno Banabasi'a Tasisi kuma atreno Soli omegenaku vuno,
ome ke fore huteno avareno Antioku kumate uhanati'na'e. Ana kafufina Banabasi'ene Solikea mono vahe'zga mono kea hunezamikeno tusi'a vahe fore hu'ne. Anante amage'ma nentea disaipol naga'mo'za pusa (kristen) mono vahere huno zamagi'a eri'naze.
Ana knafina mago'a kasnampa vahe'mo'za Jerusaleti erami'za, Antioku kumate ehanati'naze.
Mago'zmia Agabasi'e hu'za nehaza ne'mo, otino Avamumofo hanavefi maka mopafina agate'za fore hugahie huno hu'ne. Romu kamanimo kva kri'nea mopa ramimpi, ana kemofo avufga'a (Klaodias Sisama ran kva emania knafi fore hu'ne).
Jisasi amage'ma nentamo'za, mago mago'mo'za zagoma eri'naza avamente eritru huta Judia mani'naza tafuheintega (mono nagate) zamaga'zanku hugahazanki atre'zmantesune nehu'za,
anante eri tru hute'za, mono vahe'mo'za, Banabasine Soli kizani znamige'ne, Jerusale mono kva vahetega eri'ne vu'na'e.
Ana knafina Kini Heroti'a mago'a mono vahe zamahe, frinaku zamazeri'ne.
Joni nefu Jemisi azeri'za zanra kazinu ahe fri'naze.
Anama hiazama Agrama kegeno Juda vahe'mo'za musema hazageno'a, Pitana azerino kina hunteku hu'ne. (Zo'ore breti muse hu'za nenaza knare, anara hu'ne.)
Heroti'a, Pitama azeriteno avareno 4'a sondia vahe kevumofo (16) zamazampi ome antege'za, oza aza hu'za kava kri'naze. Heroti'a Pasova ne'za netesageno, amefi'a maka vahe zamufi Pitana azeri ama hunaku antahi'ne.
Ana higeno Pita'a kina nompi mani'nege'za, mono vahe'zgamo'za Anumzamofontega hampo'nati'za nunamu hunte'naze.
Ana kenegera masenkeno okina Heroti'a avareno keaga huntegahianki nehigeno, Pita'a tare sondia netremokizni amunompi masenegeno, tarega azantera seni nofiteti kina rentenageno, kva vahe'mo'za kina vahete kava kri'za kafante mani'naze.
Ana nehigeno ame huno, Ramofo ankeromo efore higeno, masamo kina vahe nona remsa hu'ne. Ankeromo Pitana asoparega aheno ame hunka otio! Higeno seni nofimo'a Pita azantetira evurami'ne.
Ankeromo'a amanage huno Pitana asami'ne, Kamu'nofira nehunka kaga nona vazio, higeno Pita'a agano antanine. Anante ankeromo anage huno asami'ne, anakre kuka'a nentaninka namage' eno hu'ne.
Pita'a amage' avaririno nevuno, ankeromo'ma azama hiazana agra antahino keno osu'neanagi, agra avana keaza hu'ne.
Ese kafante kava hu'naza sondia vahe'ene, anante kafante kava hu'naza sondia vahe zamagterete'ne, ran kumapi vu kafana aenireti hagente'nea ran kafante akeno agra'a kafamo'a anagige'ne atirami'ne osi kampi nevakeno, ankeromo'a ame huno atreno vu'ne,
Pita'a agrake nevuno amanage hu'ne, menina nagra antahi'noe, Ra Anumzamo'a ankeroma'a huntegeno, Heroti'ene Jiu vahe'mo'za maka'zama hunantenaku hazafintira naza huno katufe natre'ne.
Anante Pitama anama hiaza antahino keno nehuno, Jonina mago agi'a Maki'e nehaza ne'mofo nerera Meri nontega, maka vahe'mo'za mani'neza nunamu nehazarega vu'ne
Anante Pita eno megi'a kafante eme vagare vagare higeno'a, Roda'e nehaza eri'za mofa'mo eno eme antahi'ne
Pita ageruma nentahino'a, ana kafana onagi atreno tusi muse nehuno, agareno vuno Pita'a kafante oti'ne huno ana vahe zga ome zamasmi'ne.
Hu'neanagi zamagra anage ana mofakura hu'naze, Kagra negi nenegahane! Ana mofamo hanavetino tamage Pita'e nehige'za, kagra ankeroma'a ke'negahane hu'za mago'ane hu'naze.
Pita vagare vagare nehigeno zamagrama kafa anagi'za nege'za, nankna huno e'neha hu'za tusi'a antri hu'naze.
Agra azanu avame hige'za akohe'za mani'zageno Ramo'ma kina nompinti azama huno avare atre'nea kea zamasmi'ne. Ana huteno anage hu'ne, Jemisine mono nafuheina ama ana nanekea zamasmiho huteno atreno ru kumatega vu'ne.
Ko'ma atige'za, kina nonte'ma kva hu'naza sondia vahe'mo'za tusiza hu'za Pita'a na'a hu'neha hu'za rama'a antahintahi hu'naze.
Anante Heroti'ma hakareno keama, keno erifore nosuno'a kavama hu'naza vahera kegaga huzmanteno tamagra frigahaze hige'za, zamahe friku zamare'za vazageno, henka Judiatira atreno uramino Sisaria umani'ne.
Anante Heroti'a Taia kumate vahe'ene, Saito kumate vahe'mokizmigura arimpa ahezamantege'za, zamagra mago zamarimpa hu'za agrite emeri atru hu'za, Kini ne'mofo tva'onte eri'za ne' Blastusi, zamaza hinogu rimpa azeri fru hute'za, knare nomanizama kini ne'mo'ma zamisigu antahige'naze. Na'ankure zamagrama kave'ma e'nerizana kini Heroti'ma kava kri'nea mopafinti e'neri'ze.
Mago kna erintaza knazupa, Kini Heroti'a kini vahe kukena huteno, keaga refakohu trate mani'neno zamagrira rama'a keaga zamasmi'ne.
Hu'neanagi tusi'a vahe'mo'za agafa hu'za rankehu'za mago anumzamofo agerure, hanki vahe'mofo agerura omane'ne! hu'naze.
Ana kema nehazama'a, mago Ramofo ankeromo Herotina ahe tre'ne, na'ankure Anumzamofo ra agi omigeno agrira knimo amprigeno fri'ne.
Hu'neanagi Anumzamofo kemo'a hageno rura huno vuno eno hu'ne.
Banabasi'ene Solikea Jerusale mono eri'zama eri vgareteke, Jon Makina nevareke ete Antioku kumate vu'na'e.
Antiokua mono nontema menima mani'naza kasnampa vahe'ene, rempi huzmi vahera ama'a mani'naze, Banabasiki, Simioni (aganumpa nere hu'za nehaze ne'ki), Lusiusi'a Sairini ne'ki, kumate ugagota kva (Gavana) ne' Heroti knampa, magoka ositeti rasena'a ne' Maeniaki, Soliki hu'za mani'naze.
Anamo'za Ramofonte mono hunente'za, ne'za a'o hu'za nunamu nehzageno, Ruotge Avamu'mo'a anage hu'ne, Banabasine Soli kizni huhampri znante'keno, eri'za eriogu hua eri'zana eri'o hu'ne.
Ana hute'za ne'zama a'o hu'za mani'neza henka zamazana znagofetu ante'za nunamu hute'za huzamantake'ne vu'na'e.
Banabasine Soli kiznia Ruotge Avamu'mo huznantege'ne Sulisia uramike osi voti omerike Saipras ti amunompi me'nea kumate vu'na'e.
Zamagrama Saramisi kumate vute'za, agafa hu'za Anumzamofo kea Jiu vahe osi mono nompi (Sinagog) huama hu'naze. Zanaza hanigu Joninena avare'ke umani'naze. (Mago agi'a Jon Maki'e.)
Zamagrama maka ti amunompi kumatami agatere'za nevu'za Pafosi uhanati'za zago nereno Jiu vahepi havige kasnampa nera, Bar Jisasi'e nehaza nera mani'negeke ke'na'e.
Ana nera, Segias Paulosi knare antahizamo agatere'nea ne' Romu kamanimo huhamprintegeno ana ti amunompi kuma kava hu'nea ne' ene mani'ne, ana kamani kva (gavana) ne'mo Banabasine Soli kizni Anumzamofo ke eme asamiogu zanagi hu'ne.
Hu'neanagi amene ne' Elimasi'a zago nereno ha' arezmanteno ana kamani kva ne'mo amentinti osanie hu'ne. (Elimasi'e huno Griki kefi hu'neana, avuatga huno zago nereno vahe zamahe fri nere hu'ne.)
Hu'neanagi Solina, mago agi'a Poli'e, Ruotge Avamumo'a agu'afi avinetegeno avua kefatago huno negeno,
anage hu'ne, kagripina havige avu'avamo'ene havizahu zamo'a avite'ne, Sata mofavre mani'nenka, fatgo avu'avamofona ha' arenentane, kagra fatgo osu avu'avara netrenka, Anumzamofo fatgo avu'avara osugahampi?
Menina ko, Anumzamofo azamo'a ha' reganteankino kavurgamo'a asu hanigenka, osi'a knafina kavua onkegahane! higeno ame huno avumo'a su higeno azante azerino vanohu vaheku hakre'ne.
Anante kamani (Gavana) kva ne'mo anazama agrite fore hiaza negeno, amentinti hu'ne. Na'ankure agra tusi'za huno Ramofonkema rempima humia zankura antri hu'ne.
Anante Poli'ene agrane vu'naza vahe'mo'za Pafosi kuma atre'za hagerimpi vu'za Pega kumate Pamfalia kaziga ehnati'naze. Hianangi Joni'a anante ome zanatreno ete Jerusale kumate vu'ne.
Pega kumara atreke, zanagra Pisidi Antioku ehanatike, mni fruhu knazupa osi mono nompi (sinagog) marerike umani'na'e.
Kasegene kasnampa vahe kema hampri vagarete'za osi mono nompi kva vahe'mo'za ke atrezmante'za anage hu'naze, tafuheta mago'a tazeri hanaveti ke eri'nenutma amane hugahaze.
Hazageno Poli'a anante otino azanu avame huno anage hu'ne, Israel vahe'motmane megi'a vahe'ma Anumzamofonku koroma nehaza'motma antahiho.
Ama'i Israeli vahe'mofo Anumzamo'a, tagri tagehe'ina huhampri zamanteno, ru vahe kumapima umani'nageno zamazeri knare zantfa Isipi kumapina nehuno hihamu'areti anampintira zamare megi atre'ne.
40ti'a naza kafufi ka'ma mopafi zamareno ome zamantege'za mani'naze.
7ni'a ranra kumatamimpi mani'naza Kenani vahe zamahe hana huteno, Anumzamo'a ana mopafi vahe'amo'za manisagu mopa erizamige'za zamagra mopa erise'za mani'naze.
Anazama fore'ma hu'neana 450'a zgegfu nazampi fore hu'ne. Anama huteno'a henka kva vahe azeri otigeno kva krizmantege'za mani'za e'za kasnampa ne' Samueli'gnare ehnati'naze.
Anante kini ne' tamisane hu'za antahigageno, Anumzamo'a Kisi nemofo Benzameni naga nofipinti ne' Soli zamigeno, 40ti'a zgegfufi kini manino kva huzmante'ne.
Anumzamo'a kini Solina azeri netreno, Deviti azeri otigeno kini manino kva huzmante'ne. Agra anage huno Devitinkura hu'ne, Nagra kogeno Jesi nemofo Deviti'a, Nagri'ma nagu'afima navenesia'zana agra nevaririno, maka'zama huo hanuazana hugahie. (Sam-Zga 89:20, 1 Sam 13:14)
Ama ana ne'mofo negehompinti, Israeli vahe'mota tahoke'ma heno tazahu nera Jisasina huvempa hu'nea kante anteno tami'ne.
Jisasi'ma hakare'a Israeli vahe zamufi eama osu'negeno, Joni'a huama huno mono tina fretma tmagu'a rukrehe hiho huno maka Israeli vahe'mota tasami'ne.
Hu'neanagi Joni'ma huhamprinte'nea eri'zama'a eri vga reteno'a, mago'ene anage hu'ne, Iza'e hutma nagrikura nentahize? Nagra ana nera omni'noe. Hu'neanagi antahiho, mago'mo'a namage ne-e. Nagra knarera osu'noankina agia anontema anaki'nea nofira katu ofegahue huno hu'ne.
Nafuhetma Abrahamu agigo azankomofo nagare, amama Anumzanku koro nehu'za tamagrane mani'naza megi'a vahe'motma kumipinti tazahu kea tagrite atregeno e'ne.
Na'ankure Jerusale mani'naza vahe'mo'zane, kva vahe'zmimo'zanena Agra taza hu'nere hu'za ke'za antahi'za osu'naze. Kasnampa vahe'mo'za Agriku hu'za kre'naza kea maka mni fruhu (sabat) mono knare'ma hampri'za nentahi'za, antahiso'e osu'za ahenaku huhaviza hunte'naza kemo'a, avufa'a fore hu'ne.
Ahe fri agafagura ke'za erifore osu'za, zamagra Paerotinte vu'za, antahige'za ahe frio hu'za hu'naze.
Agriku'ma hu'zama avon tafepi krente'naza maka nanekea huvgarete'za, keka zafareti erifenka atre'za eri'za vu'za kerifi ome ante'naze.
Hu'neanagi Anumzamo'a fri kragefe'nefinti azeri otigeno,
Galiliti amage' ante'za Jerusalem mareri'za e'naza vahe'taminte rama'a zupa efore hu'ne. E'ima ke'naza nagamo'za vahepina huama hu'za menina zamasmi'gahaze.
Hanki neragehokizmima huvempa huzmante'nea knare musenke tagrama neramasmunana,
ama ana huvempa kea, Anumzamo'a tagrite eri knare huranteno Agra'a mofavre'aza huneranteno, Jisasinena azeri oti'ne, ko'ma tare zgame avon tafepi krente'nea kante, Kagra mofavreni'a menina mani'nanke'na, Nagra negafa'na manigahue huno huama hu'ne. (Sam-Zga 2:7)
Hu'neanagi e'ima hunte'nere, Anumzamo'a tamage huno Jisasina azeri oti'neakino mago'anena frino onkasritfa hu'ne, Anumzamo'a anage huno hu'ne, Nagra agru huno ruotge hu'nea huvempa asomu ke Devitima ami'noana, menina tamagrira tamigahue, (Aisa 55:3)
E'ina hu'negu mago'ene zgame avon tafepina anage huno kre'ne, Kagra atresankeno ruotge hu'nemo'a onkasrigahie. (Sam-Zga 16:10)
Deviti'a, agrama manino e'nea knafina Anumzamo'ma erigahane huno hunte'nea eri'zana eri vagareteno, frige'za negehoma asentenafi ome asentageno avufamo'a kasri'ne.
Hu'neanagi Jisasina fri'nefinti Anumzamo azeri otigeno onkasri'ne.
E'ina hu'negu nenafutma antahita keta hiho, ama ana ne'pinti kumi tamia eri atresia ke huama hu'na neramasmune.
Ama ana nete'ma zamentinti hanu'za fatgo vahe manigahaze. Mosese kasegemo'a tamazeri fatgo osugahie.
Ana hu'negu tamagra kava hu'nenkeno, kasnampa vahe'mo'za hu'naza nanekemo'a tmagritera fore osino.
Kiza zokago kema nehaza vahe'tmina, keho! Tamano nevazinketma antri hutma fritma haviza hugahaze! Nagra knare eri'za enerugetma tamentinti'a nosaze. Vahe'mo'ma tamasmi'nigeta tamentintia osugahaze, huno kre'ne. (Hava 1:5)
Anage huteke Poli'ene Banabasike atineramikeno, vahe'mo'za ama ana nanekea ru mni fruhu kna (sabat) zupa knare eme tasmigaha'o, hu'za zanasmi'naze.
Mono'ma osi mono nompi (sinagog) huvgarete'za, vu'za e'za nehageno, rama'a Jiu vahe'mo'zane, Anumzanku koro nehaza megi'a vahe'mo'za, Poline Banabasi kizani zanavriri'za nevzage'ne, zamazeri hanaveti ke hu'ne, Anumzamofo asunku'zampina hanavetita maniho hu'ne ana vahera zamasmi'na'e.
Hanki anante Mni fruhu kna (Sabat) zupa, ran kumapi mani'naza vahe'mo'za kuma azute'za Ramofo ke antahinaku emeritru hu'naze.
Mika vahe eritru nehzage'za Jiu mono vahe'mo'za nezmage'za kanive reneznantegeno Poli hiankegura mago zamarimpa huoznante'za, ana vahe'mo'za ha' reznante'naze.
Poli'ene Banabasi'kea hanavetike koro osu anage hu'na'e, Esera Juda vahe'motma Anumzamofo nanekea tmasmi'nonanagi, tamagra tmefi ana kea hunemitma fatgoma hutma mani'netma manivava asimu erizankura tame'nosigu, megi'a vahete tagra rukarehe nehu'e.
Ramo'a amanage huno hanavege hurante'ne, Nagra huhampri kantoankinka, kagra megi'a vahera tvi zami mani'nenka, kumipinti zamazahu kea erinka mopa atupare uhanatigahane huno tasami'ne. (Aisa 42:6, 49:6)
Megi'a vahe'mo'za ana naneke nentahiza muse nehu'za, Ramofo kegu tusi'za hu'za musenkase nehazageno, mani'vava zamasimu erigahaze huno huhampri zamante'nea vahe'mo'za zamentinti hu'naze.
Ana hazageno Ramofo kemo ana mopa kaziga haezganino vuno eno hu'ne.
Hu'neanagi Jiu vahe'mo'za, Anumzamofonku koro nehu'za zamagi me'nea a'nene, zamagi me'nea vene'nene zamarimpare ke hu'za zamazeri otige'za, Poline Banabasi kiznia, ana mopa kazigatira zamahe anati tre'naze.
Zanahe anatizageke, zanagiareti kugusopa rupopo hutra'azamo'a, huzmerino e'izama hazazamo'a knare osiaza hazankino knazamo'a tmagripi megahie nehuke, Ikoniamu atreke vu'na'e.
Hu'neanagi Antioku kumate'ma zamentinti nehu'za Ramofo amage nentaza nagapina muse'zamo'ene Ruotge Avamu'mo'a avite'ne.
Antioku mani'nakeno fore hu'neankna kna'za fore hu'ne, Poli'ene Banabasikea Ikonia kumate vuke, Jiu vahe osi mono nompi (sinagog) hampo'natike hakare vahe'mo antahi ama hu'are, mono kea huama nehake'za, rama'amo'za Jiu vahe'ene Griki vahe kevumo'za zamentinti hu'naze.
Hu'neanagi Jiu vahe'mo'za zamentinti ana kegura nosuza, megi'a vahe antahintahi eri savri hazage'za, ana netrena ha' rezanante'naze.
Ana hazageno mago'a knafina anantega mani'neke, mono kea hanavetike Ramofonkura nehune, asunku'zamofo kea nehakeno, avame'zane kaguvazanena zanagri znazampi eri fore hu'ne.
Hu'neanagi ana ran kumapi mani'naza vahe krerafamo'za amu'nompinti refako hu'za, mago'amo'za Jiu vahetega vazage'za, mago'amo'za aposol vahetega vu'za hagerafi'naze.
Megi'a vahe'ene Jiu vahe'mo'zane kva vahe zamine, zamazeri haviza huta have knonu tare netrena zanahefrigahune hu'za nehazageke,
Poli'ene Banabasikea ananke nentahi'ne, freke Likonia rankumamofo osi kumatrena Listrane Debine ana kaziga asoparega meno vu'nea mopare umani'na'e.
Anantega umani'neke mago'ene Knare Muse Kea huama hu'ne zamasmi'na'e.
Listra kumatera mago agia havizahu ne' ksente'nea ne' mani'ne, ksente'neregatira kana vano nosia nere.
Ana ne'mo Poli'ma huama hiankea mani'neno antahine. Poli'a ana ne'ma avufi kefatgo huno negeno'a, amentinti nehiankino knare huntegahie nehuno,
ran ke huno asami'ne, kagareti oti fatgo huo huno higeno, ana ne'mo, haru huno marerino tamino nehuno otino vu'ne.
Poli'ma hiazama ana vahe tamimo'za nege'za, Lakonia kefinti ranke hu'za anumzantamimo vahe fore huno tagrite ne-e hu'za hu'naze!
Zamagra Banabasinku Ziusi (havi anumzane) nehu'za, Polinku Hemesi'e (havi anumzane) hu'za kahefa zanagi ante'naze. Na'ankure Poli'a ke ne'ku hu'naze.
Ziusi havige anumzamofo mono nona, ran kumamofona megi'a, tva'onte me'nea nomofo kva ne'mo'a mago'a, bulimakaona nevareno mago'a avasase'zantamine erino ran kumamofo kahante vige'za, agrane ana mika vahe'mo'za kre sramna huznantenaku hu'naze.
Hu'neanagi aposol Poli'ene Banabasikea ananke nentahike kukena zani'a tagato tagatu nehu'ne, zanagare'ne ana vahetamimofo amunompi ufre'ne kezatike anage hu'na'e.
Ama vahe'motma, na'a amazana nehaze? tagra vahetafa mani'neta tamagri kna hu'no'e! Tagra knare musenke huama huta neramasmu'e, ana hanunketa tmazama osuno havi zampintira atretma, Agra monane mopane, hagerine maka'zama tro huno asimu anteno mani'nea Anumzante monora huntegahaze.
Korapa knafima mani'naza vahera, Anumzamo zamatrege'za maka mopafi vahe'mo'za zamagra zamesia kante vu'za e'za hu'naze.
Hu'neanagi Agrama knare'zama hu'neana fraoki'neanki, monafinti kora atregeno runo ne'za raga rentegeno eri knare hunermanteno tmesia ne'zana neramino musezana tamagu'afina ante'ne.
Anahu kea hu'neanagi kresramna vuznantenaku hu'nazana vahe'ma i'o huzmantenaku hu'noana, tusi'a amuho hurante'ne.
Hu'neanagi Jiu vahe'mo'za Antioku kumateti'ene Ikonia kumateti e'za, havige nehie hu'za zamagrarega eme zamavrente'za, Polina have knonu ahe'za avazu hu'za rankumapinti ati rami'za megi'a frie hu'za zamagesa nentahiza ome atre'naze.
Hu'neanagi Anumzamofo amage nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za, regorave nehazageno anampinti otino ran kumapinka eteno ufarene. Maseke nanterana Banabasi'ene atre'ne Debi vu'na'e.
Ana ran kumate'ma knare muse ke (gutnius) huama hakeno rama'a vahe'mo'za, amage ante disaipol naga fore hazageno, zanagra Listra kumate'ene Ikoniane Antioku kumate vu'na'e.
Zanagra Jisasi amage' nentaza disaipol naga zamagu'a zamazeri hanaveti ke hunezmasmike, hanavetita tamentintifina maniho, Anumzamofo kumapima vunakuma hanuta, rama'a knazampi ufreteta henka vugahune hu'na'e.
Ana nehuke, mono kva vahe (elda) mago'a mono nonte zamazeri onetike ne'zana a'o huneke nunamu nehune, zanamentintima neha'a Ramofo azampi zamante'na'e.
Ananteti Pisidi'a distrikifi ufareke agatera'azamoke, Pamfilia provinsifi ehanati'na'e.
Zanagra Pega kumate mono naneke ome huteke, Ataria kumate urami'na'e.
Anantetira atre'ne ventifi marerike ete Antioku kumate vu'na'e, korapara ana kumateti Anumzamofo asunkuzampi huzamantake'ne vunate ete ehanatina'e.
Zanagrama ehanatike mono vahezga eme zamazeri atru huteke, makazama Anumzamo'ma zanagripima hu'neazana nezamasmi'ne, megi'a vahete kama eri hagro hige'za zamentinti hu'naza ke zamasmi'na'e.
Ana kumate Anumzamofo amage' nentaza disaipol naga'ene zazakna mani'na'e.
Mago'a vahe'mo'za Judia kazigati e'za Antioku ehanati'za amanage hu'za amage' nentaza nagara rempi huzami'naze, Mosese hu'nea kere amage' antetma tamavufa taga hiho, anama osanutma tamahoke heno tamaza osugahie.
Poli'ene Banabasi kema ke hakare ana vahe'enema hugantigama hutageno, mono vahe zgamo'za Poline Banabasine amu'no zamifinti mago'a vahe'mo'zane kehakare hu'nazaza eri fatgo hunaku mago'a, aposol naga'ene mono kva vahe'ene (eldas) mago zamarimpa osu'naza keaga huza eri fatgo hunaku Jerusale vu'naze.
Ana hige'za mono nagamo'za, huzamantege'za, Fonesiane Sameria ufare'za agatere'za maka megi'a vahe'tamimo'za zamagu'a rukarehe hu'naza kea mono vahe'zga zamasmige'za tusi'za hu'za muse hu'naze.
Zamagrama Jerusale uhanatizage'za, mono vahe'mo'zane, mago'a aposol naga'ene mono kva vahe'mo'za (eldas) muse hu'za zamarage'za, maka'zama Anumzamo zamagrite'ma hu'neazana huama hu'za zamasmi'naze.
Hu'neanagi mago'a Farisi mono vahepinti, zamagua rukarehe hu'za Kraisinte zamentinti hu'namo'za, oti'za anage hu'naze, megi'a vahe'mo'za zamufama taga hute'za Mosesi kasegema amage antesazana knare hugahie.
Aposol naga'ene mono kva (eldas) vahe'mo'za atru hu'za ana naneke erifatgo hu'naze.
Eri atru hu'za zazate kea refako hu'za antahizageno, Pita otino ana nanekemofo nona'a amanage huno zamasmi'ne, nenfutma, tamagra antahi'naze mago'a kna evigeno, Anumzamo'a nagri huhamprinanteno, megi'a vahepi mono kea huo huno hunantege'na, hugeno knare musen ke antahi'za zamentinti hu'naze.
Higeno Anumzamo vahe'mofo agu'a keno antahino hu'nemo'a, zamagritera eriama huno Ruotge Avamura zami'ne, na'ankure tagri'ma hu'neazana huno zami'ne.
Hankino tagrira Anumzamo'a ruzana huranteno, zamagrira ruzana huozmante'ne, zamentinti nehazageno zamagu'a zamazeri agru hu'ne.
Hagi menina nahigetma Anumzamofona rimpa he'zana nehutma, bulumaka'amofo zamanankempi anaki nezmantaza kna knanentake agare namare zafa (Yoke) Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol nagapina nentaze. Tagri nerageho'ene, tagranena eriga osu'nonankna knazana zaminaku nehazo?
Hu'neanagi tagrama tamentintima nehunana, Ramofo Jisasi asunku'zamo kefo zantifinti tahoke heno zamagri hu'nea kante anteno taza hu'ne.
Atru hu'naza maka vahetamimo'za, ke osu mani'nage'za Polike Banabasikea kaguva'zane avame'zanema zanagripinti Anumzamo'ma megi'a vahe'ma huzmante'nea zana zamasmi'na'e.
Ana nanekema huvgamaretageno, Jemisi'a anage huno kenona hu'ne, nafuhetma ke'ni'a antahiho,
Saimoni anage huno huama hu'ne, Anumzamo'a megi'a vahera zamare'na Nagra'ni'a vahere hu'na huhampri zamantegahue hu'ne.
Kasnampa vahe'mo'za krente'naza kemo'a, ama kenena mago kna hu'ne,
Anama hutesu'na, ete Nagra e'na Deviti noma karite'neana etena eme kigahue. Nagra'ni'a havizama hu'nea nona eriso'e hugahue.
Ana nehanena miko vahe'mo'za, Ra'monagu nehakesagena, zamagima hesuana, mika megi'a vahera Nagri vahere hu'na zamagrikura hugahue, huno mika'zama troma hu'nea Ramo'a hu'ne, (Emo 9:11-12)
Korapama evu'nea knafina amazana antahino keno hu'neane.
E'ina hu'negu, huvgare nanekea nagra (Jemisi'na) amanage nehue, tagra mago'anena knazana ozamisune, na'ankure megi'a vahe'mo'za amu'no zamifinti rukarehe hu'za Anumzamofonte e'naze.
Hu'neanagi avo kreta amanage huta zamazeri haviza huzampintira manigneta maniho huta zamasmi snune. Havi anumzamofo ami'nesia zane, monko avu'avazane, anankema tga osu zgagfane, korama me'ne'nia ame'a oneho huta zamasmisune.
Na'ankure tagra antahinone, ofenka'a knareti eno menima e'neana, Mosese kasege'a huama hakare kumatera nehu'za, maka mni fruhu knarera (Sabat) osi mono (sinagog) nompi umareri'za hampri'za nezamasmize.
Anante aposol naga'ene, mono kva vahe'mo'zane, maka mono kevumo'za amuno zamifinti huhampri zamanteneana, Judasinku Basabasi nehaza ne'ene Sailasi'a ana naga'amofo kva ne' zamine huhampri zananteke, Poline Banabasi kizni Antioku vihogu huzmante'ne.
Ama'na avon karentage'za eri'za vu'naze, aposol nagategati'ene mono kva vahe'motane, tamagri tamafuheta megi'a tafuhetane nerasarogta Antiokune Siriane, Silisiama mani'namotarega musen ke huramantone.
Kema antahunkeno'a, mago'a vahe'mo'za tagripinti vu'za, huozmantenona ke ome tmasmi'za kemo'a, kna neramino antahintahitami tmazeri savari hu'naze.
Tagra mago tarimpa huta tagri aroneti Banabasine Poline magoka ama vahera huhampri zamanteta huzamantesunke'za vanaze.
Zanagra zanavufa tagri Ramofo Jisasi Kraisi agi'are atre'za neha'a netre'ne.
E'ina hu'negu Judasine Sailasi kizni huzmantonankino, zanagra zani'a ama kemofona ome hamprike tamasmigahaze.
Na'ankure knare'ma hu'neana, Ruotge Avamu'ene tagranena, ruga'a knazana ontaminaku nehunanki, ama kemofo avaririgahaze.
Ana hu'neanki havi anumzamofo ami'nesia zane korama'a me'nenia ame'ane, anankema tagaosu zgagfa onetma monko'zana osugahaze. Tamagrama amazama osutma maniganeta manisazana knare hugahaze. Tamarimpa frune maniho.
Ana hute'za zamagra atre'za Antioku urami'za, maka naga ome zamazeri atru hute'za anama kre'naza avona zami'naze.
Rankema hu'za ana avoma hampritageno, vahe'tamimo'za zamazeri hanaveti kema hazazankura, tusi'a musenkase hu'naze.
Hagi Judasike Sailasikea znagranena kasanampa netrenkike, so'e hu'za mani'saza kene zamazeri hanaveti ke nezmasmike, zamentinti nagara zaza naneke hu'ne zamasmi'na'e.
Mago'agna manitakeno, ana kumate zamentinti nehaza naga'mo'za, tanarimpa farune vi'o hu'za huznantageke, e'na'a vahetega eteke vu'na'e.
<range>
Hu'neanagi Poli'ene Banabasikea, rama'a rempi huzami vahe'ene Antioku kumate mani'ne'za rempi hunezami'za Ramofonkea huama hu'za zamasmi'naze.
Henka'a mago'a kna evutegeno, Poli'a Banabasina amanage huno asami'ne, ete vuta maka kumapi zamentinti nagara, Anumzamofo kema zamasmi'no'ana, nankna nehazafi ome zamagesu'e.
Banabasi'a, Joninku mago agi'a Maki'e nehaza ne' avare'neta vanu'e hu'ne,
Hianagi ko'ma avareke Pamfili'a kumate nevakeno, zanatreno eri'za e'o'ri vu'negu Poli'a hamponatino i'o, avareta ovugahu'e hu'ne.
Hu'nege'ne anazanteku fra vaziteke, otare atre hu'na'e. Banabasi'a Makina avareno votifi marerino Saiprasi ti amunompi kumate vu'na'e.
Hu'neanagi Poli'a Sailasi avarena vugahue nehige'za, Anumzamofo asunku'zane knare vi'o hu'za mono afuhe'zane asarahehe'zanena musen ke huznantageke atreke vuna'e.
Siriane Silisi'a kumapi Poli'a ufreno nevuno, mono vahera zamazeri hanavetime vu'ne.
Poli'a Debe kumate ene Listra kumate'ene ne-eno, mago nera Timoti'e nehaza ne'kino, nerera'a Jiu a'mo amentinti nehia a'mofo mofavre. Hianagi nefa'a Griki ne' mani'ne.
Listrane Ikoniam mani'naza zamentinti naga'mo'za knare nere hu'za nehaza nere.
Poli'a avareno Timoti vunaku nehuno, avufa taga huntene, na'ankure mago'a Jiu vahera ana kumatera mani'nageno ana hu'ne, makamo'za antahi'naze agri nefa'a Griki ne' mani'ne.
Zamagrama kumate kumate ufare'za nevu'za, aposol naga'mozane mono (elda) kva vahe'mo'zama Jerusale kumate hu'naza kea megi'a zamentinti vahe'mo'za avaririsaze hu'naza ke ome zamasmi'naze.
Anama higeno mono vahe'mo'za zamentintifina hanave e'nerizageno, mago mago knafina rama'a vahe efare efare hu'za ra hu'naze.
Zamagra Pamfaliane, Galasia kaziga ugatere'za nevzageno, Ruotge Avamu'mo mono ke Esia kaziga huzanku i'o huno huzamantege'za agatere'za vu'naze.
Zamagrama Misia kaziga ete'za, Bitania kaziga vunaku hu'nazanagi, Jisasi Avamu'mo zamatrege'za ovu'naze.
Ana hige'za zamagra Misia agatere'za, Troasi rankumate urami'za vu'naze.
Keragera Poli'a mago ava'nagnaza efore higeno keana, Masedonia ne'mo otino mani'neno asamino, tagritega erakahenka Masedonia eme taza huo huno nehigeno ke'ne!
Ana ava'nagnaza Poli'a ketegeta, Anumzamo tasmino Masedonia vutma knare musenke ome zamasmiho nehiankita, ame huta ome zamasmisune huta hu'none.
Troasi kumateti votia erigantu atreta hagerimpi vufatgo huta Samotresi vuta, ugatereta anante kna zupa Niapolisi kumate uhanati'none.
Anantetira atreta Filipai kumate vu'none, anama mani kagi'naza kumamofo, ran kumare Masedonia, Romu kamanimo kavagri'nea kumate mago'a kna ana kumate mani'none.
Mni fruhu knazupa rankumamofo kafampinti atiramita tinkenare nevuta, tagesama antahunana mago'a Jiu vahe'mo'za nunamu nehaza kumara me'negahie nehuta, a'ne naga mani'nageta anante umanita agafa huta, ana a'ne naga'enena kea hu'none.
Mago ara agi'a Lidia'e nehaza a'mo knare konariri'ane fitu tavrave hatino zagore netrea a'mo, Taitaria rankumateti a' mani'neno Anumzamofonte mono hunentea a'mo kema hu'na kea antahi'ne. Anumzamo'a agu'a eri rukrehe higeno Poli'ma hiankea antahi'ne.
Ana a'ene noma'afi nemani'za naga'anema mono tima frete'za, anage huno Lidi'a tantahigeke hu'ne, tamagra nagriku'ma Ramofonte mani tragotenoma mani'ne hanutma noni'afi eta emaniho, huno hampo'natino tantahigeke higeta noma'afi vuta umani'none.
Anante nunamuhu kumatega vunaku nevunkeno, kazokzo mofa'mo'a eme tage'ne. Ana mofara havi avamu'mo agu'afi mani'neno henkama fore'ma haniaza hufore nehigeno, kva'amo'za hufore'ma nehige'za knare zago e'nerizane.
Hanki ana mofa'mo Poline tagri tamefi tavririno ne-eno kezatino zmasamine, ama vahera Marerisa Anumzamofo kazokzo eri'za eneri'za vahere. Ama vahe'mo'za kefozantamifinti tmahoke aheno tamavaresia naneke tamasmiku neaze.
Hakare knafina ana mofa'mo anazanke hu'ne. Hu'neanagi Poli'ma anankege antahiazamo'a avesra higeno, rukrehe huno ana avamuku anage hu'ne, Nagra Jisas Kraisi agifi hugantoanki atiraminka evuo! Higeno ana mofara atreno atirami'ne.
Hu'neanagi ana mofa'mofo kva vahe'mo'za zamema ante'za zgoma e'neriza zama vige'za, Poline Sailasi'kizni zamagra ome zanazerite'za, zanavazu hu'za kva vahe'zgare maketi kumapi uhanati'naze.
Zamagrama kagota hu'za ke fakohu (megistret) kva vahe zgare zanavare'za vute'za anage hu'naze. Ama netremokea tagri ran kumapi vahera zamazeri savari neha'e, na'ankure zanagra Juda netrenkike,
zanagrama vahe'ma rempi hunezmike amaza hiho ha'azamo'a, Romu vahe'mota tavutava'za ha'renerante.
Rama'a vahe'mo'za eri atru hu'za ha' rezmantageno, ke fakohu kva ne'mo Poline Sailasi kizni kukena zani'a eri vararo hutreteno, knonteti knonkeve zanami'o huno huzmante'ne.
Tusiza hu'za sefu knonkeve znamite'za, kina nompi zanavare'za ome matevu'za nezanatre'za, kina kva ne'ku hunte'za, kegva huso'e huo hu'za asami'naze.
Ke fakohu kva vahe'mo'za, kina nompi kva ne'ku, kina nompi avarento hia ke antahiteno, agu'afinka me'nea kinanompi zanavarenteno, zafafi zanagia erinteno anaki znantege'ne mani'na'e.
Kenage amunompi Polike Sailasikea, Anumzamofontega nunamune zgame'ene nehakeno, ruga'a kina vahe'mo'za zanantahi'naze.
Ana nehakeno ame huno tusi'a imi enerigeno kina vahe nomofo agafa'amo'a tore tore hu'ne. Ame huno maka kafamo'a anagigeno, maka kina vahe zamazampi rente'naza nofimo'a evurami'ne.
Kina vahete kva ne'mo'a avu vase'nefinti otino, keana kafana anagi vgare'negeno, kazinknoma'a erino agra'a ahefrinaku hu'ne, na'ankure agesama antahiana hago kina vahe'zgamo'za fre'naze hanuno ana hu'ne.
Hu'neanagi Poli'a amanage huno ranke hu'ne, kagra kavufarera mago'zana osuo, na'ankure tagra ama ofreta maka mani'none!
Tavi tagita eho huteno ana kina nompinka ufareno Poline Sailasi kizni zanagiafi ahirahi neregeno utraka huno umase'ne.
Anante otino zanavreno atiramino fegi nevuno, amanage huno zanantahige'ne, Ina kna hanugeno kefo zaniafinti nahoke ahegahie?
Ana ke'arera anage hu'na'e, Ramofo Jisasinku kamentinti nehugeno, kefozanka'afinti kahoke neheno, nonka'afima nemani'za naga'moza'nema zamentintima hanageno'a zamahoke ahegahie.
Anage nehuke Ramofonke nesamike, maka noma'afima mani'naza vahera zamasami'na'e.
Ana kenageke kina nonte kva nemo'a zanavufafi zanahe'naza namuna sese huznantetegeno, agri'ene noma'afi mani'naza nagara mono ti ana keregeke frezmante'na'e.
Kina nonte kva ne'mo zanavreno noma'afi ufareno ne'za ome tro huznanteteno, Anumzante amentinti hia zankura, tusiza huno ana miko noma'afima nemaniza naga'anena musena hu'naze.
Nantera ko'atigeno ke fakohu kva vahe'mo'za, ati vahe zga huzamanteno anage hu'ne, zanatrenke'za ana ne'trena vi'o hu'naze.
Kina nonte kva ne'mo Polina amanahu ke ome asami'ne. Ke fakohu kva vahe'mo'za (jas) zanazeri megi'a zanatre'o hunantage'na e'noe, hagi menina atiramita tanarimpa frune vi'o huno zanasmi'ne.
Hu'neanagi Poli'a ati vahe'mokizmi ke nona'a amanage huno zamasmi'ne. Zamagra rama'a vahe zamufi knare ke agafa e'orine'za havige zante tahenaze, tagranena Romu mopa agafa vahe mani'nonanagi, kinafi tavare'za emerante'naze. Hagi menina oku'a hurantenaku nehazo? Tamage anara osu'tfa hugahaze! Zamagra'zmi e'za eme tavare megi tatregahaze.
Ana naneke ati vahe'mo'za ke fakohu kva vahe ome nezamasmige'za nentahi'za, Poli'ene Sailasike Romu vahe mani'no'e hukema ha'azanku zamagogo fege'za koro hu'naze.
Ana hute'za vu'za Polina zamasunku ke ome huznantete'za, zanavre'za atirami'za ama ran (siti) kumara atreta vi'o hu'za mago'ane huzanante'naze.
Anama kina nompinti atiramitekea Lidia nontega vutene, zamentinti nehaza naga ome nezamageke, zamazeri hanaveti ke hunezmanteke atreke vu'na'e.
Amfipolisine Apoloniane ran kumatre ugatere'za vute'za, henka Tesalonaika rankumate Jiu vahe osi mono no (sinagog) anantega menere e'naze.
Poli'a Jiu vahe'mo'za osi mono nozmifi mani'nageno marerino, korapa agrama nehiaza huno, tagufa mni fruhu kna (Sabat) zupa avontafepinti kea zamasmino,
ana kemofo agafa'a eriama nehuno huzamerino, Kraisina ahesnageno ata eriteno fripintira otigahie hu'ne. Ama ana Jisasinku'ma nehuana e'i Kraisi'e.
Mago'a Jiu vahe'mo'zane, rama'a Anumzanku koro nehaza Griki vahe'mo'zane, zamagine a'nemo'zanena Poline Sailasi ene tragote'za hagerafi'za mani'naze.
Hu'neanagi zamarimpa zamazeri otige'za Jiu vahe'mo'za antahi haviza hunezmante'za, kanivere'za kefo vahe maketi kumapi zamazeritru hu'za, ran kumapi ranke hute'za ana vahe'mo'za Jasoni nona tagana taganu vazi'za, Poline Sailasi kiznigu hake'za zanavre'za atru nehazafi vunaku hu'naze.
Ana vahe'mo'za Poline Sailasi kizanima hake'za erifore nosu'za, Jasonine, mago'a zamentinti nehaza afuhe'inena zamazu hu'za rankumamofo kva (siti ofisa) vahete vu'za ranke hu'za anage huzmante'naze, ama vahe'mo'za mopane mopane hazenke eri fore nehaza vahera ama e'naze.
Hagino Jesoni'a muse huno nantu vahe noma'afi osi'agna manihogu zamarente'ne! Zamagra Sisa hanave tra kea ha' renente'za anage hu'naze, mago kinima mani'neana agi'a Jisasi'e hu'za nehaze!
Ana vahe'mo'za rama'a vahe'zga zamazerisavri nehazageno, rankumamofo kva vahe'mo'za ana kea antahi'naze.
Anante ran kumamofo kva vahe'mo'za Jesoni ene zamentinti naga'mo'za mizasaza zago erite'za, henka zamatrage'za vu'naze.
Zamentinti naga'mo'za ame hu'za Poline Sailasinena kenageke huznantage'ke, Beria ran kumate vu'na'e. Uhanatiteke Jiu vahe osi mono nonte vu'na'e.
Ana Jiu vahe'mo'za antahi'za zamimo'a knare huno ama hu'negu, Tesalonaikama nemaniza Jiu vahe'mo'za nehazaza osu'naze. Na'ankure mono kema ha'ana muse hu'za eneri'za, tamage amagemo'a hu'nefi hu'za maka zupa avon tafepi ke'ankere'naze.
E'ina hu'negu rama'a Jiu vahe'mo'za zamentinti nehazageno, zamagima me'nea Griki a'nene vene'nemo'zanena zamentinti hu'naze.
Hu'neanagi Tesalonaika mani'naza Jiu vahe'mo'za antahizama, Poli'a Anumzamofo kea Beria ome huama nehie kema nentahi'za, zamagranena anantega e'za, keomente emente hu'za, zamagu zamagesa eri savari hu'naze.
Anante Anumzante mani'naza naga'mo'za, Polina huntageno ame huno hagerinkena vu'ne, hianagi Sailasi'ene Timotikea anante Beria kumate mani'na'e.
Hanki Poli'ene vu'naza vahe'mo'za, avega hu'za Antens ran kumate ome netrazageno, Sailasine Timoti kiznigu nagritega ame huke e'o kema humazamantetege'za, atre'za ete Beria vu'naze.
Poli'ma Atens kumate zanavega anteno mani'negeno, rimpamo'a kna nehigeno asunku hu'ne, na'ankure ana kumapina havige anumza tro'ma hunte'naza'zamo'a, rama'a me'negeno negeno ana hu'ne.
Ana huteno mago'a Jiu vahe'ene, Anumzamofonku koro nehaza megi'a vahe'ene osi mono nompi ome zamaretru huno nezamasmino, maketi kumapi maka kna emeri atruma haza vahera nanekea zamasmi'ne.
Anahu kna huno mago'a Epikurien vahe'ene, Stoik vahe'mo'zanena vahe'mofo nomani'zama rezagane'zama negaza vahe'mo'za (Filosofa) kehakare hunentageno mago'amo'za anage hu'za antahi'naze, Nankna ke ama neginagi vahe'mo'a hunaku nehie? Ruga'amo'za hu'za, Agra ru anumzanku nehia nere. Na'ankure Jisasi agi agenkene, fripintima oti'nea knare musenkegu hu'naze.
Ana hutege'za Polina avareza (areopagus) kanisol vahe'mo'za ke erifatgo nehazare vu'za anage hu'naze, Knare ama'i kahefa kema rempima hunezamina kea hananketa antahisumpi?
Na'ankure tagra tagesa hakare huna ke kagra nehane, hagi ke agafa'amo'a na'ane hu'nefi antahinaku nehune.
Maka Antens vahe'ene ru mopareti vahe'mo'za ana kumapi emani'naza vahe'mo'za knazimi'a atre'za manine'za kahefa zama fore hia zamofo naneke huge antahige hu'naze.
Ana higeno Poli'a kanisol vahe'mo'za ke erifatgo nehazare otino (Areopagus) anage hu'ne, Antens vahe'mota, nagrama koana hakarezante tamagra monora hunentaze.
Na'ankure nagra vano nehuna urava'o hu'na rezagane'na monoma hunentaza'zama koana, mago itama (alta) husga huntenarera anage hutma krente'naze, ontahinona Anumzanetege hutma hu'naze. E'ina hu'negu ontahinetma mono'ma hunentaza zamofonku, e'i nagra huama hu'na neramasmue.
Ama mopane maka'zama me'neaza tro hu'nea Anumzamo, Agra'a monafine mopafinena Ra mani'neno, vahe'mo'za zamazanu ki'naza mono nompina nomanie.
Mago'a zankura atupara nosigeno vahe'mo'za zamazanu tro hu'za aza nosaze. Na'ankure agra'a asimu anteno mani'zana zamigeno zamasimu antageno, maka'zana hakare vahe'mofona nezamie.
Magoke vahepinti Agra maka kaziga kuma ante'za manisaza vahera tro hu'ne. Mopafi manivitesazegu nehuno, manisnaza kna'a nenteno, kumama manisaza kumara, kankamu zamino e'ire manigahaze huno huzmantetere hu'ne.
Anumzamofonku hake'za nege'za, agrikura zamazama hu'za hake'za erifore hu'nazanagi, agra tagrira magoke magokemota afetera omani'ne.
Na'ankure agripi manineta mika'zana nehuta, ama mopafina manita neone, mago'a tamagri fronka kemo'a anage hu'ne. Na'ankure tagranena agripinti fore hu'none.
Anumzampinti fore huta mani'none hanuta, kolima silvare'ma, havereti'ma vahe'mo'zama antahintahi zamiretima tro huntea zankura Anumzamo e'inahu kna hu'ne huta ontahisune.
E'inahu hu'za zamagena hu'miza e'naza kna'a, Anumzamo'a agesa ontahi'ne, hagi menina agra miko kaziga vahera hankave nentake ke huno, tamagu'a rukarehe hiho huno hu'ne.
Na'ankure ama mopama Agrama refako hania kna, agra'a fatgo avu'ava zampi ko huhampri tegeno me'ne. Mago ne' huhampri ante'neana miko vahera amate huzameri huno fri'nefinti azeri oti'ne.
Fri'nefinti azeri oti'nea naneke nehige'za nentahiza, mago'amo'za agiza re'naze. Hianagi mago'amo'za anage hu'naze, mago'ane ama nanekea hananketa antahigahune hu'naze.
Poli'a havige mono kumara (Areopagus) atreno vu'ne.
Hu'neanagi mago'a vahe'mo'za Poli'ene hagerafi'za zamentinti hu'naze. Anampintira magora Dionisiosi'e nehaza nera kanisol vahe'mo'za ke erifatago nehaza kumate kanisol nere, magora Damarisi'e nehaza a'ene mago'amo'za zamentinti hu'naze.
Ana amefiga'a, Poli'a Anten kumara atreno Korinti vu'ne.
Anantega mago Jiu ne' ome keno erifore hu'neana, Pontusi kasente'naza ne' agi'a Akuila'e, mensin'tfa nenaro Prisila ene Italiti ena'e. Na'ankure Sisa Klaodiasi'a mika Jiu vahe'ma Romu nemani'za vahera atretma viho huno huzmantegeno Poli'a zanagri ome zanage'ne.
Na'ankure agrama mago'zahu eri'zama e'nerigu huno magopi zanagri'ene mani'neno eri'zana eri'ne, (na'ankure zamagra mago kna eri'za antahine'za nofiteti seli no nehatiza nagare).
Nehuno mika mni fruhu kna (Sabat) zupa atru nehu'za mono nehaza osi mono nompi, marerino mono naneke huno, Jiu vahe'ene Griki vahera masevenke huno zamarimpa eri vakaneno zamasmi'ne.
Masedoniati Sailasi'ene Timotike eramike akeno, Poli'a agafa huno mika Jiu vahera zamazeri atru huno mono kege'za maka kna nezamasmino, Jisasi'a, Agra'a tazahuno taguvazi nere huno eriama huno zamasmi'ne.
Ana nehigezama ha'ma rente'za krunagema huntaza vahera anakre ku'a (saket) zafino kugusopa rupopo nehuno anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamagri kora kumimo'a tamagritami tamasenire megahie! Nagripina mago knazani'a omane'tfa hugahie. Amareti agafa huno vaniana, Jiu vahe'rompage megi'a vahete vugahue.
Huno nezamasmino Poli'a anante osi mono nontetira atreno, mago megi'a nera agi'a Taitus Jastusi'e nehaza ne'mo, Anumzante mono hunentea ne'mofo nontega atru nehu'za mono nehaza nomofo asopare me'negeno vu'ne.
Atru nehu'za mono nehaza nonte kegva nehia nera (presitent) Krispusi'e nehaza ne'ene, mika agri kvafi nemaniza vahe'mo'za Ramofonte zamentinti hu'naze. Ana nanekema nentahi'za, rama'a Korinti vahe'mo'za zamentinti hu'za mono ti fre'naze.
Ramo'a kerage ava'nagna zampi anage huno Polina asami'ne, korera osuo, keaga huvava nehunka, keagama hu'zana azeoritfa huo.
Na'ankure Nagra kagrane manigahuankino, kahe frikura mago'mo'a kagri kavufarera azana onte'tfa hugahie, na'ankure ama'na rankumapina Nagri vahera rama'a mani'naze, nehigeno ke'ne.
Higeno anampina mago kafugi sigisi'a ika mani'neno, ana vahera Anumzamofo keaga rempi huzami'ne.
Kalio'ma, ugagota ra kvama (Gavana) Akaea kumatema mani'nege'za, Jiu vahe'mo'za oti'za mago antahintahi eri retro hu'za, avare'za ke refakohu trate (koti nonte) vu'za,
anage hu'naze, ama ne'mo'a ruzahu huno tagri tra kemo'a osu'nea kante, vahekura mono antahiho huno nezmasmie nehazageno,
Poli'ma agi'reaka hu'na ke hanuanki huno higeno, Kalio'a amanage huno Jiu vahera zamasmi'ne, mago'a hazenke zankuro, tusi'a havi kefo zanku Jiu vahe'motmama hanazana, knare hanige'na, nagra tamagri kerera hagerfigahue.
Hianagi amama hunentaza kemo'a tamagra kegu'ene tamagigu'ene, tamagratmi kasege eri hankave netizanki tamagratmi erifatgo hiho. Nagrira nave'osigu ama'na naneke'a erifatgo osugahue.
Anante kema refakohu tratetira agra'a zamahe natitrene.
Anante mika'mo'za mono nonte kva nehia ne' Sosteni azeri'za kema refkohu tramofo avuga agafa hu'za hae'naze. Ana hu'nazanagi Galio'a ana zankura agesa ontahi'ne.
Mago'a rama'a knama Korinti kumate Poli'a maniteno'a, afuhe'mokizmia hufru huno mani'neho hunezmanteno, votifi hageri tkaheno Siria nevigeke Prisila'ene Akuilake agrane vu'na'e. Na'ankure Anumzamofo avure'ma huvempama hu'negu, Sensarea kumate Poli'a anuzokara vagateno erivo'vo hu'ne.
Efesasi uhanatite'za, anante Poli'a Prisila'ne, Akuilagizni'a ome nezanetreno, agra osi mono nompi umarerino, Jiu vahe'ene naneke hugantugma hu'za antahi'naze.
Antahige'za za'zakna tagrane manisane nehazageno, knarere huno osu'ne.
Hianagi hufru hunezmanteno anage hu'ne, Anumzamofo avesi'zama me'nenige'na, ete'na tamagritega egahue. Anage nehuno Efesasiti'ma votifi,
vuno Saeseria unehanatino, Jerusalem umarerino mono vahera musenke hunezmanteno, anantetira Antioku urami'ne.
Antioku'ma mago'a knama maniteno, ana kumara atreno mago'mago kumate Galasiane Fezianena vano huno Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol nagara zamazeri hampo'na hu'ne.
Mago Jiu nera, agi'a Apolosi'e, Aleksandria kumate kasente'naza nera, knare keaga nehuno avontafera antahi ankere'nea ne'mo Efesasi e'ne.
Agri'ma Ramofo Jisasi kanku rempi humizageno, hampo'natino huzmenerino keaga nehuno, Joni'ma tima frezmante'nea zantfa antahi'neanagi, Jisasi avu'ava'mofo nanekea fatgo huno huzamasmi'ne.
Agra korora osuno, agafa huno osi mono nompina hu'ama huno mono nompina keaga hu'neanagi, zanagrama agri kema nentahikea, Prisilake, Akuilakea avareke va'azamoke Anumzamofo avu'avara mago'ene huhagro huke fatgo kante asami'na'e.
Akaea vuku Apolosi'a nentahige'za, mono (kristen) naga'mo'za azeri hanavetike nesamiza huso'e sa'e hunente'za, Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol nagatega azeri so'e hiho hu'za avonkretrenaze. Anante'ma unehanatino'a, Anumzamofo asunku'zamo zamaza hige'za zamentinti nehaza nagara tusi'a zampi zamaza hu'ne.
Na'ankure agra hampo'natino Jiu vahera zamazeri hagro huno, mika vahe zamufi avontafepinti eriama huno Jisasi'a Tazahu Nere (Kraisi'e) hu'ne.
Apolosi'ma Korintima mani'negeno, Poli'a agu'afinka kuma tamimpi ufreno vuno Efesasi kumate uhnatino, mago'a disaipol naga anantega ome zamageno erifore nehuno,
zamagriku anage hu'ne, tamagra ma tamentintima hu'nazana, hago Ruotge Avamura erinafi? Agriku anage hu'naze. A'o Ruotge Avamura mani'ne huta tagra ontahitfa hu'none.
Hazageno Poli'a zamantahige'ne, Nazamofonte mono tina fre'naze? Zamagra ke'nona hu'za, Joni'ma ti fre'zama huraveri'nea zantere.
Poli'a huno, Joni'ma tima frezmante'neana, zamasunku hu'za zamagu'a rukarehe hanaza tine huno frezmantene. Vahera zamasmino, agri amage'ma ne'emofonte Jisasimpi tamentinti hiho hu'ne.
Anankema antahite'za, Jisasi Ramofo agifi mono ti fre'naze.
Hagi Poli'ma zamagrite azama antegeno'a, Ruotge Avamu'mo'a zamagrite ege'za, agafa hu'za ruzamageru ruzmageru neru'za, henkama esiazamofo kasnampa kea huama hu'naze.
Ana mika vene'nea 12fu'a naza eritru hu'naze.
Hagi 3'a ikamofo agu'afina, Poli'a osi mono nompi ufreno korera osuno, antahintahizamia eriama huno agrarega zamatreku Anumzamofo avu'ava zankura huankereno zamasmi'ne.
Hu'neanagi mago'amo'za antahi'za zami'mo'a hampo'na atige'za, zamentinti hu'zankura zamagena hunente'za, ana vahe'mokizmi zamufi Ramofo avariri kankura huhaviza hunentageno, zamagrira nezamatreno, Jisasi amage' nentaza disaipol naga nezamavreno, mago nera Tairanusi'e nehaza ne'mofo rempi huzami nonte via'zamo, mika zupa vahe'ene keaga hu'ne.
Amanahu'zana tare kafufi fore huno vu'ne, tarega Jiu vahe'ene Griki vahe'ma Esia provinsifi nemani'za vahe'mo'za Ramofo naneke antahi'sazegu anahura hu'ne.
Anumzamo'a Poli azampi huvazino rama'a ruzahu ruzahu avame'za mago'ane erifore hu'ne.
Ana hinogu asi'me nehamia nosivane (ankasipimo'ene), masine'za kave kre kenane (apronimo'a), Poli avufare eme avako hute'za, eri'za kri vahe zamufare ome antageno, krizmimo'a vgaregeno, havi avamumo'a zamagripintira atirami'ne.
Mago kevu Jiu vahe'mo'za retro hu'za mago mago kumate vano vano nehu'za, Jisasi agifi huvame hu'za havi avamura huntenaku nehu'za, ana huvava hu'za nevu'za anage hu'naze. Poli'ma huama nehia Jisasi agifi atiramio huta tagra hunegantone.
Mago Jiu vahe'mokizmi rankva nera Skeva'e nehaza ne'mofona, 7ni'a mofavre zga'amo'za anahu'zana hu'naze.
Hianagi ana havi avamu'mo'a ke'nona zamire huno zamasmi'ne, Jisasina nagra ke'na antahi'na hu'na, Polina ke'noe, hagi tamagra izagate?
Higeno agu'afima havige avamu'ma fre'nea ne'mo'a zamagumpi takaureno, himamutino zamaheno rehapatige'za, korankno eneri'za ana nompinti atiramiza zamufa zamapake fre'naze.
Efesasi kumate nemaniza Jiu vahe'ene Griki vahe'mo'zane ana ke nentahizageno, tusiza huno zamagogo nefege'za Anumza Jisasi agi'a erisaga hu'naze.
Rama'a zamentinti vahe'mo'za eama hu'za zamasunku hu'za, havi zamu'zma'zana eriama hu'naze.
Huama nehu'za zamene vahe'mo'zane avuatga vahe'mo'zane kre'naza avontafe tamina eri'za amate hakare vahe zamure tevefi kre hana hu'naze. Ana avontafe miza se'naza zgoa 50 tauseni'a zgo atre'naze.
Ramofo hanavere, e'inahu'zana fore nehigeno, Ramofo nanekemo vuno eno huno hankavetino me'ne.
Anazana fore hutegeno Poli'a Masedonia kaziga vute'na Griki kaziga nevu'na Jerusale kumate vute'na, henka'a Romu kuma enena ome kegahue huno agesa antahine.
Tare azahu netrema, Timotine Erastusine huzanantegeke Masedonia kaziga vakeno, osi'agna Poli'a, agra Esia mani'ne.
Ana knafina, Jisasi Kamofonkura tusi'a hazenke Efesasia fore hu'ne.
Na'ankure magora silvare tuzampaza tro nehia ne'mofo agi'a Demetriasikino, silvareti mago amema'a trohu'neana, Atemasi mono hunentea kna'za tro hu'ne. Anazama tro'ma nehaza naga'mo'za, tusi'a zgokrerafa anazantetira tro'nehaze.
Demetriasi'a anahu erizama antahi'naza eri'za vahera kehutru huno anage hu'ne. Ama vahe'motagi, amanahu eri'zantetira zgogrerafa erifore nehune hu'ne.
Hanki tamagra ketma antahitma nehaze, Efesasige ana nosianki, Esia kokampina Polima vahetamima kehiazamo, vahe'mo'ma azanteti'ma trohu'nea anumzana, e'i tamage huno anumzana omanitfa hune huno tusi'a vahe krerafa zamazeri ruvahe nehie.
Hago menina hazenke fore hu'ne, tagri zgo erizankera eri havizana osugahie. Hianagi so'e a' anumza Atemisi mono nomo'a amne zankna hanigeno, Esia kokampi vahe'mo'zane, ama mopa kagi'afi vahe'mozama, mono hunentaza vahe'mo'za atre'sageno, ana a'mofo hanave'amo'a haviza hugahie.
Anankema nentahi'za, zamarimpamo'a haviza nehige'za oti'za keza ati'za Efesasia so'e rantia, Atemisi'a agrake mani'ne!
Higeno rankumapina rama'a kereso nehu'za, vahe'mo'za magoka zamagare'za krina nehazage'za mani'neza negaza kumapi (stetium) ufre'za, Mesadoniati Poli'enema e'na'a netre Gaiusine Aristakusikiznia zanavazu hu'za vu'naze.
Poli'ma ana vahe'zgamo'ma atru hu'nefima ufreku'ma nehige'za, Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za otre'naze.
Higeno mago'ene mago'a Esia kumate kva vahera, Polina knampa'agi'za anama atru hu'nafina keke huntonanki uofreno hu'za hampo'nati'za kea atrente'naze.
Higeno mago'amo'a magoke zanku kezati'zageno, mago'amo'a otage zanku kezati'zageno, anama atru hu'za negaza vahe'mo'za tusi savari nehazageno, rama'amo'za nahige'za atru hu'nazo ama'osu'naze.
Vahe'pintira Aleksandana Jiu vahe'mo'za atufe'za zamuga eme nente'za, ama ana zamofo keaga eriama hunka zamasmio hu'za huhanavetinaze. Aleksanda'a ama ana vahe'mo'zama hazankere nona huzmanteku azana antesga hu'ne.
Hu'neanagi kazama Aleksanda'a Jiu ne'ma mani'nege'za nege'za, ana mika vahe'mo'za magoke kere zamagerura erinte'za, 2'a auamofo agu'afina kezati'za, Efesasitira knare huno agatererfa rantia, Atemisi agrake mani'ne!
Rankumapima avoma negrea (kuskus) ne'mo ana vahe kevua zamazeri rava huteno anage hu'ne. Efesasi vahe'motma antahiho, ina vahe'mo antahino keno osu'ne? Efesasia ranku'mamo'a Atemasi agetererfa ra anumzamofo mono nona kegva nehie. Ana a'mofo amema'ama monafinti'ma asga hurami'ne.
Ana hu'negu ama anazankura ke hakare osugahaze, taganetma mani'netma ame'amara osutma tamage'sa antahitetma anazana hugahaze.
Na'ankure tamagra ma, ama ana vene'nema zamaretma e'nazana, ra mono nompintira kumazafa ose'na'e, tagrama anteneta mono hunentona a' anumzankura (goddess) huhavizana huonte'na'e.
E'ina'ma Demetriasi'o agrane eri'za eneriza naga'mo'zama rumokizmima huzmante'nesigetma ke refakohu nonte zamaretma vinke'za, kva vahe'mofo zamure keaga hugantu hugama hugahaze.
Hu'neanagi mago'anema keagama hunaku hanutma, vahe'ma atruhu'za keagama azerirva nehaza knazupa kanisol vahete mareritma azerirava hugahaze.
Na'ankure menima ke hakarema nehuna zankuma, Romu rankva vahe'mo'za tantahigesageta hazenkefi manigahune. Na'ankure eriama huta zamasmisuna knare agafa'a omane'ne. E'inahu kema huno nezmasmino'a, ana atrua eritrege'za vuza e'za hu'naze.
Ana ke hakarema haza'zamo vgaregeno, Jisasi amage nentaza disaipol nagara Poli'a kehige'za emeritru hazageno, zamumro kea anteteno, hufru huno knareki manineho hunezmanteno, atreno Masedonia vu'ne.
Ana mopa kazigama vano huno rama'a keretima zamentinti naga zamazeri hanavematiteno, Grisi ehanati'ne.
Anantega 3'a ika maniteno, Siria kaziga ventefi vunaku'ma nehigeno, mago'a Jiu vahe'mo'za haenaku ke retro haza nanekema nentahino'a, eteno Masedonia mopafi kampi vunaku Poli'a agesa antahi'ne.
Mago'a vahe'mo'za Poli'ene vu'nazana, Beria kumateti ne' Sopati, Perusi nemofoki, Tesalonikati Aristakusi'ene Sekanduskegi, Debe kumateti Gaiusiki, Esia kumateti Timotiki, Tikikusiki, Trofimasi'za vu'naze.
Ama ana vene'nemo'za vugote'za Troasi ome tavega ante'naze.
Zo'ore bretima Juda vahe'mota nenona kna'mofo amefiga'a hompama vagaregeta, Filipai kumara atreta ventefi mrerita 5fu'a zge ferupi nevuta, Troasi kumate tavega ante'nare uhnatita ana kumate mago sonta umani'none.
Ana Sontamofo pusa kna're bretima kori'za (komonion) neku eritruma nehunkeno'a, Poli'a oki vugahue huno agesa nentahi'no keaga nezmasmino, mono kea huvava nehigeno kerage amu'no ase'ne.
Anagamu kino mareri'nea nomofo hunaraginte pinka rama'a rampe tvira manenegeta atrua hu'none.
Hagi mago nehaza nera agi'a Jutikasi'e, zaho kamofo atupare (windo) marerino mani'neno, Poli'ma keagama huvava huno nevigeno'a, antahirega avukoko higeno, mase himarenefinti, tagufa nonteti anagamuti asaga huramino ahe fri'ne.
Hianagi Poli'a uramino agri agumpi umseno azana rugagino anu'nekino tmasunkura osiho hu'ne. Tamagra antria osiho, na'ankure agra ofri'neanki amne mani'ne huno hu'ne.
Nehuno Poli'a eteno anagamu marerino, bretima korige'za netageno, za'za kna zamagranena keaga nehigeno ko'atigeno zamatreno vu'ne.
Ana nehazavea ofrino mani'nege'za muse nehu'za avare'za nontega vu'naze.
Ananteti tagra ventefi umarerita Asosi vunaku nehuta, Polina avarenteta vunaku tagesa antahi'none, na'ankure ama kana agra'a azeri antefatgo huno, agra mopafi vugahue huno agesa antahi'ne.
Asosima rutagiha higeta, agrira ventefi avarenentata, Miteleni ti amunompi me'nea ran kumate vunaku vuvava hu'none.
Anantetira maseta mago knarera ventefi nevunkeno ko'atigeta, Kiosi tinkenare uhanatita, mago knarera Samosi uhanatita, hagi ana kna'mofo amefiga'a Mailitusi vu'none.
Na'ankure Poli'a Efesasia agateregahue huno antahi'ne, na'ankure Esia za'za kna omani'na ko knare'ma hanuna Jerusale nagra mani'nesugeno hompa (pentikos) kna fore hugahie hu'ne.
Mailatusi uhanatite'za, Poli'a ke atrezmanteno Efesasi mono nonte kva (elda) vahe'zga eme nageho hu'ne.
Ke hige'za agrite ageno, amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Pusante'ma Esia mopare nagiama rentoa zupa, tamagripima maka zupa mani'na e'noana, tamagratmi ko ketma antahi'naze. Esia kaziga e'na tamagrane nemanugeta nagri agafa'a nage'naze.
Jiu vahe'mo'za nazeri havizahu kema retro'ma haza zamo'a tusi'a knazamo nagri navufare ege'na anterami'na zavira nete'na, Ramofo erizana eri'noe.
Tamagri'ma tamaza hania kea, korera osu'na huama hu'na tamasmugetma antahi'naze. Vahe'pina neramasmi'na, nonte nontera tamasmugetma ko antahi'naze.
Jiu vahe'ene Griki vahera hu'ama hu'na tamagu'a rukarehe hutma Anumzante ne-etma, Ranti Jisasinte tamentinti hiho hu'na zamasmi'noe.
Hagi menina Ruotge Avamu'mofo ke amage antena, nagra Jerusalemi nevue, nagri navufarera na'a fore hugahio, ontahi'noe.
Hankino Ruotge Avamu'mo nagrira nasamino, mika ranra kumapina, kina hu'zamo'ene kna'zamo'enena kavega ante'ne hu'ne.
Hu'neanagi navufagura nagesa nontahue, tusi'a zana eri'zani'a erivaga nere'na, Ra Jisasi'ma eri'zama namino vahe'ma zamasmio hu'nea eri'za eri'na Anumzamofo asunku zankura knare nanekea vahera zamasmigahue.
Hagi menina nagra antahi'noankitma, azago menima Anumzamofo kumakuma neramasmumota, mago'enena nagri navugosafina onke'tfa hugahaze.
E'ina hu'negu, meni nagra huama hu'na neramasmue, miko vahe'mofo koran kumimo'a nagritera ome'tfa hugahie.
Na'ankure Anumzamofo miko avesi'zama'a nagra korera osu'na hu'ama hu'na neramasmue.
Tamagratmia kegva nehutma, lama afu kevua kegva hiho, Ruotge Avamu'mo tamazeri antegetma kva hu'naze. Agrama magoke Mofavre ama huntegeno koranteti'ma mizama ase'nea Anumzamofo mono nagara zamazeri fatgo hutma kavagri zamantegahaze.
Nagrama tamatrena vanugeno'a amefiga, nagra antahi'noankino, mago'a afi' kra esaniazamo lama afu kevua zamazeri savri hugahie.
Kagri ka'a nagapinti enena vahe'mo'a otino tamage kea eri ruvahe hu'za rempi hunezmi'za, Jisasima amage' nentaza disaipol nagara zamagrarega zamavrenteku hugahaze.
E'ina hu'negu tamavura omase kava hute maniho, tamagesama antahi ankeresazana tagufa zagegfumofo agu'afina hanine zgenena ontagane'na kazigzi hu'na zavira nete'na, mago'mago'moka kavumarora ante'noe.
Hagi menina nagra Anumzante'ene, Agri asunku'zamofo kere maniho hu'na huneramantoe. Ama kemo'a tamazeri hanave netina, ruotage'ma hu'za mani'naza nagapi tamagra erisanti haregahaze.
Mago'moka silvaguro, Goliguro, kukenagu nagra kenasane nehu'na keaga nosue.
Tamagratmi ko antahita keta hu'naze, ina zanku'ma nagri'ene, magoka vano nehuna naga'enema atupa'ma nehunazana, ama anazamo erifore huno neramie.
Ana mika zampina nagra ko hugaveri'noe, anahu'ma hunka hanavetinka eri'zama erisanana, hanave'a omane vahera aza nehunka, Ramofo Jisasinkere kagesa antahio, Agra'a anage hu'ne, ami'zamofo asomumo'a, eri'zamofona agatere'ne hu'ne.
Poli'ma ana nanekema huvama nereno'a, agra renareno zamagrane nunamu hu'ne.
Anampina zamagra tusi zavi'ateza Polina anankempi azeri anuki'za antako hu'naze.
Kema huno mago'ene onagegahaze hu'nea kegura, tusi zamasunku hu'naze. Nehu'za ventema me'nerega avare'za vu'naze.
Tagra anama huteta, zamatreta ventea atufegantu hagerimpi atreta fatgo huta vuta, Kozie nehaza hageri amunompi me'nea osi mopare (ailen) vuta, nanterana Rodsie nehaza kumate (ailen) uhanatiteta, anantetira Patara mopare uhanati'none.
Patara atreta, Fonesia kumate vunaku nehia vente keta eri fore huteta, miza huta marerunkeno atreno timpi vu'ne.
Saiprasima ventemo unemnia kuma hoga kaziga agatereta, Siria Provinsifi vuta, Taia kumate umani'none. Na'ankure ventemo'a mago'a fenona anante eri netregete.
Jisasima amagema nentaza disaipol nagara ome nezmageta, ana kumate 7ni'a kna mani'none. Zamagra mago'ene Avamu'mo zamazeri otige'za Poliga Jerusale ovuo hu'za hu'naze.
Ananknama vagaregeta, atreta kantega nevunkeno, ana mika'mo'zane, a'ne zamine, mofavre naga'zamine tagrane magoka vazageta ana kumara atreta vu'none. Hagerinkena vuta tarena reta nunamuna ome huteta,
mani'neho huta mago mago'mokizmi hunezmanteta ventifi marerita nevunke'za, zamagra rukrahe hu'za nozimirega vu'naze.
Tagra Taia kumara atreta vuva vuva huta Tolemeas uhanatiteta, mono nagara ome nezmatagita anante magokna mani'none.
Nanterana ana kumara atreta, Siseria ehanatita mono nehia ne' (evangelis) Filipia 7ni'a naga mono kva zamazeri oti'nafinti mago zamimofo nonte umani'none. (Apo 6:1-6)
Ana ne'mofona 4'a ve e'ori kasnampa mofane'zga'a mani'naze.
Anante mago'a kna mani'nonkeno, mago kasnampa nera Agabasi'e nehaza ne'mo, Judia kazigati eramino anante e'ne.
Tagra mani'nontega Agabasi'a eno, Polina amu'nofi'a (belt) erino agra azante ene agiare renenteno anage hu'ne, Ruotge Avamu'mo'a anage hie, Amanahu kante Jerusale mani'naza Jiu vahe'mo'za ama amu'nofi'mofo nefana azeri'za kina rente'za megi'a vahe zamazampi antegahaze.
Ana naneke antahiteta, tagrane anampi nemani'za vahe'ene kazigazi huta, Poliga Jerusalea mareorio huta asami'none.
Anante Poli'a kenona zamirera anage hu'ne, Tamagra nahigetma zavira netetma, narimpamofona nazeri kna nehaze? Na'ankure nofinukera nazeri'za anaki nantehogukera trora osuanki, Ramofo Jisasi agire Jerusale fri'naku retro nehue.
Na'ankure agra ketia ontahisiaza higeta, tagra kea osuta Ramofo avesi'zamo fore hanie huta hu'none.
Ana knama evutegeta trotra nehuta otita Jerusale vu'none.
Mago'a Sisaria kumate nemniza disaipol nagamo'za tagrane ne-eza tavare'za Saiprasi ne' Masoni nompi vazageta, korapa amage nentea disaipol ne'mofo nompi umanigahune hu'nona ne'mofo nompi umani'none.
Jerusale uhanatunke'za Anumzamofo naga'mo'za muse nehu'za tavatagi'za knare hutma aze hu'naze.
Uvasonkeno ko'ma atigeno, Poli'a, Jemisine maka mono kva vahe'zgama (eldas) mani'naza ome zamagenaku tagrane vu'ne.
Poli'a ome zamageno zamatagiteno, agra agafa huno mago' mago'zama Anumzamo'ma mono eri'za megi'a vahepima e'nerigeno hu'neazana zamasmi'ne.
Ama ana nanekema antahite'za, Anumzamofo agi erisaga hu'naze. Zamagra anage hu'za Polina asami'naze, kagra nerafuga antahio, nama'a tauseni'a Jiu vahe'mo'za zamentinti nehu'za, Mosese Kasege'ne amage' nentaza vahe'mo'zanena hampo'nati'za amage' nentaze.
Mago'a vahe'mo'za anage hu'za kagrikura zamasmi'naze, kagra maka Jiu vahe'mo'za megi'a vahepi mani'nazana, Mosese Kasegemo'a taza osugahie hunka nehunka, mofavreramina zamufa taga huozmanteho nehunka, tagri tavu'tvamofo avu'ava osugahaze hunka hu'nananke antahi'none.
Tagra na'a hugahune? Kagrama kamama e'nana nanekema zamagra antahisu'za tamage hugahaze.
Ana hu'negu tagrama kasmisunaza huo. 4'a vene'nemo'za Anumzamofonte huvempa hu'za mani'naze.
Hanki zamavarenka kagrane magoka tamazeri agru nehutma, zamazoka'ma haresazazana miza sezmantegahane. E'ina hananke'za, maka vahe'mo'za antahi'za kema hazage'za kagriku'ma antahi'nazana tamage hu'naze hugahaze. Hu'neanagi kagraka'a kasegea amage antenka manigahane.
Hu'neanagi megi'a vahe'ma zamentinti nehaza vahetega, tagra avonkreta, havi anumzante kre sramna vuntesia zgagfane, korane anankema taga osu zgagfane onetma, monko'zana atreho huta tagesa antahiteta kre zami'none. (Apo 15:29)
Nanterana Poli'a zamareno agrane ana vahe'ma zamazeri agru huteno, ra mono nompi vuno, ana zupa mago mago'mofonte kre sramna vuno azeri agaruhu kna vgaregahie huno ome zamasmi'ne.
7ni'a kna vagare'za nehigeno, Esia provinsifinti Jiu vahe'mo'za ra mono nompi mani'nege'za nege'za, rama'a vahe zamarimpa zamazeri otige'za Polina azeneri'za,
anage hu'za ranke hu'naze, Israeli vahe'mote taza hiho! Ama ne'mo'a hakare kaziga mani'naza vahetamina rempi hunezmino, vahetine kasegetine, ra mono nontia ha' renente! Mago'enena agra Griki vahera zamareno ra mono nomofo agu'afi nevuno, ruotage hu'nea ra mono nona eri pehena nehie!
Zamagra negageno Efesasiti nera Trofimasi'a, Poli'ene Jerusalemi vano nehige'za negaza ne'ku, ra mono nomofo agu'afinka avreno marerinegahie hu'za zamagesa antahi'naze.
Maka vahe'mo'za eritru hu'za zamaga re'za e'za, Polina azeri'za avazu hu'za ra mono nomofo agu'afinti atimaneramizageno'a, ame hu'za ra mono nonkafana erigi'naze.
Polima ahe friku'ma nehzageno, anampinti vahe'mo'za zamaga re'za vu'za, maka Jerusale vahe'mo'za ha' nehaze hu'za sondia vahete kva nehia nera ome asmi'naze.
Ana sondia kva ne'mo'a ame' huno sondia vahe'zga nezmareno, mago'a vahe'mokizmi kva vahe'zga (sensulien, hantretia sondia vahete kva nera) zamarege'za, zamaga re'za ana vahete e'naze. Polima ahenaku nehaza vahe'mo'za, sondia vahe'mokizmi kva ne'ene, sondia vahe'zgama nezamage'za, ohe'za atre'naze.
Anante sondia kva ne'mo'a Polina ome azeriteno, huzmantege'za tare seni nofinu anakintetageno, anante sondia kva ne'mo'a, zamantahige'ne, Agra aza'e, agra na'a hu'ne?
Hu'neanagi tusi'a vahe tamimpinti mago'amo'za ranke hu'za ra kefinti mago zanku kereso nehazageno, mago'amo'za ruge nehazageno, sondia kva ne'mo'a ke agafa'a keno eri fore osu'ne. Na'ankure rama'a vahe'mo'za kehakare nehazageno ontahino, Polina avareta sondia vahe kumapi viho hige'za avare'za vu'naze.
Agrama latare'ma ege'za, Polina sondia vahe'mo'za azerisga hu'za mareri'naze. Na'ankure rama'a vahe'mo'za ahenaku nehazageno'e.
Rama'a vahe tamimo'za zamavariri'za nevu'za kezatiza, Ahe friho! Ahe friho! hu'naze.
Polima avare'za sondia vahe kumapi ufre'za nehazageno sondia kva ne' asamino, knare mago'a kea kasmisufi? Higeno ana ne'mo, Griki kea antahi'nano? huno Polina antahige'ne.
Kagra Isipi ne'ma, mago'a knafima ugota hunka, 4 tauseni'a vahe'ma kamani vahe ha'ma rezmanteku'ma hu'naza venene'ma zamarenka hagege kokampi vu'nana nepi, ru nere?
Poli'a kenona anage hu'ne, nagra Jiu nere Tasis kumateti Sirisia provinsfinti, agatere'nea ran kumatetire. Knare natrenankena ama vahetamina kea zamasmigahuo higeno,
Ana sondia kva ne'mo knareki kea huo higeno, Poli'a latare oti'neno azanu avame hige'za keresoma nehazazana eri taganageno, antahi'naza Aramu (Hibru) kefinti, anage huno zamasmi'ne.
Nafu'nafaheta, amama nagrama navufa nagu'vazi kema nehua kea antahiho.
Zamagrama antahizama, Aramu (Hibru) kefinti kema nehige'za nentahi'za, mago'ane zamagasasankea eri anterami'naze. Anante Poli'a anage hu'ne,
nagra Jiu nere, Tasis kumate Silisia ksenante'ne. Hianagi ama ran kumapi ra hutena Gamalieli hikanaga avonona hu'na, tagehemofo kasegemo hu'nea kante ante'na Anumzamofo avu'avara hanaveti'na avariri fatgo hu'noe. Tamagrama nehazaza hu'na Anumzamofona amage ante'na vu'noe.
Nagra amanahu hu'na, zamentinti vahera nezamahe'na, zamahe fri'za nehu'na, vene'ne a'nenena kina rezamante'na zamare'na kina nompi ome zamante'noe.
Ugagota prisi ne'mo'ene, maka kanisol (senhidren) vahe'mo'za, amama nehuazankura tamage hu'za tamasmigahaze. Zamagra mago'a avona kre'nami'za erinka Damaskasi nemniza kafuhe'intega vuo hazage'na, nagra kina ome rezmante'na zamare'na e'na, Jerusale zamata hoza zamihogu kantega vu'noe.
Nagrama vuvava hu'na Damaskasi urava'o nehugeno'a, feru'naza monafinkati msa'nentake tvi'mo ame' huno remsa hunante kagine.
Anante nagra traka hu'na mopafi evuramugeno, mago ageru nentahugeno anage huno nagriku hu'ne, Sol, Sol, na'a higenka Nagrira nazeri havizana nehane?
Nagra ke nona'a, azage Ra'moka? hu'na nehugeno, Agra anage huno nasami'ne, Nazareteti Jisasi'na nazeri haviza nehane huno hu'ne.
Nagrane vu'naza vahe'mo'za ana msa ke'nazanagi, nanekema hunamia kea antahi ama osu'naze.
Ana hige'na nagra na'a hugahue Ramoka? hu'na antahigogeno, Ramo'a nagrikura anage hu'ne, Otinka Damaskasi vugeno, maka'zama hugahane hu'na huhampri kante'noa'zana kasamino.
Na'ankure tavi'mofo msamo navurga erihaviza hige'na navua onkoge'za, magokama vu'nona vahe'mo'za Damaskasia nazante navazu hu'za ufre'naze.
Ana kumate mago nera mani'neana agi'a Ananaisi kasegemofo avariri fatgo nehige'za, anampima nemni'za maka Jiu vahe'mo'za, knare nere nehaza ne'mo,
mani'nore eme otino nagriku anage hu'ne, Soliga nenafuge, kavurgamo'a so'e huganteno! Higeno ame' huno navumo'a hari hige'na kesga hu'na ana ne' ke'noe.
Anante agra anage huno nasami'ne, tagehe'mokizmi Anumzamo ko kagrira huhampriganteno, Agri avesi'za antahinka kenka nehunka, Fatgo Hu'nea Ne' Jisasi negenka, Agra'a agipinti'ma hania kea antahigahane.
Na'ankure Agrama kagri'ma eri kaverigenka, negenka nentahinka hu'nana kea, huama hunka maka vahera zamasmigahane.
Na'a higenka avega antenka mani'nane? Otinka mono ti nefrenka, agihanta nevazigeno kumi ka'a sese huganteno hu'ne.
Ana hutege'na ete rukarahe hu'na Jerusale kumate e'na, ranmono nompi nunamu nehu'na ava'nagna'za kogeno,
Ramo'a negogeno anage huno nasami'ne, Hantaka'a Jerusalea atrenka ame' hunka vuo, na'ankure Nagri nagenkema kagrama hanana kea ontahigahaze.
Nagra kenona'a anage hu'noe, Ramoka Kagrite'ma osi mono nompi mono nehu'za, zamentintima nehaza vahe'ma kina nompi zamare nente'na, zamazeri havizama nehu'na zamahe'noazana ko antahi'naze.
Kagri kema huama nehia ne'ma Stivenima ahe'za korama'a erimegi atraza'zana, nagrani'a tava'onte mani'nena, mago narimpa nehu'na, ahe'naza vahe'mokizmi anakare ku'zamirera kava hu'nogeza ahe'naze.
Anante Ramo'a anage huno nasami'ne. Vuo! Na'ankure afete hugante'nugenka megi'a vahepi ke'ni'a erinka ome zamasmigahane hu'ne.
Ana vahetamimo'za antahime nevazareti'ma, megi'a vaheku'ma agrama kema hiana nentahi'za zamagerura eri mago hu'za ranke hu'za, ama mopafintira azeri atreho! Agra ama mopafi manigara osu'ne!
Rankege nehu'za, kukena'zami zafima netare'za, kugusopa kate'za zahopi mate vu'naze.
Ana'ma haza'zanku Romu sondia kva ne'mo'a, Polina ete avaretma sondia vahe kumapi ufreho huno huzmante'ne. Agra zamasmino kao akaruteti trohunte nofi knonu sefu kno Polina ome nehetma antahigeho, Jiu vahe'mo'za nanke agafare amanahu rankea Polina hunentafi, huno huzmante'ne.
Knoma ahenaku azama azeri antesga nehazageno, Poli'a anante otino mani'nea sondia kva ne' (sensulien, hantretia sondia vahete kva nera), asami'ne, Knare hu'negu hazenke'a omane Romu vahere huno maninesia vahera ke agafa'a eri fatgo osu'nesiazantera ahegahazafi?
Sondia vahete kva ne'mo, ana kema nentahino, ugagota sondia nete vuno, kema hianke ome asamino, anage hu'ne, kagra na'a huntenaku nehane? Na'ankure ama'na nera Romu nere huno mani'nea nere.
Anante ugagota sondia kva ne'mo otino eno Polina anage huno antahige'ne, Kagra nasamio Romu ne' mani'nano? higeno agra hu'ne, ozo.
Ana ugagota sondia kva ne'mo, kenona'a anage hu'ne, Nagrama Romu vahe mani'nakura rama'a zgo mizase'na mani'noe. Hianagi Poli'a kenona'a huno nagri'enena ama mopare nere huno nenfa'a mani'neno, ome kasenantege'na, Romu nere hu'na mani'noe,
Polima sefu ami'za nehaza vahe'mo'za ame hu'za atre'za mani ogantu ogama nehazageno, ugagota sondia kva ne'mo antahiama Poli'ma Romu ne' mani'nege'za anakinte'naza zankura kore hu'ne.
Maseno ko'atigeno Romu sondia vahete ugagota kva ne'mo'a, Na'a agafare Jiu vahe'mo'za kea Polina hunte'naze antahino keno hunaku kazufe netreno, prisi vaheku'ene kanisol vahe'zga ke hige'za atru hu'naze. Anante Polina avareno eramino zamuga eme ante'ne.
Poli'a kanisol vahe'zaga zamufi keankere'neno anage hu'ne, Nenafugate nagra magore hu'na havizana osu'noe. Fatgo huno ama' nagu'nagesare Anumzamofo avurera manina ena ama knarera ehanatue.
Anagema higeno, ugagota prisi ne' Ananaisi'a anante oti'naza vaheku Polina agi ruhapatitma aheho huzmante'ne.
Anante Poli'a anage agrikura hu'ne, Anumzamo'a kagrira kahegahie. Kagra amega fatgo hu'na knare hu'noe nehananagi, kagu'afinka haviza hu'nane! Kagra amare mani'nenka kasegemo'ma hu'nere antenka refako hunenantane. Kasegea rutagarenka aheho hunka hunezmantano?
Ana tva'onte oti'naza vahe'mo'za anage hu'naze, kagra Anumzamofo hai prisi ne' huhaviza huntenaku nehampi? Hu'za hazageno,
Poli'a kenona zamire anage hu'ne, nenafugata ugagota prisi ne' mani'ne hu'na nagra ontahi'noe, na'ankure anage huno avon tafepina krente'ne, kagri vahete'ma kva hu'nea vahera huhavizana huonto hu'ne. (Ekso-Uti 22:28)
Anante Polima nezmagege'za anama eri tru hu'naza vahepina, Satusi vahe'ene mago'a Farisi vahe mani'nageno nezmageno, ranke huno anage hu'ne, nafu naganaheta nagra Farisi neki, nenfa'a Farisi ne'mo kasenantege'na mani'noe. Nagri'ma kema hunenantazana, nagrama namentinti hu'na fripinti otigahie hu'na huazanku kea hunenantaze!
Anage'ma hige'za, Farisi vahe'ene Satusi vahe'mo'za atruma hu'nafinti amu'nompinti refako hu'za ana kegu fra vazi'naze.
Na'ankure Satusi vahe'mo'za fripinti o'otigahie nehu'za, ankero vahera omanine nehu'za, avamura omani'ne hu'nazanagi, Farisi vahe'mo'za ana maka'zana me'ne hu'za antahi'naze.
Anampinti kezati'za ranke hu'za kea nehazage'za, mago'a Farisi nagapinti kasegere ugagota hu'naza vahe'mo'za oti'za hanave ke hu'za, mago hazenke'a ama nera keta eri forera osu'none. Avamu'mo'o, ankeromo'ma kema huminesigeno'a na'a hugahie?
Tusi ke hafra nehazageno, Romu sondia kva ne'mo aru Poli avazu hu'za azeri taganape'zanku sondia vahera huzamanteno, uramitma Polina hanavetitma zamagripintira avaretma sondia vahe kumapi efareho hu'ne.
Ana kenage Ramo Polina tava'oma'are oti'neno anage huno asami'ne, Oti hanavetio, Jerusalema Nagri nagi nagenke huama hu'nanaza hunka Romu kumatera anazanke hunka ome huama hugahane.
Ko'atige'za nanterampi mago'a Jiu vahe'mo'za eri atru hu'za, hanave ke huvempa hu'za Polima ahesnaza naneke retro nehu'za, ne'zane tine a'o huta mani'neta Polina ahesunkeno frisnie, hu'za huhankaveti'za kea retro hu'naze.
Anampima nanekema hu'za retro'ma hu'nazana 40ti'a vahera agatere'za mani'neza retro hu'naze.
Zamagra ra prisi vahete'ene mono kva (elda) vahe'zgare vu'za anage ome hu'naze. Tagra kea huvempa huta mago'zana one'mani'neta, Polina ahe farigahune hu'za hu'naze.
Hanki menina kagrane, kanisol vahe'motma sondia kva vaheku ke eri fatgo hugahunanki avreta eramiho hinke'za, avare'za eramisnageta, amare erava'o osu'nenageta kantega kavagrita mani'neta, ahe frisune.
Hianagi Poli nesaro ne' mofavremo ahegahune hazanke nentahino, eno sondia vahe kumapi efareno Polina kahe ke nehaze huno asami'ne.
Poli'a mago kina vahete kva ne' (sensulien), ke huno asami'ne, Avarenka ama arisera ugagota sondia kva nete vuo, na'ankure mago'a kea agra ome asamigahie huno huntene.
Ana higeno hantreti'a sondia vahete kva ne'mo (sensulien,) ana arisera avareno ugagota sondia kva nete vuno, Poli'a hunanteno avarenka ama arisera ugagota sondia kva ne'te vuo, na'ankure agra mago'a kea ome asamigahie, hige'na avare'na e'noe.
Ana ugagota sondia kva ne'mo azante avazuhuganti ataregene, zanagraku umani'neke, anage huno antahige'ne, Na'ane naneke nasaminaku hu'nane?
Ana arise'mo'a anage huno asami'ne, Jiu vahe'mo'za mago zamarimpa nehu'za, havige hu'za kantahigesagenka Polina avarenka okina kanisol vahetega uramisanke'za, keaga refako hu'za mago'ene hake'za ke'naku hu'naze.
Ana hu'negu zamatrege'za anara osiho, na'ankure 40ti'a nazana agatere'naza vahe'mo'za ahe'nakura hu'naze. Zamagra kea huvempa hu'za, ne'zane tine oneneta ahe frigahune nehu'za menina zamagri kere'ma mago karimpa hananku, kavega ante'za mani'naze.
Anante ugagota sondia kva ne'mo'a ana risera hunenteno, hamponage asamino, vanunka ama nanekea kva nera ome asami'noe hunka, mago'mofona osamitfa huo.
Anante ugagota sondia kva ne'mo, sondia vahete kva ne'tre (sensulien), ke higeke akeno, anage huno zanasmi'ne, 200ti'a sondia vahera huge'za Siseria kumate vugahazanki tro hiho, anampina 70ti'a hosifi vano nehu'za ha' nehaza sondia vaheki 200ti'a karugaru kevereti ha' nehaza sondia vaheki hu'za meni kenagera 9 kiloki vugahazanki tro hiho. Polina hosi afu'zgafintira mago'a amigeno agumpi manina avaretma kva huntetma, Gavana ne' Feliksinte viho huno zamasmi'ne.
Polina hosi afu'zgafintira mago'a amigeno agumpi manina avaretma kva huntetma Gavana ne' Feliksinte viho huno zamasmi'ne.
Agra avoma kre'neana amanahu kante kre tre'ne,
Nagra Klotiasi Lisiasi'na, knare Gavana kva nemokarega Feliksiga musenke kre'negamue,
Ama nera Jiu vahe'mo'za azeri'za ahe'za nehazage'na, sondia vahe'niane e'na aza hu'na avare'noe. Na'ankure nagrama antahuana Romu ne' mani'noe higeta avareta e'none.
Na'anteku nanekea hunentazo nagra antahinaku, zamagri kanisol vahete avare'na urami'noe.
Nagrama kena erifore'ma huana, zamagra'zimi kasegereku hu'za ke hakare hunte'naze, hianagi ahe fri kankamune kina hunte kea kena eri fore osu'noe.
Ahenaku kema retro'ma haza naneke eme nenasmige'na, ama nera ame hu'na kagritega huntogeno ne-egena, ke ha'ma rentaza vahera magoka kagri kavure kea huntesazegu huzmantoge'za neaze huno krente'ne.
Ana hige'za sondia vahe'mo'za kema huzmantea kante ante'za, Polina avare'za kenageke Antipatris rankumate vunaku vu'naze.
Mase'za nantera hosifima vano hu'za ha' nehaza sondia vahera zamatrege'za avare'za vazage'za, mago'amo'za ete sondia vahe kumatega e'naze.
Hosifima vano nehu'za ha'ma nehaza vahe'mo'za, Sisariama e'za ana avona Gavana ne'ma eme nemi'za, Polina eme ami'naze.
Ana Gavana ne'mo avoma hamprino nentahino, anage huno antahige'ne, Kagra ina provinsifinti nere? Higeno Poli'a huno nagra Sirisia nere higeno antahiteno,
anage hu'ne, kema hugante'naza vahe'ma esage'na, keka'a antahigahue. Higeno anante Heroti kina nompi Polina avaretma ome anteho hu'ne.
